title: Acorns: Invest For Your Future
description:
Acorns helps you save, invest, and grow for your future. Our automated saving, investing, and spending tools help you grow your money and financial wellness.

At Acorns, we believe that financial wellness is for everybody. It has nothing to do with how much you make â€” itâ€™s about finding balance with what you have. Financial wellness is when you are spending smarter today, saving for tomorrow, and investing for your future all at once.

More than 14,000,000 Americans have invested over $27,000,000,000 with Acorns. You can get started in under 5 minutes, with as little as your spare change.

SECURE: Acorns is committed to your security with 2-factor authentication, fraud protection, 256-bit data encryption, and all-digital card lock. Acorns Investment accounts are SIPC-protected up to $500,000, and Acorns checking accounts are FDIC-insured up to $250,000.

INVEST:

- EASY, AUTOMATED INVESTING
Your money is automatically invested into our expert-built, diversified ETF portfolios. You can Invest Spare ChangeÂ® each time you make a purchase with the Round-UpsÂ® feature or set up automated recurring investments starting as low as $5.

- INVEST IN BITS OF BITCOIN
Ride Bitcoinâ€™s highs and ride out its lows by allocating up to 5% of your diversified portfolio towards a Bitcoin-linked ETF.

- PERSONALIZE YOUR PORTFOLIO
Add individual stocks and ETFs from the largest 100+ public US companies to your Custom Portfolio.

- INVEST FOR RETIREMENT
Save for retirement with an Acorns Later account, and get a 3% IRA match on new contributions during your first year with Acorns Gold.

- INVEST FOR YOUR KIDS
Start building your kidsâ€™ futures with Acorns Early Invest, a dedicated investment account for your kids. Plus, weâ€™ll match your investments by 1% â€” exclusively on Acorns Gold!

SAVE:

- EMERGENCY SAVINGS
Build savings for lifeâ€™s unexpected hiccups, including a 3.59% APY to help your money grow.

- CHECKING 
Invest Spare ChangeÂ® when you spend, and automatically invest a piece of each paycheck with Acorns Checking.

AND MORE:

- MONEY MANAGER 
Put your money on autopilot with Money Manager, which smartly splits your money across investing, saving, and spending.

- KIDS & TEEN DEBIT CARD
Teach your kids financial wellness with an Acorns Early debit card, included in Acorns Gold.

- EARN BONUS INVESTMENTS
Shop 11,000+ brands and earn bonus investments and exclusive deals. Plus, earn limited-time referral bonuses of up to $1,200.

- GROW YOUR MONEY KNOWLEDGE
Access custom articles, videos, courses, and live Q&As to learn all things money.

SUBSCRIPTION PLANS

Whether youâ€™re new to investing or planning for your familyâ€™s future, we bundle our money tools into subscription plans. No hidden costs or transaction fees â€” just one, transparent monthly payment to start growing your oak.

Bronze ($3/mo)
â€”
Investing tools to get you started on your financial journey.

- Round-UpsÂ® feature
- Expert-built diversified portfolio
- Retirement account
- Checking account, and more

Silver ($6/mo)
â€”
Level up your saving and investing skills.

- Everything in Bronze
- 1% IRA match on new contributions to your Acorns Later retirement account during your first year with Acorns Silver
- Emergency Savings
- Courses and videos to help you grow your money knowledge
- Live Q&As with investing experts

Gold ($12/mo)
â€”
Full suite of saving, investing, and learning tools for you and your family.

- Everything in Silver	
- Smartly split your money across investing, saving and spending with Money Manager
- 3% IRA match on new contributions to your Acorns Later retirement account during your first year with Acorns Gold
- Investment accounts for your kids with a 1% match
- Acorns Early smart money app and debit card for kids
- Ability to add individual stocks and ETFs to your portfolio
- $10,000 life insurance policy
- Complimentary tax filing, will, and more
â€”
Disclosures are available in the images above and at www.acorns.com/disclosures
5300 California Ave Irvine CA 92617

scraped_reviews.content: After spending a week with support trying to get my account set up for the first time, I ultimately decided that what the app offers isn't right for me. The round-up ideology is marvel, sure, but at the same time, I could just as easily take $5 out of my account and invest it elsewhere without having to pay the $12/month fee. Thank you again to the support team for trying to help, though.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Weâ€™re sorry for any inconvenience. Acorns offers a referral program to improve your financial outlookâ€”learn more here: bit.ly/3XHMswK. As a subscription-based service, we bundle our products into subscription plans, visit us at: bit.ly/41RgQHY.

For more concerns, feel free to reach out to us at support.acorns.com or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a decent app for what you get. The gold plan offers very little compared to Robinhood (and it's more expensive), so if I had to do it over, Id choose them. very little stock and etf options all things considered. other apps just blow it out of the water with choices and control. the customer service takes forever and calls are, of course, outsourced to people who have hardly any control over what happens. rarely, are complicated issues resolved. good for set it and forget it invest
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We are sorry to hear about the experience you may have encountered. We're constantly striving to enhance our services to better align with your needs, and we will certainly pass along your feedback to the relevant team.

If you have any additional questions, please contact our support team at: support.acorns.com or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: The round ups are really inconsistent. I linked my account and activated round ups and the weekly investment but the only consistent debit was the investment. When I checked on the app it showed it hadn't updated activity in 5 months. I keep having to unlink and relink my account for the round ups to activate. If this continues I'll just go back to a normal savings since this isn't really worth it otherwise. It's supposed to be an automatic thing I shouldn't have to constantly check.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We are very sorry to hear about your experience! For more information on Rounds-UpsÂ®, please visit: https://bit.ly/4dkBN0U

For any additional assistance, please contact our support team at: support.acorns.com or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: This app used to be free. Yes, you could choose to pay for more advanced investing, but if you were just using round-ups and your own investment knowledge/who you were listening to, you could by partial investments and grow your income. The fact you can no longer do this without a minimum of $3/mth means this app has fallen far downhill for me. Unecessary changes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We apologize for the inconvenience. We charge for subscriptions so that we can offer automated money tools, education, and helpful reminders that you wonâ€™t find in other DIY approaches. More details about pricing available at: acorns.com/pricing/.

For any additional concerns, please contact us at: support.acorns.com or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: The app interface is fine except for not working. Constantly getting stuck on a loading screen that never load. Accounts saying they are connected and then saying "Oops, try again later." I've tried for 3 hours to get it to connect to investing, including disconnecting and relinking accounts, uninstalling the app, canceling and restarting the subscription. Everything I can think of and still not working.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience that you have experienced. We understand your concern and we are here to help you to resolve it promptly. To help you with the app crashing issues, please see this information. https://bit.ly/3DNaG1M

For any additional support, please contact us at: support.acorns.com or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: Seemed great at first, but then I tried to open a checking account and it was all downhill from there. The ID and address verification system is broken. Email support just put me through a feedback loop for weeks, gaslighting me about whether I uploaded the necessary documents, which I did many times. And once I got fed up with the lack of support, predatory policies kept me from cancelling my account before being billed again. Avoid at all costs. They'll treat you like trash and profit from it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We sincerely apologize for the experience you encountered. We are eager to address your concerns promptly and would greatly appreciate another opportunity to assist you. We have sent you an email to provide further assistance.

Additionally, to address your concerns, please reach us team at support.acorns.com or by phone at 855-739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: Never using this again and will be cancelling my account. My card expired at the end of last month. Instead of making sure the card arrived before it expired, since it takes 14 days, the card was shipped late and I was left without a working card for seven days. Even after getting the card I'm locked out of it and tech support is less than useless. Never trusting my money with you ever again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you've encountered. Your patience and understanding are greatly appreciated and would love to have another opportunity to address your concerns promptly.

Furthermore, to streamline the resolution process, please contact our support team at support.acorns.com or by phone at 855 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: Had the rounding up and daily withdrawal both active. not once did it round up any purchase and the daily withdrawals were very sporadic and never increased my acorns account balance. Even after a few months of having this app and taking my money, my account stayed the exact same $20. So I cancelled my subscription, it's been over a month, the cancellation is still pending and they haven't given me any returns on my "investments".
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you may have encountered. Ensuring your satisfaction is our utmost priority, and we are dedicated to resolving your concerns both promptly and efficiently.

For streamlined assistance, kindly reach out to our support team via support.acorns.com or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: started off like a good app, but since I started investing 7 years ago they hiked the price for the base level account 3x. and just in the past month or two they rewards on the base account by 35%, offering the previous reward amount ONLY if you pay 4x the monthly fee. (that's a 1200% increase from what I was paying 7 years ago, for those keeping count). I guess greed gets the best of people sometimes, but looks like I'll be taking ny business elsewhere since I wont pay more and get less. ðŸ‘‹
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you. We are a subscription-based service, and more pricing information can be found at acorns.com/pricing/. We are eager to assist you further with your rewards and have also reached out to you via email.

To help resolve your issue, please contact us at support.acorns.com or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: It would be nice if you all would add ALL Reputable banks to your listing to do rollovers and increases. The monthly fee comes out on time every month but i can't add my bank to do round ups or reccuring investments. That's not good and needs to be fixed. I've had this for years now and would be so much further. Please fix this QUICKLY!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We sincerely apologize for the challenges you have experienced and want to assure you that we are fully committed to resolving your concerns promptly.

To streamline the resolution process, please contact our support team at: support.acorns.com or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: Not great performance. I've been in for a little over 8 years, averaging less than 5% annual returns despite choosing high yield, high risk investment options. That includes the pandemic, but my IRA investments are doing much better than my Acorns account even through the same dip. Getting ready to pull the plug. I like the idea of the platform and it's incremental investment options, but it's really only good for smaller or beginner investors who want to dabble. You're not going to make a ton.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your return on investment is dependent on the asset type and your personal investment objectives. For more details on investment returns, please visit: bit.ly/3MGat1e.

For any additional concerns, please contact our support team at support.acorns.com or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: I cancelled my subscription in Jan, received my last charge in Jan, but then 9 months later my checking account showed the subscription charge resumed again without any notice. Logged into the app and it still said my subscription cancelation was pending, but no options to do anything else. Had to contact support to cancel and refund (still pending to see if it really went through). Seems pretty shady of acorns, wonder how many others are getting charged without knowing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We apologize for the inconvenience regarding the Acorns subscription charges and would like to have another opportunity to address your concern. We have reached out to you directly via email. Please review your inbox for further assistance.

To streamline the process, please contact our team at: support.acorns.com or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: Makes you link your bank account then tells you what the monthly charge of using the app is but if you don't want to pay that (and why would you when plenty of others do the same thing for free) you can't go back to the previous page or get to another page to delete your bank info. Far as I can see so far I'm going to have to subscribe and then immediately unlink my bank then delete my amount account and cancel subscription.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Weâ€™re sorry to hear about your experience and would like to look into this for you. As a subscription-based service, we bundle our products, tools, and educational resources together. You can learn more at: www.acorns.com/pricing/.

If you need further assistance, please contact our support team at: support.acorns.com or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: It looks good, and I think it's a great way to make money over time. But I do have an issue. The whole point was to link your card for round ups, and you're able to manually link your bank account with it instead. But for some reason, doing that doesn't turn on round ups, and it keeps asking to link a card. Wouldn't manually linking your bank account would make it easier, so why doesn't it turn on Round-ups? It makes no sense and is inconvenient. Please fix the issue so it works for manual.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for rating our app and investing with us, Brandon! We're truly sorry for the challenges you've faced with your Acorns account. We want to assure you that we are committed to making things right for you.

To better assist you with any issues, please contact our support team at: https://support.acorns.com or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app for saving but if you set your account to round up, it will take round ups from purchases made by AND ANY DEPOSITS that go into the account. They specify round ups as coming from purchases only which is not true at all. After that, you'll have to wait for the funds to settle and then withdraw the funds which will take another week.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We're sorry for the inconvenience you have experienced. Round-UpsÂ® helps you invest effortlessly by rounding up your purchases and investing the spare change. For detailed information about Round-UpsÂ®, please visit: bit.ly/4kKUNJv.

For any additional concerns, please contact our support team at support.acorns.com or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: Horrible. Very unclear hidden fees when I first started. Every time I tried to use their help center, it would delete the log and end the conversation if you didn't keep the help center tab open. Meaning if they ask you a question about your account, you can't open any other part of the app, or it closes out the conversation. Just get a self investment app and do some basic stocks. Don't bother with this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We apologize for the experience you have encountered. We are dedicated to helping resolve your issue and value your feedback, which we will share with the relevant team. For more information on subscriptions, please visit: bit.ly/4jrshLA.

For any questions, please contact our support team at: support.acorns.com or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: I was semi-pleased with this app despite one of my card's purchases never showing up in round ups. Now I'm not pleased, really. You can't do manual round ups anymore. Even going to the core account in the new app, I can't see transactions in the last 10 days that I have made.i turned off automatic round ups because I would be charged s round up for a pending transaction and when it went through. So twice for the same purchase. But despite that I was generally pleased. If I was low in my funding account, I would just turn it off until payday to avoid an overdraft fee. Bit they really need to bring the round ups back to an entire screen and fix why it's not showing any transactions in days.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thank you for reaching out to us. We apologize for the inconvenience, if you have available manual Round-Ups then they will show in your action feed of the app. For further assistance, please give us a call at 855-739-2859 and we would love to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: I liked this app til I tried to get my money out. 3 months and I still don't have it. I have emailed them several times and they just keep sending automated emails back. Update. They finally did get back to me. And resolved the issue. I received my money. Thank you acorns for that. I added a couple stars. Would add more but the only way to communicate is through email and you use a lot of auto send type to deal with issues.

Pulls change for each purchase. You can set up recurring monthly payments to grow it faster. Except.. the money it pulls doesn't come out immediately. It waits until its added up to $6-7 and then pulls it at once. 3-4 days after it checks your balance. So it has NO way of guaranteeing that your account won't be overdrafted (despite what they say). I got THREE overdraft charges ($29 each). Ended up paying just as much in fees as acorns was saving. Completely defeats the purpose.

All it does is lose money. I initially added some, added a few round ups, and set a recurring payment for every month. It hasn't made me a dime. It just keeps losing. Update: since their generic and completely unhelpful reply, I'll share more results. It lost even more money (still) . I'm so glad I stopped recurring payments with you guys. I'm spreading the word about this app for sure. Maybe you guys will make it easier to close your account in the future instead of keeping people pissed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback! Please keep in mind that Acorns was created with frequent and long-term investing in mind. Feel free to check out this article for more information! https://grow.acorns.com/investing-in-the-stock-market/ or email us at support@acorns.com if you have any questions!

scraped_reviews.content: The only way this app ever made any financial sense was when there were no fees for students. Unless you have a large sum of money invested, siphoning your gains by a monthly fee is ludicrous. I have never paid an Acorns subscription fee and my account has been inactive with no balance for years. Suddenly, they decided to "upgrade" my account and charge a subscription fee. Luckily I caught it early and was only charged for 2 months. I doubt I'll get those charges refunded, so enjoy my $6 :)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear about your experience and would like to look into this for you. Please contact our support team at: https://help.acorns.com/contact or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: Garbage. Can't even complete the beginning setup process. Keeps telling me my credentials are wrong....I log into my bank account every. Single. Day. The credentials are NOT wrong. I really hate when simple things dont work. I see the commercials on TV all the time. Maybe a little less advertising budget and more in software development. I'll find another one of these services. Very disappointed
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we do apologize that you're experiencing an issue linking your bank account. We'd love to look into this for you! Please feel free to give us a call at 855-739-2859 or send us an email at socialsupport@acorns.com and we would love to help you out!

scraped_reviews.content: Put an initial investment in and after that, nothing happened. When I would log in to the app or the website, it would say my accounts weren't verified. After emailing to figure out way this was the case, they told me I had switched funding sources too many times, so now I needed to verify my accounts. I never actually set a funding source, which means they were switching them automatically, as I linked accounts. The app just said "We're in the process of verifying your accounts." ???
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we do apologize for any issues that you're experiencing. We'd love to look into this for you! Please feel free to give us a call at 855-739-2859 or send us an email at support@acorns.com and we would love to help you out!

scraped_reviews.content: Extremely deceptive app. Reading more into it, I'm seeing the word "fees" come up a bit so... Looked into it and apparently there's a monthly "subscription" fee associated with the app. It is small however, the app doesn't disclose it during the signup process. Not only that, but it was somewhat difficult to find this out. This app is literally just an online banking savings account by Lincoln bank. You unknowingly create a savings account with them in a sense when you create an account.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we notify customers of our monthly fee ($1, $2, or $3) during registration: https://www.acorns.com/program-agreement/ and list our pricing structure on our website: https://www.acorns.com/pricing/. For more information, contact support@acorns.com.

scraped_reviews.content: So this review is for the app and Acorns itself as a bank. Honestly, I am very happy with everything, especially the app experience and customer service. As for the banking part, I love it but a few things stick out to me. One is that I cannot deposit money at any physical location or by taking a picture of my paycheck like with other banks. But maybe thats normal for online banks. Another thing is, I recently ordered a new debit card and there was no way to expedite shipping. Als no tap to pay.

Extremely difficult to close your account - I thought I had closed mine and cashed it out, and I was not charged anything for 6 months. I figured everything was okay! Then, a linked card was used to purchase a Sam's club membership and they gave me $10 in kickbacks in the app that I was unaware of. Promotional money, right? Wrong. They used this "kickback" to reopen my account without asking me, The monthly charge started back up at a really bad time and ended up overdrafting my bank account!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we do apologize for any issues that you're experiencing with closing your account. If you have multiple accounts, then you will have to reach out to customer support in order to close them. Please feel free to give us a call at 855-739-2859 or send us an email at support@acorns.com and we would love to help you out!

scraped_reviews.content: For the last two days, I haven't been able to log in. It keeps popping up with a message saying, "Oops, something went wrong, try again in a few minutes." I've deleted and re-download the app a few times even tried logging in from the website version, but that doesn't work either. Like fix your app or let me pull my money out. I enjoyed the app since about 2021. I just don't know why it's having issues currently!

Great app and concept. Low fees make investing in their funds a good choice. I somehow manage to save over $100 per month using roundups and a weekly automated investment. BUT....they're always the last financial service that I use to provide tax forms. March this year! Are they filling them out by hand or running the forms through a pentium 3 PC!? It's 2021. This info should be ready in January! This year it may actually cost me a lot of money. Choose someone else.

For the first several months the app worked great! I love it and I was able to save a lot of money. After a while though the app kept disconnecting from my bank account. After contacting acorns customer service several times we have no resolution. So every couple days I have to go through the steps of reconnect my account which means the round ups are not transferring.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear about your experience and would like to look into this for you. Please contact our support team at: https://help.acorns.com/contact or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: Have been trying to make an account for two weeks and it doesn't work. I have deleted and reinstalled several times and I get the same message saying, "Something went wrong. Please try again in a few minutes." I can't give a good rate if all this app has done is frustrate me. UPDATE: Tried making an account with a different email several times and again nothing happens. I have called customer support and was on hold for 30 minutes before being hung up on TWICE. Just overall terrible experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we sincerely apologize for the issue that you're experiencing when signing up. We'd love to look into this for you. Please feel free to send us an email at support@acorns.com or give us a call at 855-739-2859 and we can further assist you!

scraped_reviews.content: All I wanted to do was invest my round up change into a short term savings account, but the app is extremely difficult to navigate. On top of that, they need your bank account information but don't even have some of my banks in their system so setting up my info isn't possible. Ads make it seem very easy and simple but it is quite the opposite. Very disappointed. I'll even let you keep the $3 I spent to open my account because you can sure use it more than I can. Wise up and fix the issues.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're very sorry to hear about your experience. While not all banks are supported for Round-Ups, you can still link almost any bank account as a primary checking account. Doing so allows you to make One-Time Investments and set up a Recurring Investment, which is another automatic investing feature we offer.

scraped_reviews.content: Maybe just me but they do not clearly describe that this is a paid subscription app. All the sudden a dollar was charged to my checking account for acorns subscription. Now that's not a lot and is very reasonable. However, this "subscription" fee was a complete surprise to me and honestly, if it would have been more clearly stated, I wouldn't have joined in the first place. Divulge this info much more clearly at sign up if you want me to change this from 1 star. Bold it and don't hide it.......

Been on here for a few years. Overall, it does a good job helping me save 'acorns' off each of my transactions, but the yield has been very insignificant in the longterms. (As low as 1.5% to as high as ~9% at very short periods). Better then a savings account I suppose. The app regularly forgets my info and I have to recertify frequently or else my round ups won't be automatic.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're in it for the long-term and encourage all of our customers to think long-term about their investments. The most important lesson we hope all investors remember is to stick with it and give any money lost in a moment the opportunity to recover and grow. Your Acorns portfolio is built and managed with long term investing in mind.

scraped_reviews.content: Great, besides two things. Now that this is a banking app, when I open my app, I do not want to see the splash of my investment accounts but I wanna see a splash of my spend account (available to spend), the other thing is I wish you didn't show me my *all time total gain/loss" I'd rather not see how much your services have cost me unless I really try to find it. Somewhere in the settings maybe. & real time round ups still don't work. Other than that keep it up!

I had the app for about a year, the last 5 weeks it's been telling me the server is down, so now that I need my money. I can't get to it. I'm basically counting it as a lost. I sent them a email complaining about them constantly locking my account. Then they responded and now I can't access anything. I definitely wouldn't risk losing my money in this app again. ( This was a problem based off what I was doing. A mistake. Now everything is perfect.)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we do apologize that you're having issues logging in. Please make sure that you are using the latest version of the app. We'd love to help you out with this! Please feel free to chat in from 9am-4pm PT, Mon-Fri, or send us an email at support@acorns.com and we'd love to further assist you!

scraped_reviews.content: Good at what it does. I would like to see the capability of doing multiple auto-invests, so, for example, if you are trying to save for retirement plus trying to save for something short term, you can have two separate "tracks" so to speak. Right now it is a set and forget type of investing, which is good, but would be cool to expand out a little more. Also, diversifying means going conservatice, which means lower interest and I don't believe you see dividends of stocks in your fund if any.

The idea is good, the investments have been good...the app itself is NOT good. Have had it for years and still can't figure out where the information is that I need. It's not designed for ease of use. Hard to tell how your investments are currently doing. The widget doesn't respond to being refreshed most of the time, so I have to log all the way in and search around just to see how it's doing for the day. The fingerprint login option only appears sometimes, so that adds to the login time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we sincerely apologize for your experience. We'd love to look into this. Please feel free to send us an email at support@acorns.com or give us a call at (855) 739-2859 and we'd love to help you out!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is orettyy great, I would recommend it to anyone else. The only problem here is the $1 a month fee they charge. After doing the math, unless you're making a ridiculous amount of purchases per month, they take your money that you've put into the account(more than you've made from them). The only way around this would be to do large lump sum deposits, therefor you have a better chance of getting more money per day from stocks increasing.

It's losing money on a conservative account, but the UI is also iffy. I can't really see how a deposit impacts the trends, because deposits are factored into the performance graph as if they were a market trend. Similarly, I can't easily tell when a fee was the cause of a drop in value, and projection graphs include deposits they expect me to make in the future, which doesn't really tell me what they'll do beyond a normal savings account unless I sit down and do the math, at which point I may as well invest properly myself. I was hoping to learn a bit more about stocks, however I'm not sure I trust this as a source of information anymore. It does have some positives, but usability and clarity are not among them where it counts.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we appreciate your feedback and would be happy to clear up discrepancies. To learn more about investing, Acorns created the Grow website to keep you up-to-date on investment trends. We publish useful info about investing, budgeting, and the market. Please visit https://grow.acorns.com to learn more or email us at support@acorns.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Acorns, both app and webpage prevents me from accessing its contents. After logging in, I am prevented from doing anything because of a signing disclosure requirement, which give me an error everytime I try to sign it. I have been in contact with support for a month, and they have continued to tell me to do the same thing again and again. "Log in and sign your disclosure" again, the reason for my support request is that the signing of it is bugged and gives me error.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are very sorry to hear about your experience and would like another opportunity to address your concerns. Please contact our support team at: https://help.acorns.com/contact or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: Logging in is a hassle. Every day I have to log in again, wait for an email, then finally I'm able to get into my account. Total garbage with this. My passwords are auto generated and impossible to remember unless they're saved elsewhere, which kills the security. Use the biometrics my device already has set up every day instead of only on the day I log in! Pulling all my money out again, I'll pursue other avenues to invest. And good luck closing your accounts in the app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear about your experience and would like to look into this for you. Please contact our support team at: https://help.acorns.com/contact or by phone at (855) 739-2859.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is only useful for those who actually HAVE money to throw around for investments, and not for anyone that's struggling to save money. The $3 monthly fee isn't worth paying for all of the hassle they put you through (i.e., waiting a whole week) when you want to withdraw your money back to your bank account. Will consider changing my rating when they repay the overdraft charge from my bank because of their auto-paid subscription fee (which they take whether or not you have the funds).

What kind of stock trading app doesn't let you pick your stocks? I could maybe see them having an auto pick option to make things easy, but there no way to keep your money from going to companies that you don't like, or companies whose stocks are actually failing. Even after you pause transfers, it still takes money from your account, it just takes it from only automatic withdrawals like a Spotify subscription. I guess they don't want you to notice, but I guess LEGALLY it's not stealing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, although you're not able to choose individual stocks, we do offer 5 portfolios that you can choose from. Acorns would never withdraw funds from your linked checking account unless the automatic features are turned on or a deposit is initiated. Please email us at support@acorns.com and we'd love to review your account.

scraped_reviews.content: Offers perks, but doesn't have simple features like transferring money from checking accounts directly to IRA accounts, nor does it provide a reason why the feature doesn't exist. Cancelling an incoming deposit is basically impossible as you put in your phone info, they say they'll call, and then they don't. Then if you transferred money to the wrong account it will get stuck transferring for 3 days in, and 3 days out, leaving you without that for almost a week.

Edit: I've left my previous review, which was 1 star, but wanted to update it. It took the developer only a few hours to respond to my review and once they gave me a phone number to call (that wasn't posted on the website) they resolved my issue within minutes and with no further issue. This app used to be good, but now I've been locked out of mobile and they don't respond to help me requests (I've sent three over 2 weeks). Don't waste your time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we sincerely apologize that you're having trouble logging in. We'd love to assist you as soon as possible! Please feel free to send us an email at https://help.acorns.com/ or give us a call at (855) 739-2859 and we'd love to help you out!

scraped_reviews.content: This app may be worth 5 stars if you could actually get customer service. I've tried to submit a missing found money credit on 3 separate occasions and from 2 different devices, one mobile, one PC. I can only speak for the found money form, but it almost seems like they disabled it as the mobile one doesnt even try to post. PC button didnt even work. So what's the point in an app if people that use it cant reach customer service? Update to 1 star. Still no found money months and months later.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We want to make sure that you are rewarded for successful Found Money purchases. If you have not received a reward, we connect with the Partner and work to gather all pertinent information as they are ultimately assessing the reward into your Acorns account. Please email support@acorns.com or give us a call at (855) 739-2859!

scraped_reviews.content: I Was an early adopter when this first came out, and it was great back then. Unfortunately it scarcely resembles What it once was. Customer service is impossible to reach, bank link keeps getting unlinked, and verification docs for the spend account get ignored resulting in them closing your account without warning. This app is nothing more than a joke now....and a bad one at that. 2 years later and nothing has changed. Their improvements haven't improved anything.

Its a great idea for an app an definitely helps build some rudimentary knowledge of investing. However, the ETFs they invest in are notorious for underperforming the overal market. Not sure why they choose them for you but they do. Would be great if you were given some options to choose from since it is your money and your "retirement" account. Also, the calculations for total loss/gain is always off since you're continuously adding money via round ups and they calculate that as a markey gain.

The worst thing I've possibly ever done was open an account on here. Having an account where your money is racking up till later is great in concept. ALL of that falls short when you schedule your money to be taken on a specific time and they decide to extract it on any & every date EXCEPT the one you scheduled for! And don't get me started on "Later" where you'll never see your money until you reach a ridiculous amount (assuming you don't have the income for it). Good concept, TERRIBLE practice

This platform does not provide you with much of a choice in what accounts you can sign up for, does not provide you with all options upon sign up, just gives you whatever is recommended for you. Application asks for password too often even when biometrics is enabled, I understand they believe in security, but man it is annoying. Better platforms out there if you want to learn and have more choice.

title: Squad Alpha - Action Shooting
description: ðŸ’£ Squad Alpha â€“ are you up to the challenge? Looking for an engaging casual shooter thatâ€™s easy to get the hang of but offers engrossing action ðŸª–and real tactical challenges? Squad Alpha is a top-down shooting game with intelligent mechanics, loads of cool upgradeable guns, and addictive gameplay thatâ€™ll have your trigger finger itching and tickle your strategic brain. Duck, dodge, run and take cover, then pick off multiple targets to complete endless levels of thrilling action and get awesome rewards ðŸŽ–ï¸ so you can upgrade your gear and prove your agents worthy of the elite Squad Alpha! ðŸ”¥ The alpha and omega of mobile shooters ðŸ”¥ â˜… Think before you shoot â€“ Squad Alpha is a blast and a half, with intuitive top-down gameplay thatâ€™s easy to get into. But you canâ€™t just go out with all guns blazing. The clever mechanics and carefully designed levels mean youâ€™ll need to pause your trigger finger, plan your moves and play the angles to take out all your enemies and reach the end of the progressively more challenging levels. â˜… The action never ends â€“ over 200 unique levels, each requiring its own tactical approach and ever more ingenious strategy to master, as well as nearly 20 different bosses providing extra challenges and awesome rewards for your ðŸ•µï¸â€â™‚ï¸ elite agents. â˜… Get the squad back together â€“ progress through the game to gather all the elite agents of Squad Alpha, each with their own unique style, skills, and 4 different skins to collect and wear. â˜… Bullet points â€“ over 30 different guns to collect, cherish and upgrade, including pistols, shotguns, SMGs, and much more. Earn cash in levels and reach game benchmarks to build up your arsenal and find the gun that suits your shooting style, then fine-tune it in the workshop to create a truly awesome weapon that will strike fear into the heart of your foes. And thatâ€™s not to mention grenadesâ€¦ â˜… Banging sounds â€“ Squad Alpha boasts simple but stylish graphics that are light enough to play on any device while also looking sleek and cool, as well as a fantastic and atmospheric soundtrack to enhance the action and adventure. Guns, grenades, and gumptionâ€¦ ðŸ’¡ Plan your moves and let the bullets fly in this edge-of-your-seat action game thatâ€™s fun to play for 5 minutes or hours on end. Looking for a new take on a top-down shooter that combines tactical challenges with really engaging gameplay, stylish looks, and super-cool sounds, and a huge amount of collectible to ensure thereâ€™s always something new thatâ€™ll keep you coming back for more and more fast-paced shooter action? Download Squad Alpha now for thrills, adventure, and guaranteed trigger happiness. Privacy Policy:Â https://say.games/privacy-policy Terms of Use:Â https://say.games/terms-of-use

summary: The top-down shooter game with intelligent mechanics and engrossing action!

scraped_reviews.content: The game is pretty fun and the grind is addicting. I have not spent a single penny and the progression still feels great, but it does slow down a bit when you get into the super high levels as you need lots of materials to upgrade stuff. All ads are optional which is always great, and there is a decent amount of stuff to do each day. The only really problem that exists is the super unbalanced enemy modifiers that make the game super unfun sometimes.

Really fun, not hard at all to rank up and get better weapons, in fact, I'm 3x ahead of the enemies in power, so levels are almost always a breeze. No forced ads, people who say they have trouble leveling up aren't using every thing In the game. There are operations that will give you plenty of shards, weapons and money. My advice, find a loadout you're best at and stick with it. Change it only when needed. Great game you guys!

The chest mechanic ruins the game for me. You have to wait four to eight hours to open a bloody chest. And you can only open one at a time. Oh and you can only have three chests at once. Once you run out of room you either stop playing or pay up in premium money. And the normal chests flat out can't be opened without an ad or virtual money. They really need to patch this BS. Otherwise the game itself is simply amazing. With fast paced shooting and action.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, and thank you for your feedback! Ads help us make game development, maintenance, and updates free for all users. If you change your mind, we will be delighted to welcome you back!

scraped_reviews.content: I leave a lot of reviews and they're usually bad lol. Finally a cool game without an insane pay wall. It's well balanced, freemium to the max which means you will have to watch a lot of ads to progress fast but you don't have to, you can take your time, it's up to you entirely. I have to admit, as the pickiest mobile gamer on earth, this game is fun and very well done. Props to the devs because I very rarely give out a good review. Well done devs, well done. I'll spend $ due to that alone.

It's pretty fun for a while. It gets way too grindy and slow paced as you get far into the game. I purchased the month ad free offer for $5. When it expired, the game felt borderline unplayable, and the $15 a month they're asking after the initial offer is just too much. I did it once. So, 20 bucks, a game I played for about 2 months that toward the end became an unbearable chore rather than a fun game.

Great game, i can honestly say I'm impressed. Great physics, gameplay, power system. Haven't spent any money on weapons or anything, but I'm paying the monthly subscription to skip ALL ads. I never thought I'd spend money on any mobile game but it's worth it to me with this one. Having a lot of fun min-maxing my gear, although skill plays a big role in this game. Highly recommend!

At first, I wasn't so sure about the game. But, as I started playing through the toutorial, which was pretty short. (that being good) I got hooked, the game is a bird eye view shoot em' up. As you go through each level, it gets harder and harder, giving you a challenge. As you go through the game, you can upgrade your character's weapons, level up your character, and pretty soon unlock more characters, with different abilities. And, there's also loot crates.

Honestly? This game is awesome. No forced ads, you can easily get good gear for your character, character unlocking isn't a hassle, and gear upgrading is super easy. It's not like the ads, in a sense of choosing your starting health, but I also thought it was gonna be a game that the developers made to just be an ad grab, for money. I would highly recommend this game to anyone looking for an actually fun RPG that doesn't ramp up in difficulty like crazy!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Wow! Thank you for kind words and a detailed review! We truly appreciate it :)

scraped_reviews.content: Coming from the perspective of a 1000$/month gamer: The gameplay is good if you're spending to fuel it, but the value is terrible. The drop rates are ridiculously low, there is no mechanism to balance things if you have a run of bad rng on said drop rates so you can literally spend hundreds of dollars and get absolutely nothing for it and their customer service will do NOTHING to help you. I don't mind spending on games at all, but I do want to get something in return. SPENDERS BE WARNED!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! While we understand the frustration that you are feeling, drop rates are disclosed and and luck or RNG can't be helped indeed. Support only tackles real issues and bugs that are of developer's fault, but cannot help in cases where the game behaves normally.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm a paid VIP member on this game for at least 3 years. The more you progress, the more frustrated you become, unless you spend money. Like....LOTS of money. I have 5 million cash and 18,000 gems, but can't spend it to advance because I don't have the right components to actually upgrade anything. It becomes a very, very, VERY slow slog to get anywhere. Plus the way that rifts, etc. are designed, you're kind of stuck where you are, since everyone above you is advancing at the same pace.

I caved in to the ads and... It's honestly a great game to play. It's not an advertisement machine, it actually just makes them completely optional. It has a wide array of in-game features, modes, and play styles so it doesn't get too repetitive. I just wish clans had more incentives to socialize Otherwise, what are guys doing on a mobile store? This game has so much potential for a PC market and could give you guys so much more creative freedom! Still, congrats, and keep up the great work!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! Thank you so much for such a detailed and positive review :) We will keep evolving clans and other game modes, with some of the updates coming soon!

scraped_reviews.content: Its a decent game and that you can quickly get some fun out of while you wait in line or at an appointment... And I suggest that be the reason or moments you play the game because playing at home can be frustrating since there are only 3 slots for opening the chests that you receive at the end of every quickly beaten level (it takes longer to watch an ad). And each chest has to be opened one at a time at 2hrs per chest if you want to do it free and w/o costing any gems or run an ad.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your suggestions. We will recommend them to the related department.

scraped_reviews.content: I almost enjoyed the game. Controls aren't great but good enough. The grind for gems and gear is so long that when you finally get enough to use the gems, the rewards are all useless blue or green items. The grind is too long for the game to be as repetitive as it is, with prices as high as they are, and such expensive crafting demands. They put so many rewards behind ads you'd spend hours doing nothing. The in game offers and prices are ridiculous for what this game is.

Awesome game! Only thing I wish would change is the ability to collect tools to upgrade weapons from the actual chests you receive when completing a mission. To this day, I have not gotten a tool from any of the chests without the need to purchase in some way, whether it's with Diamonds or real $$$$. All I receive is scrap. Every chest that's open is pretty predictable now. Oh hey, more scrap ðŸ™„ Other than that, game is dope and a great time killer. Keep up the great work fam!

The actual game is amazing. It's one of the most fun games I've played on mobile. It takes 10 seconds to complete a round and you get a 2 hour chest. 3 slots. So in less than 1 minute you're full. Idk what idiot just copy pasted clash royale reward system but wow it needs work. I know you want people to watch ads to open them but c'mon. Supercell games don't have ads. You know why? They rely on they're gameplay to produce results. Don't just adopt a broken monetisation model. Be unique.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey! There are no forced ads in the game, and those that you are referring to are about chests, and can be skipped freely. We know the beginning of the game has a bit of a worse balance, but with increased complexity of game. bigger levels, other game modes, the need open common boxes decreases significantly.

scraped_reviews.content: Good visuals and decent gameplay. But it's too heavily ad centered. Each level gives your chest for loot and they give you 3 options to unlock them. (you only have 3 chest slots too). Wait 2 hours, watch an ad, or use their premium currency. Which is fine for fun little phone games I guess. But in the tutorial they give you a box with a 30sec timer on your chest. So it got my hopes up this game wouldn't be a 'play and wait' kind of system. I was wrong.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We are glad you enjoyed our gameplay. The issues you mention can be annoying, and we are currently testing some changes that would address what you describe. We hope you will enjoy it in the future :)

scraped_reviews.content: Some great gameplay concepts but I'm going to delete Squad Alpha. My three loot box slots are filled, with two chests that need 80-gems each and one on a 4-hour timer. These are resources that I've earned and should not be such a hassle to redeem. When the game is designed to bottleneck progress this much in order to "encourage" spending real money, I'm out. It's a shame.

The game was decent other than two things. The ads often suck. By that I mean, watch, click, wait, click, wait some more click. Just show the damn ad. But the reason I just Uninstalled and won't play again? I am not giving you permission to track my info for "personalized ads" (ie, sell my data) you do not need that. Suddenly wouldn't let me do anything until I clicked I accept. So, heck with the game and your company. And when you reply with bogus stuff, shut it. You do NOT need that. Bite me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are obliged by GDPR laws to ask for consent for any user of our user's data, and this prompt would be there even if the game had no ads. Apps developed under different jurisdictions may not ask consent and still use the data.

scraped_reviews.content: Edited review: Do not be fooled into thinking that this is an ad-pushing, low effort game. The gameplay is top-notch here, even if the progression is slow. Unlike many similar games, progression is very much skill based and you are able to win even when significantly underpowered if you have the skills. The game has huge potential going forward, but additional features to flesh it are needed.

This game is pretty well designed, in all honesty. Very archero like, good game play, simple controls, the loadout/weapon variety makes it fun to play. But the elephant in the room is the loot chests. You can open the basic ones by watching a video, but other than that you have to wait for them to open. This would fine if you could throw out old ones, but you have to throw away new ones. As a result, once you get to a boss, there's no point in playing unless you've got a free loot chest spot.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. The chest system is something we are trying yet to redesign or at least introduce some changes to it - we do hear you, please give us time to improve it. For time being, please be aware that while the chests do help to progress, they are not mandatory, and can be also farmed through the hunt and tickets.

scraped_reviews.content: DO NOT RECOMMEND! The game has stopped dropping useful equipment, and I can not progress. After a week of losing almost every round I play, I'm done. Is this the part where I am "encouraged" to buy something? The game was fun until this absolute failure. P.S. - Tips & Tricks?! I need equipment that keeps up with increasing levels! You got "Tips" for that?!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please join our community server on Discord and you will see many people wanting to help you along with developers themselves. We hope to see you there giving us another chance. Cheers!

scraped_reviews.content: Pretty good game, easy controls, smooth graphics. My big issue is the amount of ads that one must go through to do things like unlock crates, etc. Also, at a certain point the game becomes a money suck as your character will need a certain level to get through but the only way to get there is by spending $$$ in order to unlock special gear to get you up to that level. Still, its a fun little time killer, not too tough and engaging enough to keep everything interesting.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you so much for your detailed feedback. We feel that we did our best to keep ads to a minimum for a free game, but of course, certain things require them for a time skip. It's always hard to balance such things in a mobile game, but we appreciate your level-headed review and will pass it on to our developers.

scraped_reviews.content: Definitely an interesting concept and different (in a really good way) to typical shooter games. Wasn't expecting it to be played in vertical screen mode, but like I said different in a good way. Super simple controls but still requires a certain skill to master. Like the loot aspect a lot. Ads aren't too intrusive. Hope there will be events in this game and needs multiplayer with different modes badly. Need a way to add friends/chat too. Great job on a very unique shooter!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for the awesome review, it really means a lot to us!

scraped_reviews.content: You guys are doing a poor job supporting an enjoyable game. The lack of new levels on story and hunt is very disappointing. The players who have reached there have probably spent the most on the game and you are leaving them without any new levels. And the difficulty in getting exceptional parts for upgrades also needs to be addressed. The game is enjoyable and plays well

It's a really well-designed game, but you get to a point where progression just grinds to a halt. The game is EXTREMELY stingy with items required for upgrades, and crafting those items using available resources is VERY costly. It's honestly fun at first, but it becomes too much of a grind to be worth it. Oh, and the $15/month subscription fee to skip ads is an absolute joke.

All in all an excellent entry into the genre. Gameplay is varied enough to keep from being repetitive, weapons all feel different from each other, and the playable characters each feel unique. Only issues are occasionally when using the elevator to start the next room, I fall through it creating a softlock. Also getting 4 or 5 star weapons is at best a 2.4% chance. I've completed the whole game, all hunt missions available (Gorilla 10), and all expeditions and operations. 9/10

My previous review was strangely deleted so here's a new, updated one. The ad was a lie, you do not run around with a large group of allies shooting enemies. You unlock them one by one & can only be one at a time. That being said, the game play is fun & engaging. It would be a good time waster if not for WAAAAY TOO MANY ADS. Literally, there's an ad for every thing. I'm a patient person. I played the game for a month but it got too much for me. Every single thing has an ad attached to it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for pointing out these elements. We will pay attention to their adjustment. Very happy to hear that you like our game!

scraped_reviews.content: I play this game quite often. This new update leaves nothing to do with improved weapons besides take up space in our inventories. Like are you implementing to get rid of those items? Or did you just drop the ball? Other than that, this game is amazing. With patience and perseverance, you can master the game entirely. P2W is VERY heavy but enough patience wills out. Ad free is like $1.99 the first time. Make sure you want to play, then buy the month or year, otherwise its $5.99 a week.

This game is fun, love the graphics, enjoy the levels....but there's a point in the game where it gets so hard...mediocre weapons don't even work anymore. I'm assuming it's because the creators of the game want to encourage their users to buy stuff to get through the levels. I'm not wasting money on games...deleting. it was fun while it lasted.

Money hungry devs. Earning things takes days, and the price for things both in game currency and real money are outrageous. After a couple weeks and free to play, I have 2 blue weapons. Gray/green weapons can be earned through gameplay, higher through crates priced at 100 'bullets'. Scrap a weapon for 1 'bullet' and use 100 of them for a single weapon, green or better with green being priority. Supply crates are opened with gems that are rare, earned 1 or 2 at a time, not even guaranteed.

I absolutely love this game. The concept is beautiful. It's like a better version of Archero in my opinion. I have so many requests for added content though. I would love to see something added to the game that brings the people together. Like a clan but you could call it something along the lines of an Agency. That's the biggest thing I'd like to see. Once you have that you could (possibly) make a mode you can play alongside people in. In the meantime I'd just like some kind of social systemðŸ‘

Devs: thanks for your response, I hope you look into these oddities. Love the game. Old review: Enemies shots can go through walls if they are next to the wall. Gems from bonus spins or ads do not always accumulate into your total and disappear, there is a delay but sometimes you never get them. Clearing wave attack and hitting continue does not advance the wave, forcing you to play the same level. There are improvements that can be made on these simple aspects.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for sharing your opinion! Our game remains free thanks to ads, which allow us to continue developing, maintaining, and updating the game. We hope you understand and come back soon!

scraped_reviews.content: There's an in-game currency that, like most cellphone games, you can either purchase or earn by playing. In the in-game store, there's a section for daily deals where you spend your in-game currency just to reveal "deals" for spending your hard earned money on. Oh, and it's disguised as a "free daily" BS. I'm 10 minutes into this game and it's abundantly clear the devs spent more time monetizing this game than they did on the game itself. I guarantee it'll only get worse as the levels climb.

I loved playing this game, but eventually my progress slowed because a lack of powerful weapons. So, I finally spent the gems and got the featured weapon, awesome cool. It was great, but just not quite enough, so I spent cash to get more gems, and get another featured weapon. But, to my surprise I didn't get the weapon as expected. So I researched and realized that there was a very small chance of getting the featured weapon, 4% apparently. How disappointing. I will not waste my money again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We understand the frustration, but the chest works just like all the other chests in game with drop chances displayed before every opening or paying for anything. Featured weapon simply have a higher chance of being dropped.

scraped_reviews.content: This game is super fun. I'm enjoying it very much. My biggest problem with the game is the loot/rewards. It's almost pointless to try for any gear past Blue tier. And the loot is so bad, I get better gear from regular chests than gold and purple, which is totally backwards. It really doesn't make much sense and I hope it gets polished out.

This game was good... a little too good. I spent hours on this crack you call a game, and when I found myself dropping money on it for a couple of days, I had to delete it. I only managed to unlock 2 agents, and could tell it would have taken WAY LONGER than I would have cared to for unlocking the other 2. That, and I also hit a massive pay wall. I leveled up like crazy to a certain point, but was forced to a screeching halt, and pay big $$$ to advance further.

Is a good idea and great game on the surface. The issue is with the loot chests and 5 star weapons. There is no way to garuntee getting one. Also, they have there special offers, that are expensive and often give you a random upgrade. Never the one you need, plus if you farm like I have it seems to me there should be a way to use the 3 star weapon to upgrade to a four star or something. It's a good game, but sadly requires alot of money for good gear with no garuntee of getting what you need.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for sharing your thoughts on the game experience. We will consider making changes to the rare weapon drop chance and discuss the possible craft of a rare 5 stars weapon.

scraped_reviews.content: Love the game but it's really getting old. I have a lvl 6 clan and finally got my first 50/50 weapon but dang thr grind is something else. It's really slowed down to a soul crushing crawl. I'd like to see the blue and yellow parts as well as wrenches drop more often. With that being said I spend money on this game but again dang yall are proud, some of the prices you guys are asking are outrageous. The game is good but not that good. Please bring down the p2p prices. I'm close to quitting.

Good game, but it's very much time-consuming to upgrade your items. At time makes you feel as if it's a pay to win type of game. Also, the ads on here aren't as bad. Never have i had an ad pop-up without me allowing it. There's great potential here, and i hope the developers are coming up with a newer way to entertain the players because so far, it is like im playing the same levels over and over again only difference is they get harder as i go.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for your review concerning our game. We will do our best with new updates.

scraped_reviews.content: Despite smooth gameplay and decent potential, this game is just another blatant cash grab. Even basic loot chests can't be opened immediately without viewing an ad or two, which, 9 times out of 10, is for Mistplay. Loot drops in-game are ultra low-quality and minimal at best, as is cash and other items necessary for equipment and character upgrades. And as far as the game's premium currency goes, you won't find less bang for your buck. Incredibly disappointing, because it could be a great game.

Honestly really fun game, but you already know what the problem is, and that is it is a "pay to win" game, and oh boy $100 content for a mobile game? If rather eat my shoes thanks. Once your weapons are level 10, which takes about 1 hour, you will find that the only way to get stronger weapons and therefore be able to do the next level is through paying for in game upgrades with real money. Damn shame to be honest because it's a solid little game. Greed is one hell of a drug.

This game is definitely not friendly to F2P players. I've had fun playing this game. It's designed well and has some cool physics. The problem is the cost of pay-to-play. $15 a month for their VIP level to not watch adds is VERY expensive. If you skip watching the adds, the bonuses plummet and it will take you the next year to level up. The cost of chests, gems, items, etc. is also extremely expensive.

I really like a lot of things in this game, but the amount of in game cash that everything costs is WAY off balance with how much you make. It can be days of not being able to progress, followed by a minor upgrade and more days. You could spend some actual cash, which I dont have a problem with, but the prices of everything are just ludicrous. Charge less and sell more and please balance the in game income.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,
We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

scraped_reviews.content: Very fun game and challenging. The balance is decent, though some of the bosses have a mix of abilities that are borderline unfair. Lower rating because the 4 star weapon random loot in Operations is basically a 0% drop. I've been given the them as a possibility multiple times. Never once has it landed on it. Their drop rates need to be increased. Also takes a long time to get the needed components to upgrade weapons.

Way more fun than it has any right to be. The art style may be simplistic, but only because the game is largely focused on mechanics, which are simple yet addictive. No pesky energy system to limit your gameplay, and even though opening chests takes time, I've had as many powerful weapons drop from elite mobs as I have gotten from chests. I have not spent any money and have still gotten hours of enjoyment out of this game, which is more than I can say for most f2p mobile games. Love it.

Excessive monetization. You get a chest after every level. A level only takes a few minutes, there are five per stage. It takes TWO hours to open a normal chest or you can watch an ad, and then watch an ad to boost the reward. That's two ads for every couple of minutes of play, or play at a glacial pace. You can buy a ads pass $15 a MONTH! It expires! This game is more expensive than Elden Ring! Then there are chests that don't have an ad that are 4 - 8 hrs or open with in game currency. Awful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the feedback. We want to highlight that the chests are not the only reward for a level, there is a drop from mobs which in some cases is much better. So there is no need to wait for a chest to open, simply run hunts and collect loot from enemies, thus you will get more resources for sure.

scraped_reviews.content: Was fun, some challenge escalating as you get higher and higher, but then... you hit a boss fight that is basically unbeatable with the weapon archetypes you've spent the game upgrading. Now you're stuck with a very slow grind cuz you didn't think you'd need a blue shotgun when you very much do. The "Skip-ad" mode is also WAY too expensive. $1 a DAY after your first purchase.

Edit: They've increased the drop rate of items and what not, but the price of in-game purchases are still a bit steep. Great job on the game and improvements! Love the game! Just wish some parts dropped more often. Gun loot is ok, but you get hung up on the rare parts when it comes to upgrades. Definitely needs to increase the drop rate of better guns. Purchases are rather steep too, but pretty fun game!

I really like this game. However, I do have some complaints. 1) You can't equip two of the same kind of weapon. Meaning if I have an upgraded shotgun, I can't equip the same type of shotgun if I have another one. 2) You can't combine weapons to upgrade. 3) The workshop is very difficult to upgrade I have more but I can't think of them rn

This is a great game AND you don't have to watch ads to progress, just if you want added rewards which are random. Easy to play but there's still you can do if you have the skill, even if you have weaker guns. It's very fun with a lot of variation with how you can accomplish the missions. I recommend this game to friends and family. Shotguns are kind of broken but a good handgun really makes the difference.

scraped_reviews.content: Our first trip was very good, and the booking went smooth. However, when I'm trying to use my 'referral code' in my friends' devices, it's just not working, showing 'something seems to be wrong'. I tried to use the 'chat with us' in the app, but the 'Help' section is not even opening, showing some webpage error. Please fix it soon.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your feedback. Weâ€™re sorry to hear about your experience and want to make it right. Please share more details at https://bit.ly/3YdD8hy so we can resolve the issue quickly.

scraped_reviews.content: Worst Customer Support â€” Issue Pending for 20 Days I reported an issue to RedBus nearly 20 days ago, and it is still stuck in â€œin progressâ€ status with no updates or follow-ups. The customer support is extremely unresponsive and unhelpful. My experience with both RedBus and SMS Travels has been the worst Iâ€™ve ever had. I strongly recommend avoiding them if you want reliable service and timely support.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your feedback. Weâ€™re sorry to hear about your experience and want to make it right. Please share more details at https://bit.ly/3YdD8hy so we can resolve the issue quickly.

scraped_reviews.content: Unfair â€œChange Bus/Dateâ€ Policy â€“ Feels Like a Scam I booked tickets for 3 members worth â‚¹7,500 a few days ago. Later, I wanted to change the travel date. At that time, RedBus showed that if I cancelled, I would get a â‚¹5,500 refund. The same bus on the new date was costing only â‚¹3,250. But when I used the â€œChange Dateâ€ option, RedBus charged me â‚¹6,350 â€” and said if the new ticket costs more, I have to pay extra. However, when the new ticket cost less, they didnâ€™t refund the difference. Basical

Please let us know what went wrong by contacting us at https://bit.ly/3YdD8hy. Your feedback is invaluable to us, and we are committed to doing everything possible to address the issue and enhance your experience.

scraped_reviews.content: The apps is the worst. The bus operator calls and tells me that the bus is cancelled. The app does not reflect the same. I still see the booking is active. Why do I need to sign in again and again to use the Chat feature and wallet, after I have already logged into the app. I get an error saying OTP cannot be sent. The wallet does not work. I keep getting an error saying the Mobile number is already in use. If I am able to put in the OTP, then it should just log me in.

scraped_reviews.content: RedBus is cheating people through their RedBus Assurance policy. According to the policy, they said that if the bus is cancelled, they will refund 3 times the amount. This means the extra amount (â‚¹500) should be credited back to the wallet. But they did not refund it. Instead, they mentioned that I cancelled the ticket myself, which is not true. Because of this, they are refusing to refund the amount. Very disappoint

When I requested a refund, they deducted some amount and refunded less, even though it wasnâ€™t my mistake. This is unfair and disappointing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your feedback. Weâ€™re sorry to hear about your experience and want to make it right. Please share more details at https://bit.ly/3YdD8hy so we can resolve the issue quickly.

scraped_reviews.content: nice app but no check-in integration with bus stations. Have to manipulate data with EasyBook App that is the check-in App for Malaysia bus terminal at Hentian Duta. Presumably the same applies for all other terminals with bar code scanning check in. I suppose this is just a booking app and rely on the service of the bus operators. As an app: great, user friendly, easy to use intuitive BUT integration with check-in?BIG PROBLEM. Need to grease some Govt and political palms to get it integrated.

After updating, it deleted all the personal information and cannot enter the mobile number any more in the personal information, I cannot even select the country in the related options. Additionally, the help kept ask me to login again and again even I already login. My passengers information also all gone. I needed to entered again.

scraped_reviews.content: I booked a bus from Somnath to Dwarka through the RedBus app. At the time of booking, the bus shown to me was different â€” it cost â‚¹600 per person. But after booking, they changed the bus The new bus they provided had a lower fare â€” â‚¹550 per person â€” but I was still charged â‚¹600. They overcharged me and gave me a poor-quality bus instead of the one I booked. There were no blankets, and the cabinâ€™s sliding door wasnâ€™t closing properly. It was a very bad experience with this app.

scraped_reviews.content: The bus tracking interface is extremely poor. It feels outdated, inaccurate, and unreliable. Rapido and Ola show how real-time tracking should work â€” smooth, fast, and precise. This system is cheap in comparison, with slow updates, map glitches, and no clear ETA. It urgently needs a complete redesign with proper live tracking, better GPS accuracy, and a cleaner UI.

They have capped the amount of cash back we can apply to 50 INR, even if we have more. This prompted me with looking for alternatives and found that my trip and others are much cheaper with its credit card offers and all than redbus. Guess their greed made one loyal customer drive away to other platforms.

I'm putting the otp within 20sec and in their SMS it shows it is valid till 15mins. I'm very fed-up with this.

title: Blood Strike - FPS for all
description:
The first launch of Peak Mode will be on December 5th!
ã€Peakã€‘
The Peak Mode will make a stunning debut in the middle of the season! Compete against other top-tier Strikers for rankings and earn the ultimate Glory as proof!
ã€New Weaponã€‘
S868 Shotgun
Classic and practical double-barrel shotgun! Perfect for combat in tight spaces, compatible with various special ammunition types such as "Razor Rounds" and "Slug Rounds."

Blood Strike is a battle royale game available on multiple platforms. With its fast-paced matches, smooth optimization and characters with distinctive abilities, the game has won the hearts of nearly 100 million players globally. 

Join the players worldwide in redefining tactical combat NOW!

ã€Well optimized, Any Deviceã€‘
Silky controls meet HD visuals! Master mobile-native moves like recoil control and slide-shoot combos. Feel next-gen precision on any device â€“ victory flows through your fingertips! Your skills, not specs, define victory.

ã€No fixed roles, Every Player is the Carryã€‘
Build your dream squad! Switch between more than 15 Strikers, customize 30+ weapon and remix them (Dual UZI? Yes!). Squad up and rewrite battle royale rules!

ã€4 CORE MODES, INFINITE THRILLSã€‘
Enjoy our thrilled Battle Royale, Squad Fight, Hot Zone or Weapon Master modes and limited time ones. Infinite respawn until the last minutes. No camping, just heart-pounding gunfights. Your highlight reel starts NOW!

Download now and drop into the arena!

*Collaboration is only visible in certain regions

title: DC UNIVERSE INFINITE
description:
DC UNIVERSE INFINITE is a fan-first, premium digital comic subscription service featuring a colossal library of DC comics!

Fans can dive in to over 27,000 comic books and graphic novels from DC, Vertigo, DC Black Label, and Milestone Media with our enhanced digital comic reader.

Follow your favorite heroes like Wonder Woman, Batman, Superman and Aquaman through curated collections and key storylines like Flashpoint and Dark Nights: Metal. Save collections, favorites and custom lists in our MyDC library and download issues for unlimited offline reading.

Join with a 7-day free trial. Free trial applies to the DC Universe Infinite ("DCUI") Monthly, Annual, or Ultra subscription plan, as selected by you. Free trial offer may be redeemed only once per person and cannot be combined with any other promotional or free trial offer for DCUI. After the free trial period ends, your free trial will convert into a paid subscription at the then-current rate, plus applicable taxes, unless you cancel before the conversion, and your subscription will automatically renew at the then-current rate plus applicable taxes on a recurring basis, unless you cancel before the renewal. Renewal charges will be applied to the payment method associated with your account, and you hereby authorize DC Comics or its designee to make such charge. Subscription fees are non-refundable. To cancel or prevent the automatic renewal of your subscription, log in to your DCUI account, go to Settings and click "Cancel Subscription" under the Subscription tab. If you cancel before the conversion or renewal you will still have access to your plan for the remainder of your free trial period or then-current billing period, as applicable. By clicking the "Start Free Trial Now" button, you agree to these terms and accept the Terms of Use: https://www.dcuniverseinfinite.com/terms.

Valid Ultra Annual paid subscription is required for the free collectible comic. Offer not available during the free trial period. Limit 1 collectible comic per account. Comic selected by DC. Content may vary. Expect your collectible comic 10-12 weeks after your mailing address is provided.

DC UNIVERSE INFINITE is not intended for children and is not available in all countries.

By downloading the app, you agree to the DC UNIVERSE INFINITE Terms of Use and Privacy Policy (New).
