scraped_reviews.content: I used to collect omnis, but realized I can save money and read more by using the app. Overall, I am very happy with it. Unfortunately, there are times when pages won't load images at all and the app marks some stuff read (that I haven't even opened), and issues I have read don't get marked as read. One minor thing I wish we could do was remove issues from the continue to read list.

The comic books themselves and the comic book reader are great. I love the stories and being able to glide from panel to panel. That said, the overall application interface and features are lacking. Especially, at the annual price point, which is higher than Marvels by a lot. At bare minimum you should be able to remove "Dive Back Into" comics from your list. Additionally, it displays reading progress on comics I have never opened, which is a bug. Copy Marvel's superior app! This isn't hard.

I've enjoyed the selection of comics I get, but they need to make some series improvements to the Android app. Long loading times, frequent crashes, a bug where comics I've never read are marked as in-progress or completed, and a lot of the time entire pages will be blacked out entirely on comics I'm reading! I've encountered this last error on multiple series, but on one issue, there were about five entire pages missing from the 23-page issue! It's honestly just super annoying.

Worked pretty good for me the little I used it. Ended up canceling my subscription since there is so little content, majority of the video content I already own on dvd. Extremely limited comic content was disappointing. Had high hopes, but has fallen short in my opinion. May subscribe again in the future if it gets better and is still in existence.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback, and apologize for the inconvenience! Our goal is to bring you an ever-expanding selection of DC titles; therefore, new content will be added in the future. We hope to see you back, and if you have any questions or suggestions, please reach out to us at support@dcuniverse.com!

scraped_reviews.content: I was super excited for this app as I love DC. After having it for a month, I found out how bare bones it is. The movie selection and tv shows are very limited and you burn through the selection very quickly. The comic selection is also lacking. If it's a monthly subscription I would hope I could read new comics that come out, but they dont add hardly any of them. Comics, TV shows and movies are rotated out which doesn't make any sense to me since it's their media on their app with their brand. I'd say to wait until they've added more.

I do love the content and have been quite entertained. So it gets high marks there. It's easy to find what I want and browse around. There are a couple things it needs. First, on my tablet (Galaxy Tab S3), it forces landscape mode to browse menus. Which is quite annoying. Once I'm into the book or show, I can flip orientation and it's fine. But I have to browse the menus in landscape. I would far prefer using portrait mode here. It would be SUPER awesome to be able to download multiple entries in a series at once, rather than one at a time. For example, I'm reading The Long Halloween, and I like to read offline quite a bit. I would love to be able to just download the whole series, or maybe check off a few at a time and download them all at once. Other than that, I'm very much enjoying DCU!

Like the service, but playback of what is available, is choppy at best. Video freezes randomly and it isn't my connection. I pause and try to come back and either the movie won't start playing or I have to start from the beginning. And there is no resume from where you left off if you have to turn it off and start again later. New update is no better. The loading buffering is intolerable. What did I pay in advance for? I expected growing pains, but this is horrible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So sorry for the trouble you experienced in DC Universe. We hope that you will stick with us as we work towards making the experience better. Drop a note to support@dcuniverse.com and include your device details so we can help solve your issue! - The DC Universe Support Team

scraped_reviews.content: I was really looking forward to this service. My only complaint right now is accessibility. I can only use it on my phone. I want to be able to watch on my TV through either xbox, playstation or the Amazon fire TV stick/box. Also, the comic series are limited. Most stores only have 1 issue, I'd like to be able to read a whole series. When that is made available I would rate 5 stars.

2025 Update: the app keeps getting a little worse. Whenever I download a comic, the app freezes and crashes. Used to be able to download dozens of comics and carry on with the app. No issues whatsoever. Also, for years the "My DC" tab takes forever to load just so I can see my saved/bookmarked content. And one more thing while I'm here, the comic organization could be better. You have to start at Batman #1 and scroll hundreds of issues into the 2000s. Should have feature to sort by year/issues

I really want to like app, especially because it has good content in it and it has good features, such as downloads for offline viewing. However, the restrictions and bugs made me give up on my subscription. The restriction of finishing a video within 48 hours of starting it is ridiculous; I sometimes start an episode on Friday afternoon after work, and by Monday morning on the way to work, that offline download has already passed the 48-hour mark and is no longer available.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We really appreciate your taking the time to share your thoughts about the DC Universe. Drop a note to support@dcuniverse.com with any additional feedback so it can be reviewed for future updates! - The DC Universe Support Team

scraped_reviews.content: It looks really cool and it does have a lot of my favorite shows, movies, and comics. However almost everything needs a membership, which means that I cant watch what I downloaded this app to watch. I dont discriminate against memberships, its pretty sensible. But at least bring down the cost! I am not going to pay 74.something +Tax for cheap tv shows and movies i can get on the internet.

I do enjoy the app on my phone and the rating above is for that, but the fact that you make me pay through my Google account is not normal and I don't like that. The fact that it is only on mobile devices is laughable. I saw someone say the same and you asked what we would like it to be on. Everything. PS4, Xbox, Nintendo, Amazon, whatever. It is baffling I have to have a chromecast (luckily I had one) to play it on a TV. Going to cancel soon because of that. Not willing to pay so much for this

Not User Friendly. Reading a comic, and suddenly the screen is just gray. Can't reload comic to fix issue. Some titles the "next issue" isn't the actual next issue. Panel to panel reading sometimes skips actual story panels, or shows them out of order. Problem with gray screen still isn't fixed. 2/1/25: Gray screen issue has not been resolved. You have to uninstall app and reinstall it to fix. I have had to do this four times in as many days. Developers don't seem to care to fix it.

So far so good, I bought the year subscription. I will give it more stars when the library of movies and shows gets bigger. I am disappointed at the lack of animated movies, hopefully it increases over time and not the monthly fee. Comic selection is sparse but October we will see more. If they start adding stuff and then increasing the bill or extra pay I will prob cancel service after the year is up. Also I have it on Roku and there is no encyclopedia section like advertised, its only on the mobile app.

Terrible app. Crashes constantly, downloading comics for offline reading barely works half the time, and when you *can* get a download finished it doesn't actually work offline - defeating the whole point. Online is no better either. I'm constantly running into the "Oh dear! Something went wrong with this page" error message, sometimes leading me to just straight up not finish a comic because it won't reconnect to whatever server is hosting it. Unbelievably broken app, do NOT pay for a sub.

App is a massive failure. Service is nonexistent. Can't get any issue to load past page three. Downloading errors out 100% of the time. Haven't gotten anything from support. Super disappointed that the money I spent on the subscription gives me only access to the first pages of everything. Marvel app, on the other hand, works just fine. GET YOUR ACT TOGETHER!

App works well but the subscription tiers are unbearable. I cannot afford the upfront price for the Ultra level. But the Ulltra price equates to about 9.99/month, yet they don't offer it at a monthly price. That would make so much sense and be so much more accessible. Also 6 months is such a long time to wait for access to new releases on the current monthly level. I wish I could purchase individual issues at least.

Constant playback error. Videos will play for 10-30 seconds and then video freezes, while audio continues. This requires me to back out and start again. Movies are unwatchable due to this. With TV shows I can download the episode to watch but movies are not available for download. Once I finish Young Justice I will be canceling my subscription unless they fix the streaming.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Charlie - we're sorry to hear you've encountered issues streaming our content. We have a troubleshooting guide here: https://support.dcuniverse.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001951907 but if you still have trouble after checking it out, contact us at: support@dcuniverse.com and we can investigate further - DC Universe Support Team

scraped_reviews.content: decided to try this for the free Batman stuff today, and it will not stream to the chromecast, it starts to but then once you press play it just spins. I'm unsubscribing instantly, not worth it, and many others are complaining about it too. and if you're having trouble canceling just go through the play store to your subscriptions and cancel there, it worked perfectly from there.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Joe -  We're sorry for the bother you've encountered when casting. Please drop us a line at: support@dcuniverse.com and include your device details. We'll gladly investigate this further - DC Universe Support Team

scraped_reviews.content: When you find the comic you're looking for it's great. But that happens about 30% of the time. The search feature is terrible, if you type in the comic book number it won't come up, then you try the title won't find it but if you scroll through every comic written since 1940 there it is. At this point I'm not sure if some of the comics I searched for just aren't on the app or I didn't figure out the right combination of letters and numbers to get them to show up.If they fix the search I'll reup

This app is great, it has potential. However, sometimes it takes too long to load. I hate I have to download comics to read them. Also, the chromecast capability isnt always available. I test hulu and Netflix to make sure it's not my connection, and each time it shows up, just not for DC. It is very frustrating. Please make it stable.

I tried to like this app, I wanted to like this app. I used different devices, I tried watching with or without wifi incase it was my wifi's fault the videos kept lagging, I even downloaded episodes and it still lagged. I wish this would have worked out but i'm not going to pay money for something I can only watch for two minutes at a time before having the exit out and then click to watch again and again. Just not good at all.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry for the trouble you've experienced in DC Universe. We hope that you will stick with us as we work towards making the experience better. Drop a note to support@dcuniverse.com and include your device details so we can help solve your issue!

scraped_reviews.content: Really like the basis of this, but I have a few things that I'd love to see supported - Please allow us the option to cast the video to any TV because mine isn't supported. - Have a family option or something so I can give my siblings an account to stay under but they can view shows, movies, comics etc on their own profile, and so there can be parental control and ratings. - Every Episode, Comic, and Movie should have a synopsis. It's a lot to ask for but so worth it. - Add more comics!

Horrible trying to play this on the TV. Tried it with chromecast, apple TV, computers, xbox, playstation, and mirroring from my phone directly. Most of them didn't work and the ones that did were really poor quality. If you are going to have a price to stream you need to get better and allow people to stream to their TV. Overall not worth it right now. Still plenty of time to get it right but dont wait to long.

It would not allow me to search content. Whenever I tapped the search bar my keyboard would appear behind the suggestion pannel. When it said that we could have a download limit of 25 I did not realize it ment a total of 25 for the entire time I had the membership. In all it's going to make people buy the entire DC database after you already have the membership. I'm not 100% sure but I'm pretty sure that was what people wanted with the a app. Content, and not basic content. Most of the comics only have #1s. Meaning when I search for Red Hood there are literally 2 comic books. Over really disappointed in the app . I know that DC's gonna fix it. Just it wasn't on money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So sorry for the trouble you experienced in DC Universe. We hope that you will stick with us as we work towards making the experience better. Drop a note to support@dcuniverse.com and include your device details so we can help solve your issue! - The DC Universe Support Team

scraped_reviews.content: There's a lot of good content here as far as that it's great except for some reason all the Batman theatrical movies have been taken down. But the one huge negative is I can't cast to my TV from my phone or my tablet, both are newer Android devices and there is an option for it but it doesn't work. That's how I watch 85 percent of my content and it's a big strike that a streaming service that I pay for has broken casting.

Customer service is unresponsive! I have reached out to "customer support" on 2 different occasions. Videos I download at times do not play. When it refers you to support no guidance is there to assist with playback problems. Now I can't delete the comics that I have downloaded for convenient reading. This is unacceptable for a product that requires monthly/annual payments. Do better!

This app is very slow and very unstable. I find that once I get logged in that it could take another 5 mins to load. Search feature does not make sense on how to use it. I have typed in titles and have "no match found" but if i spend 20 minutes looking and looking you can usually find it word for word of your search. All in all i say do not get the app, just use the website instead. I hope they fix all the millions of bug this app has cause it sucks right now
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Trey - We're sorry to hear you're having trouble with our app! Kindly drop us a line to support@dcuniverse.com and include your device details and we'll be happy to investigate this further  - DC Universe Support Team

scraped_reviews.content: I have had a terrible experience with this streaming service. It does not have apps for Ps4 or xbox one and you cannot stream from web browser on either. Basically, you only can watch on your computer or phone until they figure this out (or hope to screen mirror from your phone or computer). The content on this app is awesome and the app is fine, but your viewing options are limited and maybe not worth the money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
DC Universe is currently available via:


    Online via desktop and mobile web
    iOS devices (iPhone, iPad)
    Android devices (mobile + tablet)
    Apple TV
    Android TV
    Roku
    Amazon Fire

 Drop a note to support@dcuniverse.com and include any devices you would like us to add DC Universe on!

scraped_reviews.content: The reason I bought into the app was the video content. Three months after I bought the one year subscription they changed it. I like reading the comics occasionally but I felt pretty bait and switched before the switch to infinite. If you like the comics, it's probably for you, I was more in it for the animated content and they suckered me out of 89 bucks for a year.

Loved it before, but it hasn't worked for me since January. It's absolutely terrible that I'm paying for something that doesn't function properly. The screen constantly blacks out and then boots me from the comic I'm reading or throws me off the app completely. Hopefully, they will fix it, and I can go back to reading comics again. Until then, I'm canceling the subscription.

First, the amount of movies and TV are the smallest selections on any streaming platform. They have 3 live action shows and 1 animated show. And then nothing but cancelled TV shows that are from the 80s, to late 90s. No Smallville or new DCEU movies. Then if you download anything you have only 48 hrs to watch it and you cannot redownload it again, until the next year. And when you do download something it will play for about 3min and then you will get a playback error. You can't redownload it.

it's pretty ridiculous and aggravating that every time I try and use the app it says "oops that didnt work" and "try again". I have been paying for this app for a month and have been able to go on maybe 5 times AND then it freezes even when I use it! If the thing worked I would give it a much higher rating because I love the content, but somebody owes me some air time or money!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there - we're sorry for the trouble you have encountered with our app. We'd be happy to look into this for you, so kindly reach out to us at: support@dcuniverse.com and include your device details - DC Universe Support Team

scraped_reviews.content: Disappointing at best, got this as a gift for christmas which is unfortunate because it would have taken more than 10 minutes of the free trials to figure out how crappy it is. first there is no integration with xbox or ps4 so I cant watch anything on my TV second the comic selection sucks and is very chaotic. Third unlike other comic book apps such as marvel or comicology you actually have to download each book which waste space and is clunky. All it does it let you watch Titans.

The content is great if you are a DC fan, unfortunately the price of the subscription is a bit intense. The comic viewer is a bit awkward. I think some functions are just better on the Android version, and others are better on the Xbox, when I wish both would be great. The new launch of "community" is awesome. DC daily is something I didn't know I needed. I'm definitely sticking around, I just wish I didn't have to cancel and resub every few months because I need promotions.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please drop a note to support@dcuniverse.com and include your device details so we can help solve your issue!

scraped_reviews.content: The service is great (when the video functionality works) with lots of reading and viewing options. My only complaints are 1.) I've had the service for just under two weeks and most of that time, videos are unavailable and there is no support for video playback issues, and 2.) I have not seen a casting button, so...yeah I can only watch on my phone/mobile device
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry for the trouble you've experienced while casting DC Universe. We'd like to help look into the issue with casting and playback--please drop a note to support@dcuniverse.com and include your device details, so that we can look into and work to resolve your issue!

scraped_reviews.content: I thought it was a really cool concept, but I was wrong. I signed up for the free trial, and canceled my subscription before the promotion was over with. At first I was able to stream the app from my phone to my Smart TV, and then the next the app didn't have the capability to stream from my phone to my television. Also watching shows would be a problem, it would stop whatever you were watching, with a pop-up stating that it's an error try again later, and the app would shut down. Not worth it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry for the trouble you've experienced in DC Universe. Please reach out to support@dcuniverse.com and include your device details so we can help solve your issue! - The DC Universe Support Team

scraped_reviews.content: I tried the 7 day free trial just to see what this app was about and mostly to see the member discounts and shop items. Very little items in the shop, and the prices are cheaper through Amazon on what items they did have in their shop. For example, The Joker Animated series expression pack, Its 56.00 on DC app but 45.00 on Amazon. I dont think this is worth 7.99 a month.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please know that we always appreciate constructive feedback, be it negative or positive, so you letting us know how you feel is very much appreciated.  Drop a note to support@dcuniverse.com and let us know any suggestions you have for improvement.

scraped_reviews.content: UPDATE: Only had it for a few hours. It crashes and does the LOADING thing way to much (not my connection because all other apps on tv and phone work great). UPDATE: I stuck with it and the same thing would happen ocassionaly. Went to try and cancel before my trial is over, of course I was unable to and was charged the next day. Was then able to cancel (after being charged) and I get a message stating that they will also be charging me for the month of May as well. HORRIBLE!!

(Real score:3.5) The app is great, but I would have appreciated an option to purchase more recent comics for an additional monthly premium or purchase individual comics. It seems a little redundant to have to download another app if you want to stay up to date. I also have experienced accessibility issues. The app will crash and won't run at all no matter times I restart it. I love DC, but if I can't reasonably use it, I will, regrettably, be forced to terminate my subscription.

the content is great, but the UI is terrible. i have all these great comic books available and its like the UI is working against my being able to read them. you will find yourself clicking, reclicking, bookmarking, then being unable to access bookmarked content. i believe in supporting the artists and writers, so this is my choice to pay for all these digital books, but ive had the app for a year and the UI will be why i am trying to read fast so i can cancel. hire a freaking designer!

I love this. Easily my favorite app out there. Most negative reviews are there is no app for PS4 etc. Get a Roku for $30 and you are set. ps4 etc need to create the app. They have the info and they aren't doing it. Get Roku period. They have 5 times the content. Never had a streaming issue either. Plays smooth and love it. Watch on TV, Phone, Tablet etc. Plus they just added a lot more comics

Major issues with the app. Videos rarely download and are virtually unwatchable if you attempt instead to stream via WiFi. not a connection issue; I've tested my speed and other streaming services stream fine without the constant crashes, buffering, or skips. The comic interface is unwieldy. Random issues from a series are often missing for no apparent reason. I've tried for over a month to get customer service to address the video download problem to no avail. other comments show I'm not alone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry for the trouble you've experienced in DC Universe and sincerely appreciate your detailed feedback. Drop a note to support@dcuniverse.com and include your device details so we can assist! - The DC Universe Support Team

scraped_reviews.content: Potential. Lots of potential. But is still very lacking. It does have a great selection of shows, and movies. But is very much lacking in the comics department, which is surprising given who this is. Wish they would at least have more issues for each of their eras, not just little teases. This is a great place for newcomers to start but the lack of actual books to read would send them to some pirate site where they have complete collections of what they want to read. I'm giving it a month and decided if it is worth it to keep around

don't sign up for the free trial, they rope you in but make it extremely difficult to cancel your subscription. after finally figuring out how to cancel the subscription I cancelled online And it said the subscription was cancelled and The premium benefits would expire at the end of the seven day trial. when the end of the seven-day trial came up I was still charged for a 1 year subscription. I would give the app 5 stars but until I get refund 1 start it is.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Tim - we're sorry to hear you've encountered an issue cancelling your account. Please reach out to us at: support@dcuniverse.com and we'd be happy to look into this for you - DC Universe Support Team

scraped_reviews.content: The app is great, and I love the content available, but there is one problem. The audio quality sounds watery, like the bitrate isn't high enough, or like there isn't enough streaming bandwidth, which is odd, considering it streams in HD no problem and looks amazing, yet for some reason the audio isn't like it is on other streaming services. It's a hit or a miss and only happens on some media, but not on others for whatever reason.

If you're not a die hard DC fan, don't bother. There's a very small selection of movies and shows, several bugs that I don't see any sign of being fixed, you don't get early access to new releases, and there's just problems that make the app awkward and inconvenient to use. Access to all the comics is kinda nice, but I much prefer real comics over virtual ones. Save your money and just buy comics normally.

Some really great content, but still with some issues. My biggest complaint right now is that when I try to read a comic panel by panel on my phone the resolution is terrible. It's not unreadable, but it's pretty distracting. Kindle and Google both look much better when zooming in to read comics. This is worth a higher rating if they fix that.

Love being able to read and download comics, and love that it's an unlimited amount. My main issue is that very frequently, I can't load anything. I'll click on a comic, but the app will just refuse to load it. Wish this issue would get fixed. It doesn't seem to be a connection issue, as it does this no matter what wifi I'm connected to

I love it for the comics that are there, but there are still some pretty glaring omissions ( primarily vertigo titles and large chunks of bronze age material). Just throw it all at me, especially the bronze and silver age stuff that I know you've got. The app also takes ridiculously long to load comics sometimes and downloads don't always work, but when it does it's a great service.

title: Musicolet Music Player
description: ------------------------------------ PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE INSTALLING 1. This app can organise and play only the local audio files which are stored on the internal storage or SD card. 2. This app can not stream/download/search new music online. ------------------------------------ File formats supported: mp3, m4a, wma, flac, opus, aac, alac, ape, dsf and many more... Features: âœ… Multiple Queues Separate queue for each folder, album, artist, playlist. Resume previous queues from their last position anytime. âœ… Efficient UI, Easy navigation For fast and easy navigation we placed all important components of the app (like Main player, Queues, Folders, Albums, Artists, Playlists) in just one row. So you can access them with just 1-Tap! âœ… Tag editor+: Can edit tags and album-arts of multiple songs at once. âœ… Move/Copy songs, Rename folders directly in app. âœ… Create Synchronized Lyrics. âœ… Save Bookmarks and Notes. âœ… Add/remove a song to >1 playlist, from notifications, widgets and even from lockscreen âœ… Folder browsing ðŸ“ 2-types of folder structures: 1) Linear (all folders at once) and 2) Hierarchical(folders within folders) âœ… Powerful EqualizerðŸŽšðŸŽšðŸŽš: Separate presets and settings for SpeakersðŸ”Š, HeadphonesðŸŽ§, Bluetooth etc. âœ… Gapless playback âœ… ðŸŽ§Earphone controlsðŸŽ§ Single click for pause/play. PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE INSTALLING
1. This app can organise and play only the local audio files which are stored on the internal storage or SD card.
2. This app can not stream/download/search new music online.
------------------------------------

File formats supported:
mp3, m4a, wma, flac, opus, aac, alac, ape, dsf and many more...


Features:


âœ… Multiple Queues
Separate queue for each folder, album, artist, playlist. Resume previous queues from their last position anytime.


âœ… Efficient UI, Easy navigation
For fast and easy navigation we placed all important components of the app (like Main player, Queues, Folders, Albums, Artists, Playlists) in just one row. So you can access them with just 1-Tap!


âœ… Tag editor+: Can edit tags and album-arts of multiple songs at once.


âœ… Move/Copy songs, Rename folders directly in app.


âœ… Create Synchronized Lyrics.


âœ… Save Bookmarks and Notes.


âœ… Add/remove a song to >1 playlist, from notifications, widgets and even from lockscreen


âœ… Folder browsing ðŸ“
2-types of folder structures: 1) Linear (all folders at once) and 2) Hierarchical(folders within folders)


âœ… Powerful EqualizerðŸŽšðŸŽšðŸŽš: Separate presets and settings for SpeakersðŸ”Š, HeadphonesðŸŽ§, Bluetooth etc.


âœ… Gapless playback


âœ… ðŸŽ§Earphone controlsðŸŽ§
Single click for pause/play. Double click for next and Triple click for previous song. On each press >=4 you can Fast-Forward the song.


âœ… Embedded Lyrics + LRC support
Supports offline lyrics embedded in audio file as ID3 tag. You can edit embedded lyrics from tag editor. Musicolet also support .lrc files for synced lyrics.

From your 'Android Auto' enabled car, you can control music and access your playlists, queues, folders and whole music library.

âœ… You can also enable Fast-Forward and rewind buttons in notifications from settings.


âœ… Light and dark themes


âœ… Backup and Restore
Automatic and Manual backups. Restore settings, playlists, play-counts from any backup anytime on any device.



And much more...

summary: Multiple Queues â€¢ Separate Equalizers â€¢ Create synchronized lyrics â€¢ And moreâ€¦

scraped_reviews.content: Freaking Incredible!! You can trim songs and create your playlist. also, this won't show up on your browser. it's total free, I'm just pissed I didn't find this app sooner. Because previously I was on spotify. Now I can download free music (not on this app though) on another app. I have over 5,567. I copy them on Google file as a backup. This is a game changer for any music lover

This is a great app. No streaming, no sales pitches, no ads, no data mining. It plays the music that I put on my phone which is the music I want and love. I created a playlist with over 1,900 tracks. I love that it keeps track of where I was on each playlist. The interface was very easy to learn. I have upgraded to premium because I want to support the developer.

Highly Recommend. Used for over five years. Purchased the Lifetime Pro License too. This personal music player is far and away the best one out there. The fact that it doesn't require access to the Internet to play your music means you can play YOUR music anywhere, anytime. Plus, it has superb library management tools that allow you to categorize your music in many, many ways and critically it will allow you to embed your album cover or single cover art and lyrics into your music files.

The one. After a grueling search and 30+ apps, I am happy to say that this one won with very little actual competition. Extremely powerful, customizable, but not bloated, and user-friendly. If I had to compare this to others I'd say that it has the flow and ease of use of Samsung music and other barebones built-in music players, while having the power of a full-blown desktop client akin to foobar2000, even exceeding it in some regards! Try it, spend 2 minutes in the settings, you'll love it!

Beautiful and simple app, which does exactly what it says - allows you to listen the music files you own without any interuptions. The one thing that would be nice is a better artist view. I would rather have artist name with the album covers in a grid than the long text list, but it works; remembering what artist you were viewing when last using the app would also make it more user friendly. Otherwise, amazing player that anyone wanting to listen to their offline music library should install.

I would give this five stars but I cannot find a way to customize font or the color of the font or change the play, rew/ff button appearance. For something lauded as "highly customizable" this seems somewhat comical when compared to other players such as Power Amp where you can find multiple "skins" and completely go nuts on font as well as font color. (admittedly, I might be missing something too) Aside from that, the player itself is great!

ALL AROUND GREAT APP! I use this app to listen to my downloaded music and I must say, the functions, accessibility and modularity of this application is unmatched. Change the tone, speed, equalizer, title, author, album, lyric editing, playlist building, etc, etc, etc any time you want. Amazing all throughout. Perfect for the music analysts. A feedback I have is I wish I could find out which songs have not been placed in a playlist.

User friendly, Easy to use. Great sound quality. I'll come back and edit when I find out if it really shuffles without repeating the same files. First impression is fantastic though. okay it's been five hours and I haven't heard the same song twice. This app is amazing. I wish they would sell the download so I could have this forever. Then I'd be like, just bury me with my phone playing music. haha I hope they never update it and keep it just like it is. You NEED this.

So far, it does exactly what I need it to do. It supports album artist sorting, it plays nice with how I tag songs, I'm satisfied. Nice work. Edit: it had a small bug where leaving my library on auto-sync would make me have to re-sync, my library would only be partially available. Turning the setting off fixed it. The UI is a little strange and unintuitive at times, but it's good enough. More apps should be completely offline and ad-free, good on the devs.

Perfect little music app! Crisp and clean with no unnecessary fluff. I can tell it which folders to scan (no more audiobooks or ringtones showing up in my music library!). I can import my MusicBee playlists from my PC. I can do a custom search and SHUFFLE THE SEARCH RESULTS. And it's a true shuffle, not just randomizing. I can have multiple queues at the same time and easily switch between them. Love it!

Best music app. You can change the name of files, songs, artist, and album so they can be alphabetically arranged however you want, which you can't do with other music apps. Downloaded music automatically goes into the downloaded file in the app. Can select many songs at once and put them in a playlist. Simple and easy, not super simple, but easy after figuring it out. If you exit out of the app and go back in it stays at the song you were scrolled at and won't scroll all the way back to top

This is the kind of music player I have been trying to find for literal decades! It shows artwork for individual tracks, unlike most players which go off the album or folder labels, causing unrelated songs to have the same thumbnail . This was a big one for me. it has a built-in tag editor, so I no longer need a separate program. It has the ability to sync lyrics as the song plays. Very easy to set up. It has everything I've been looking for in an MP3 player. It just works. And it's free!

Man I thought I already wrote a review. ive been looking for a good mp3 player app for 8 years, and i am stoked to have finally found it. Its got all the basics as well as some quality of life features, like the ability to trim a song or telling you the reason your music stopped playing in the background. Ability to edit the song info from inside the app without a dedicated tag editor. And little to no ads! Idk how they do it. Phenomenal app, fantastic work Musicolet team.

This has been one of my favorite apps for years (chef's kiss!). I've used it for so long I can't remember not having it. If someone were to ask me "how can it be improved?", I can't think of anything except for a feature which can simulate the sound of a tube amp. Excellent job on the reverb setting. It makes my cell phone single speaker sound closer to dual speakers when aim to away from me.

This is a great, deep, and serious app. It took me a couple of days to grok its fullness, but now I'm using it to reknit a library of 780 tracks that had been zipped and had somehow been wiped of all identifying data. This app lets you edit tags for all tracks in an album at the same time! I have one suggestion. There's the Lyrics text field, and you could enter personal notes there, but I am wondering whether a Notes tab that's top level and separate might be a good thing to add?

I have tried too many music players to count. Musicolet is by far the best. I've been using it for years now. every time I get a new phone I search for something better, but doesn't exist. The shuffle isn't perfect, but I haven't found better. No ads!! if I could add one thing it would be a floating/PIP widget, but that's being greedy.

Musicolet is the best. I love that it remembers EQ profile depending on what speaker/Bluetooth device the phone is connected to. I have just one album that inserts between-song gaps of silence in this app (but won't do that in other music apps), so not sure what's up with that, but can't fault them for that...maybe one day will get to look under the hood and see what's wrong!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please try this: Musicolet â€º Settings â€º Audio â€º enable "Gapless playback". Then check. If the problem persists, then : Musicolet â€º Settings â€º Audio â€º Decoder â€º set "System decoder". ðŸ™ðŸ™‚

scraped_reviews.content: I've tried many .mp3 player apps. This is, by far, the best free one out there. I've tried many of them, and many of the .mp3 apps are poorly programmed/written. They seem good at first, then "shuffle" quits working, or they play 4 or 5 songs and then go back to the beginning of the playlist and start playing the first 4 or 5 songs again. You then have to do a delete and re-install to get them working again. This Musicolet app works beautifully. No drama. Also, it shows album art.

Nobody does music players better! This amazing bit of software reminds of a hardware device. It never screws up. But as great software goes it has options, options, and they are not stupid & they actually work like they are supposed to. With all this will you go crazy learning to use it? I doubt it. You are not forced to use extras, but they are available if you should so desire. Now if only my phone Android OS could be this covenient and reliable ... Beautiful also. Maybe in the next life.

If you're an old schooler who puts audio files on your phone and has a large library to manage then this is the app to get. Its does everything you'd want it to do, doesn't have ads and is super stable. The interface is great and customizable. I use MusicBee to sync to my phone and they work great together. When I switched to Samsung from Apple I was worried about not having a iTunes equivalent music player but this is honestly better than iTunes.

If your music is stored on the device, that's the app for you. Plenty of options and settings, highly customizable, no ads, free. Edited 9/10/25: reduce rating to three stars because of album art issues. All my album arts are neatly stored in the album folder as "folder.jpg" filename. Nevertheless, Musicolet is not finding the art. Trying to point to the album art manually is impossible because Musicolet can't browse to the Music folder on Android.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the inconvenience. (1) "Scan all folders" option has limited access. This may cause such issues. Please go to: Musicolet â€º Settings â€º Song library and tags â€º "Folders to scan" â€º add your Music folder in that list. (2) Musicolet â€º Settings â€º Song library and tags â€º "Use folder.jpg, cover.jpg etc..." â€º set "Always". ðŸ™ðŸ™‚

scraped_reviews.content: This music player has EVERYTHING. Multi-selection, playlists, a file browser, playback tweaks and settings, lyrics support, the ability to backup all your playlists and settings, and the list just goes ON. The UI takes some time to learn since there's just so much to this app, but once you learn it and customize the interface to your liking, there quite literally is no better option for locally stored music.

I've used Musicolet for a few years and was happy with it until the update-after-update cycle that didn't really add any value but only detracted from a clean and useful app. Why "fix" stuff that works? Then it started to skip playlists, always jumping to the main list of all files at random in the middle of a song. No response from developer to support request from within the app. Found another off-line player, which took some time but finally uninstalled Musicolet. It was nice while it lasted.

I've used this music player ever since I discovered it some years ago. One of the best music players for android, and I definitely recommend it to anybody looking for an adless and offline music player with a bold and minimalist look. If there is one suggestion I want to add and ask would be regarding the separator function. Would it be possible if that feature can be extended to music titles and albums as well?

straight up might be the best free music app that doesn't have an ad plastered somewhere on your screen. Like it claims, it does the best in simplicity without taking away your options to personalize your albums (like choosing to have them displayed as a Grid or a List), plenty of ways to order your playlists, specify how you want to shuffle your songs, and its performance is crazy. It loads the songs with no issue for me and I have about 9,000 mp3 files

The music player itself is great and the UI is nice, it's also pretty easy to use and navigate. My one complaint is that the tag editor doesn't support file formats like webm, which is what nearly all my files are saved as. This means I can't change any album art, among other things. If the tag editor supported more file formats, I'd be completely satisfied. Everything else about this app is perfect though

I don't write reviews at all, but I felt the need to for THIS APP. I got Musicolet very recently, but as someone who got sick and tired of Spotify ads and their paywall and decided to start downloading audios, I. Am. OBSESSED!! This app offers all the things to play my audios that Spotify asked me to pay for (and more) FOR FREE!! Its simple to figure out and offers alot to tailor your listening experience. Thank you to the creator of this app!! (And please I beg don't add ads ðŸ™)

At last! I finally found an mp3 player app with skip forward and skip back buttons (though you need to go into Setting to have them always visible). And the skip times are customizable - I have mine set for +30 seconds, and -15 seconds. Since I only play music stored on my phone (most often via Bluetooth in my car, or through Android Auto), I don't have any need for a lot of features. I will probably listen to more podcasts now, as long as I can download them to my phone and I skip annoying ads.

I've been using this app for years and it's been perfect. My only complaint is that this year I started having problems with transferring files from my computer. About half the time the metadata only partially transfers. The track title will be the file name like "01. The Beatles - Come Together" instead of the title "Come Together," for example. Sometimes the artist & album artist are blank, and the track #, year and genre are always blank. EDIT the given solution worked perfectly. Thank you!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please try this: (1) Musicolet â€º menu â€º Settings â€º Song library and tags â€º Advanced â€º Preferred scanner â€º set 'Musicolet scanner'. (2) Then, Musicolet â€º menu â€º Scan â€º Advanced â€º "Reload metadata tags of all songs" â€º "Scan now". ðŸ™ðŸ™‚

scraped_reviews.content: Literally perfect. It's so intuitive, easy to use, let's you cut and adjust audio if a song has something you wanna change. Even lets you adjust speed and pitch. You can customize Playlists and it doesn't close when you lock your phone screen. It's easily the best phone app I've used in a literal decade. The only fault I could find is that because of the new P.O.S. Android updates, the Android system will sometimes kill the app while it's in the middle of playing music...ðŸ˜‘

Absolutely incredible app! Ad free apps are hard to come by, and its very easy to use! As someone who purchases mp3 music instead of being trapped in subscriptions, this app is a dream come true. I can store all my purchased music for various places all on this app, nice and organized. It can scan your device for any downloaded music you have already and neatly sort it all. 100% recommend this to anyone that wants to be in control of their own music and leave subscription based music services.

Cannot fault the app, used for a months, does exactly what you need it to do. Play music. I have a mixture of mp3 and FLAC, it works perfectly, audio is clear. needed a better music app which is easier to use on my aftermarket android head unit for my car (USB - external storage). App is customisable, so I only search by folders, I only have that tab across my toolbar. this is by far the best and easiest app. I also have it on my phone, as I have the odd song or two, links up to android auto

Probably the most feature-packed music player for free. Switch over from Omnia. I love adding my albums to the home page like "apps". I wish there was a widget that only showed the album cover Im playing, with overlayed controls. This way I can have the current albums artwork largely displayed over 4x4 app slots. Maybe one day! Thanks so much for working on this app, its great. ðŸ‘

Best player I have found!! Perfect for someone who likes to have an actual .MP3 collection instead of streaming. The only player I've found that the developer has figured out how to deal with my car sending an autoplay signal as soon as the car connects. I don't WANT my music player on my phone reacting to that EVERY time I start my car and this is the only app I've found that figured this out! NO ADS in the free version! Paid for Pro just to support the developer, I don't need the features..

Musicolet? Fuhgettaboutit!ðŸ¤Œ The best music player, period! So many customizable options, it's silly. Silly brilliant! Plus, I've never ever had it glitch, choke, crash, etc. and I've had it installed on 3 phones. Flawless performance and don't ask me about the equalization features. Check it out. I totally vouch for Musicolet.

Best music player app on the playstore. Zero ads, no BS going on while the app is playing. Of course the best app (this one) can be used 100% offline. Honestly this should be the default music app on all devices. I could not ask for a better made music player. The only issue I had is that I was not able to find it sooner!

The best music player on Android or iOS by far! Musicolet is so good that when I switched to an iPhone I carried around my old android just to be able to keep using this app. The playlist and queue creation and management tools are phenomenal and far ahead of any other app that I've tried. What's more, despite being far ahead of the competition, the developer keeps on adding awesome features and increasing their lead! If I could rate it 10/5 I would!

This app is very helpful for playing SOME of the music files on my Android tablet. It refuses to add audio files (not songs but book chapters) from the SD card in certain places. I cannot use the "Search" app to find the many files I transferred to my tablet's SD card. I don't understand why those files can't be put into playlsts, or appear with a size of "zero length" if they do show up I really wish there was documentation and instructions by the creators of the app.

Right now I am having a problem with keeping my app open in the background. I have enabled the proper permissions, I cannot lock recent apps on my current phone model, and no matter what I do the app won't stay open in the background- it always closes after so long, saying Android closed the app even though it's set not to. This review is to see if it's a phone model issue or an app issue, as I've also reinstalled multiple times. I love this app, and understand if it just isn't compatible!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the inconvenience. Please try this: Musicolet â€º Settings â€º Audio â€º Decoder â€º change the decoder. ðŸ™ðŸ™‚

scraped_reviews.content: So much easier to use, especially if you're trying to format a ridiculous number of audio files to how you like. -there a section thats just your files! -you can edit the tags of a few hundred tracks at time! massively helpful, even if it takes a minute to load. -you can edit album art (also for hundreds at once if you choose) -you can leave sections blank to not alter them, so you dont have to remmeber random details you're not changing. -simple to navigate, no ads even on free.

Great app! I ditched streaming after getting fed up with Spotify & went back to buying music (digital or CDs and ripping). This app has a few things up on Samsung music. But I do wish if you view by Album Artist, it would still include albums that ONLY have Artist info, esp when the artist info matches for the whole album. Also when viewing by Artist, showing an album cover by the artist to find them visually is helpful, as is art for playlists.

My only major complaint is that the Queue tab can't be removed. I find it redundant. Otherwise, the app contains 0 trackers and no Internet access, so it's a win for privacy. Really wish there was more widget sizes as I find it too small, but heavy customization is another win outside of these complaints.

It does more than I need and does it well. I just have one problem so far. I play music from an external USB stick, and the app doesn't understand when I dismount the USB and then mount it again. Then I have to swipe away the app and restart it for it to recognise the USB memory and scan it again. It's a bit annoying. I have Samsung Galaxy S22+ with Android 15.

Fantastic app, great interface and super snappy! It even lets you use the system decoder! Tag editing it great and very useful for library fixes on the fly. The queuing system is next level and very flexible. Have had some issues casting to TV but it may just be an issue on my device (JM21). Would be nice for the app to show track numbers next to track names in album view, but it does preserve track order and disc number order. Small thing, still 5 stars!! This app is essential for my DAP!!

Rewriting my review just to say, I love this music player for being the best for editing multiple songs tags, and organizing albums together, without duplicates. Payed for the splitting artists/genres feature, but this is still the best even on the free version, especially with the folder feature not being locked behind a paywall. Absolutely recommend this one ðŸ‘

The best music app for Android, no doubt about it. Every feature works exactly as it should and there's no nonsense between you and your music. Despite this app being focused on music, I find it works great for audio-books too! Only suggestion I'd have is an optional feature where when a track is paused and resumed, the track auto-rewinds up to 30 seconds earlier. Another audio-book app I use has this feature and it's very helpful in keeping track of the story.

I LOVE THIS APP SO MUCH! I had been using YouTube Music's pretty barebones device file player for a couple of years, and then one day, I decided to search for something that was better for playing MP3s. I found this app recommended in a couple of places, and I'm so glad I tried it out. It's exactly what I was looking for. It has a very good UI design, lots of customization, it can do a Spotify Wrapped style thing every month and at the end of every year, and a lot of other great little things.

best offline and online app ever. t To me Spotify sucks when I can download my own music to my phone and develop the photo art, edit tags, modify albums, and just jam the app anywhere!!! I love how advanced and creative the app is. I just gave it a try and played with it a little bit. Then i got serious about having my own personal music app. And fell in love with the digital versitility of this app. 5 stars for me!

This app is packed with useful features, has no ads, and plays local audio files with options to edit track artists, details, and album covers. You have complete control over what files the app can see. I use it to play .mp3 and .flac files, and it works wonderfully. Musicolet Media Player is a beautiful breath of fresh air disguised as an audio player. I canâ€™t recommend it enoughâ€”very versatile and intuitive in a simple package.

There are only a few hiccups I've had with file renaming after updating a folder (which could've been my fault honestly). Besides that, this app is great! I have a huge SD card to save songs on and this app is so perfect when it comes to listening to them like on a normal streaming service. No ads, built in equalizer, it's so useful. The "In-app purchase" isn't necessary unless you want to support the dev(s). I only wish there was a progress bar for the song I'm listening to in the notification.

description:
Ozon is the most famous and largest marketplace in Russia.
You can order everything you need on Ozon: electronics and household appliances, baby products and baby food, games, toys, stationery, books, clothes and shoes, home and garden goods, antiques, food, over-the-counter medicines, airline and train tickets and book hotels.

The Ozon app is profitable and convenient shopping on your smartphone, and also:
- we work 24/7, so you can shop at any time;
- tens of millions of products in the online catalog;
- interesting offers, discount coupons, additional discounts, promo codes, promotions and the best prices for regular customers;
- delivery throughout Russia and abroad.

If you want something fresh, order groceries on Ozon fresh! We will quickly deliver delicious products for the whole family: from tomatoes from the market and marbled steak to farm cottage cheese and a warm croissant. And you will always find discounts and special offers with us. We are already in Moscow, St. Petersburg, Krasnodar, Rostov-on-Don and many other cities in Russia. Choose fresh - order your favorite products on Ozon fresh.

Book air, train and hotel tickets on Ozon! It is not only convenient, but also profitable: you can pay up to 99% of the cost of tickets with Ozon points. The service is already used by more than 4 million people.

Customer support is available 24/7. They will help you solve any issue: return or reissue a ticket, add baggage or correct passenger data, cancel or change a hotel reservation.

We constantly update the range and maintain favorable prices. We make selections of popular products, and customers leave reviews about their purchases.
Every day we inform about favorable offers, current discounts, promo codes and sales. We collect the entire range of products with the best price in the discount catalog and regularly launch promotions in which you can win valuable prizes.
Choose products and order them in just one click or put your favorites in "Favorites": the application will save your wishlist, and you can return to buying products later.
Stay at home, place orders, receive discounts, and Ozon will deliver all your purchases. When ordering at a parcel terminal or pick-up point through the application, the delivery cost is 0 rubles.
You can check out our range of products and special offers right now - download the Ozon application and enjoy online shopping!

scraped_reviews.content: It's loaded with fakes and thrash, noting is labelled correctly. Sellers are peddling in counterfeit products with no moderation. While sellers can do whatever like use AI instead of products pictures you cant leave even slightly negative reviews for something you paid for. Search is designed to not give you what you're looking for. When you do order, your adress will not always be valid for delivery, which is at least 1 day off with the date of delivery. I hope lawsuit comes this company way.

scraped_reviews.content: waste app I have ever used . it will not deliverer any product on time . It may take 1 and half month to get product but they will show we will receive with in 15 days after 1t days they will show product is delayed and date delivery date is extended like that they will do several times. so don't trust the app .

Everyday the app is worse and worse ðŸ˜ž I remember the time when it was Great ðŸ‘ But those days are over ðŸ˜­ Now it's a trash bin. With unpredictable delivery time. And dead tech support. Even stole from me. Little amount, less than a dollar, for a "quick delivery" ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚, "less than a month - it's a quick delivery" in their understanding.

My order for some reason was delayed from June 5 to June 10 with day to day notifications. That's OK, I'm patient, I can understand difficulties of transportation. Then the courier "couldn't call me" for 2 days. I didn't get any calls. For safety checked my account. The phone number is there and correct. Tried to call the courier myself. He was busy and didn't answer. June 12 early morning I'm getting a refund and an offer to try to buy it again. Nice and easy app, terrible service. Uninstall
terrible app. search, filters, sort, category don't work as intended. it just shows whatever product they one(maybe sponsored ones). not Customer oriented.

They don't allow foreigners to buy many things. 15k debit card limit so I cannot buy anything above 15k with my own money. Buying from abroad also doesn't work, they only allow Russians to buy and they don't mention it before paying. Returning money only to ozon bank for foreigners, so I cannot take my money back, I should buy other things from ozon. customer support is an idiot bot, cannot talk/get help from another person.

The app and the service used to be frankly lovely - fast, convenient, wide selection and good prices. The corporation changed hands - is that what happened? The practical upshot is that now it has the free service of dispersing your personal details and data (order information, payment method, address, email) to random users via text. Basically, if you didn't get a text with your order details, someone else definitely did. The customers - victims? - notified tech support, who sent a bunch of emails that amounted to a very big shrug. "We'll look at this at some point, shush" Caveat emptor - buyer beware

scraped_reviews.content: This market place is now full of scammers from China, be very careful! They upload pictures of popular products, you decide to buy, only to receive something completely different from what you ordered. The return procedure for these kinds of orders is very long and tedious. I ordered a camera for 56000 rubles but I received a toy camera for 2000 rubles. Of course tried to return it but the owner of the shop didn't send his address and offers compensation of 300 rubles instead of 56000 rubles.

title: Current - Mobile Banking
description:
Power up your paycheck when you switch to Current. Get paid faster, save smarter, and build credit with easeâ€”all in one app. Join over 6 million members already banking with Current today.

With Current you can:

â€” Advance up to $750â¶: Access more of your paycheck if you qualify.

â€” Overdraft fee-freeâµ: Breeze from payday to payday without hidden fees.

â€” Get paid up to 2 days earlyÂ²: Receive your direct deposit as soon as your employer sends it.

â€” Build credit while you bank.

â€” Earn 1% cash back on dining and groceriesâ´.

â€” Enjoy 24/7 member support.

â€” Access 40,000+ fee-free ATMs nationwideÂ¹.

â€” Add cash in-store at locations like CVS, Walgreens, and McDonaldâ€™s.

â€” Earn up to a 4.00% bonus on savingsÂ³ and save automatically with Round-Ups.


See current.com/docs for full terms and conditions and current.com/legal_disclaimers for more info.

Current is a financial technology company, not an FDIC-insured bank. FDIC insurance up to $250,000 only covers the failure of an FDIC-insured bank. Certain conditions must be satisfied for pass-through deposit insurance coverage to apply. Banking services provided by Choice Financial Group, Member FDIC, and/or Cross River Bank, Member FDIC.
Â¹ Most AllPointÂ® ATMs are fee-free. To see if an ATM qualifies for fee-free ATM transactions, please check the Mobile App.
Â² Faster access to funds is based on comparison of traditional banking policies and deposit of paper checks from employers and government agencies versus deposits made electronically. Delays by the employer, payer, or their banks may result in delayed access to funds beyond our control.
Â³ Boost Bonuses are credited to your Savings Pods within 48 hours of enabling the Boost feature and on a daily basis thereafter, provided that the Savings Pod has accrued a Boost Bonus of at least $0.01. No minimum balance required. The Boost rate on Savings Pods is variable and may change at any time. The disclosed rate is effective as of August 1, 2023. Must have $0.01 in Savings Pods to earn a Boost rate of either 0.25% or 4.00% annually on the portion of balances up to $2000 per Savings Pod, up to $6000 total. The remaining balance earns 0.00%. To earn a Boost rate of 4.00%, you must receive at least one Eligible Payroll Deposit equalling a minimum of $200 over a 35-day period. T&C: current.com/boost_terms_of_service
â´ For eligible customers only. You may earn Points in connection with your Build Card purchases at retailers whose merchant code is classified as: Dining (e.g., restaurants) and Groceries (e.g., supermarkets) and by completing other actions that Current designates as subject to the Current Points Program. The amount of Points granted for different actions as well as the purchase requirements necessary to earn Points will vary, and is subject to Currentâ€™s sole discretion. After qualifying, please allow 3-5 business days for points to post to your Current account. Points will expire 365 days after they settle. T&C (including specific eligibility criteria): current.com/current_points_terms_and_conditions
âµ Actual overdraft amount may vary and is subject to change at any time, at Currentâ€™s sole discretion. In order to qualify and enroll in the Fee-Free Overdraft feature, you must receive a minimum of $200 or more in Eligible Direct Deposits into your Current Account over the preceding 35-day period and fulfill other requirements subject to Currentâ€™s discretion. Negative balances must be repaid within 60 days of the first Eligible Transaction that caused the negative balance.  T&C: current.com/overdraft_protection_terms_of_service
â¶ For eligible customers only. Paycheck Advance is offered by Finco Advance LLC, a financial technology company, not a bank. T&C: current.com/docs/paycheck_advance_terms
