scraped_reviews.content: I've been with Current for over 3 years. anytime I've had issues with my card I've had them resolved within a few days. only problem is giving up the card with the problem and not having the new one available for as much as 2 weeks. so I've learned to keep a few dollars on hand in case something comes up. my money is made available 6 days before it is direct deposited. they've added an advance feature which has been quite handy in the past. it can also be used for set monthly payments.

Really disappointed in this app. I set up direct deposit and everything (for reference, I make six figures a year) and the advance offered to me was a meager $50 instead of anything close to the $500 advertised. In addition to that disappointment, the app is constantly sending notifications about features that are now available and when you click them, you find out that option is already exhausted. Update down to 1 star. Absolutely deceptive service with no human support. Avoid at all costs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! The Paycheck Advance limit you qualify for is based on your Eligible Payroll Deposit history, historical spending, transaction history, and other risk-based factors. If you have any questions or concerns feel free to contact us at reviews@current.com, we'd be happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: amazing! I could NOT get a credit card for a long time due to having no credit. I had no activity on my credit for 7+ years so everything was blank. I couldn't get any credit card to approve me. I found Current and have been building my credit ever since. this app is so easy to use, clean interface, and actually gives you a chance to build your credit back up. I will be with Current for a long time.

Almost perfect banking! The app covers nearly all my needs. There are no monthly "maintenance fee" anymore, Overdraft protection is awesome, and the fee free ATMs are awesome. I love they added within the year for connection with plaid services. Things to work on is to get our Debit Cards to work with Zelle and of couple of other services. Edit 7/2025: Still no zelle support and it's pretty annoying when you don't use your build card you get a notification why you should use the build card!

Easy to use, no major issues with sending and receiving money from direct deposits. Transferring money from this account to another bank or vice versa, is easy to do. The three savings accounts that come with the account, are nice to have. When you have money coming out of your account for bills, you get a notification/reminder that a payment will be withdrawn from your account.

volatile. The Build Card and easy to use interface make Current a solid option. Unfortunately, they are entirely too volatile when you have options like Varo, who is an actual bank bound by rules and regulations. Despite never missing a payment, or paying late, they reduced my cash advance by $500. Customer Service responds with answers you can find on the FAQ page, meaning they can't help you with absolutely anything else. Current has lost me as a customer, but its not like they care anyway.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we're very sorry to hear that the service you received was anything less than great, as it's definitely not the experience that we want our members to have. We appreciate the feedback that youâ€™ve provided. Can you email us at reviews@current.com so that we can review what happened? Weâ€™re happy to do what we can to help.

scraped_reviews.content: Great service, if you love waiting 8-12 days for your money to be available for use. The line they feed you at the beginning that funds will be available quicker after you use the service for a little while is BS (or by 'little while' they mean more than 8 months). Also there's no way to access anything without the app on your phone (no computer login).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, weâ€™re sorry to hear this and appreciate your feedback. The time frame shown in the app is an estimate of when your deposit will settle and is subject to change. We apologize for the inconvenience this has caused, feel free to reach out to us at reviews@current.com with any questions or concerns.

scraped_reviews.content: Current provides services that'll leave you with a smile and much more. There's no hidden fees, instant free cash transfer, and dual card account (and still, simply differ from each other). The credit builder idea is excellent!!! I would recommend this app to those that is tight on money and needs to free sign up to get an unsecured credit card joint with a debit card.

You won't find CDs, mutual funds, or other "advanced" banking here, but if you're looking for a simple, easy to use online bank that doesn't charge insane overdrafts and is actively expanding options for customers to save and even earn money, Current is the way to go. The lack of security features like 2FA do concern me a little, but that's truly the only complaint I've had with Current in the 2 years I've had it.

Great. I screwed my credit up years ago, when I was deep in drug use. I couldn't get a bank account or anything so I went with this over chime, and Its amazing they help you build credit on the app. You can deposit money at stores using the barcodes, then when you buy something it essential uses. Your card as a credit card. But sets the funds to the side to pay the bill. It's really awesome

Horrible... Started out great, I definitely enjoyed it. Then, out of nowhere my card was suspended while trying to transfer money between my bank card and current. There was no explanation as to why and when I called the number on the back of the card an automated voice stated my card was under review and someone will be reaching out soon. It's been several months and so far I have heard nothing. I also have money still on my current card that I can't use or withdraw. Don't waste you time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, weâ€™re sorry to hear about the status of your account. The safety of our community is our top priority, and at times we may review an account if we recognize unusual activity. We apologize for the inconvenience. If you have any questions or concerns feel free to contact us at reviews@current.com.

scraped_reviews.content: The three stars are because of the ease at which I was able to get an account and debit card arrived quickly. The things I am not too please with are the lack of web (pc) access. You can only access your account thru the app and this is very limiting. The app could use a simpler approach and layout. It feels cluttered. A more concise explanation of the differences between the two types of accounts should also be applied. Many other places offer similar services as the paid option for free.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
With every new app version we are introducing new features and improving existing ones. We are sure that your feedback will only help us improve further.

Sincerely,
Support@Current

scraped_reviews.content: I selected a free account during sign up, except I was immediately issued a premium card and signed up for premium checking. Don't link your bank during sign up as you may be charged for the wrong account type! Edit: Support did indeed help me get my plan changed quickly, but the screen for selecting different account types hides the basic plan. When you do see the basic plan, there is no possible way to select the wrong one. There was no user error on my part.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hey there Chris, thanks for leaving a review. We display each plan that we offer when signing up for an individual account, but our team would be happy to help you if you selected the wrong one. Feel free to contact us at reviews@current.com!

Sincerely,
Support@Current

scraped_reviews.content: BEWARE!!! They charge fees for just being a customer each month but then also charge fees to add money each time. Additionally, when you add money it takes upwards of 1 week before you can see or have access to your cash. The app is constantly glitching and customer service is NO help. I don't understand how you can deal with people's money yet the only way they can contact you is through chat!!!

Sat on this for a while hoping it was just a bug with the app. Used it for a minute and never had a problem until the beginning of this year. Won't let me log in, keeps saying session timed out and to log in again. I do that, even wait a bit, even uninstalled and reinstalled. It also won't let me try any other way to log in aside from my number either. Not a problem w the card being expired bc I can still be sent money and subscriptions still draft. Can't even open it and contact any support.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for leaving a review. We're sorry to hear about your experience and would be happy to investigate this further. Please reach out to our member experience team at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account for assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Better than most on-line banking apps. However, it is confusing on how they do their current credit cards and credit building process. I researched all of the information available online, and it still didn't quite make much sense. Other than that, it's a good card to get. Nothing special over the others, just different tiny perks or ease of using the app.

So apparently, the app doesn't allow app based phone numbers. But it lets you enter one for your information. But they recently changed it to where it won't accept that number anymore at all when i'm trying to log in. I've been locked out of my account, and talking to customer service, just to have them do nothing at all, and stop answering me completely every time. That's ridiculously poor customer service to leave someone unable to access their bsnk account completely. Still can't get in
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the difficulties you experienced while registering with us. If you would like some assistance or additional information, please contact us via reviews@current.com and we will be happy to help you further. Sincerely, Support@Current

scraped_reviews.content: The app itself is beautiful and easy to use. With regard to Current as a banking service. I love the 4% interest on the savings pods. There are two things that I think need improving. First is, the bank to bank transfer time is very slow despite a 1-2 day promise. Ally to SoFi - 24 hours, Ally to Current - 4 to 5 days. That is very annoying. Where is the money in this "float" period. Second, Current needs a web application as well, in my opinion. Being limited to mobile is not ideal.

So far, I haven't had any issues. There is a small fee to deposit physical money into the account, which for me isn't a big deal since I have direct deposit anyway. The biggest thing I like about the app is that after you establish direct deposit, you gradually are allowed for overdraft (which is overdrive here) and there isn't a fee for it which is nice. I would recommend if you're looking for a mobile banking type app to manage your money.

They kept changing the terms and conditions. It is like bait and switch!!! They also make it difficult to close accounts. You can open accounts easily using their App but... cannot close accounts using App. Oh, they also charge to close accounts ðŸ¤¯ðŸ˜¡ BTW, their interest rate is not as good as it used to be, compared to other online bank. Please stay away!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thanks for leaving a review. We're truly sorry to hear about your experience. You can always chat with a member of our team in the Current app - weâ€™re available 24/7 and are happy to help. If you have additional concerns or feedback, feel free to contact us at reviews@current.com.

scraped_reviews.content: At first, I was very happy with this bank. There are great features like fee-free overdraft and ATMs, great percentage yield on savings pods, and the ability to immediately send money to friends who have an account here. I've had problems with their dispute filing process. Recently, my card was deactivated after I filed a dispute. No one asked for my consent to deactivate my card; there's a $5 fee for new cards and I now have no way to access my funds until a new card is sent 7-10 bus. days.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Your account safety is of the utmost importance to us. With this in mind, weâ€™re required to send you a new card when you report an unauthorized transaction. This is in order to protect you from any further loss of funds. While youâ€™re waiting for your card replacement, please know you can still use your virtual card.

scraped_reviews.content: My kids have loved these cards but customer service does not exist. They put my account "under review" because I closed my original checking account guiding to change it on the app. The problem is once "under review" I did not have access to customer service or my account to update with new information! The cards on it still had positive balances. I have sent numerous emails to no avail. Not one reply back. I found their phone number and was put on hold by a machine for 45 minutes.

Very good card and easy to use. Haven't had a problem with them at all. The only quirks I'd say are in the app. They say you have overdrafting abilities, but upon actually looking at it, they label it as overdraft protection. Those are very conflicting names to the same program. I'd call them something totally separate to distinguish them both so others arnt confused with if they have it or not. Also when trying to use the card at a pump it's always declined. Even with funds. Not sure why.

Been using Current for about 2 years now. At first it was pretty good. Only have a few places my card was not accepted. Being an online only bank makes it hard to use for some things. I liked that they deposited my check early but as time has gone by my check takes longer and longer to deposit and at times even later then my regular pay schedule. Customer service tells you to just wait it out. I think it might be time to look for additional options.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for leaving a review. Earlier direct deposits ultimately depend on when your employer submits their payroll file. Your deposit will be posted to your account and available to use as soon as we receive it. If you have any questions, please reach out to us directly at reviews@current.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Update: Where is my check? I was just in a grocery store about to purchase food, but I had to leave emptyhanded because my check once again didn't arrive on time. I've also never received a physical debit card. I literally can't afford to cancel my digital one and wait for a physical card. I, like many other people, live paycheck to paycheck. Isn't this app supposed to make banking easier?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for leaving a review. We're sorry to hear about your experience and would be happy to investigate this further. Please reach out to our member experience team at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account for assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Banked with them awhile back and canceled my account because they wanted to charge me for a new card (for the card, it wasn't shipping costs). It wasn't that I lost it. It was because it stopped working when I would use it at a POS. It wasn't a cheap amount and I feel like it was a horrid thing to do to a customer. You obviously don't want any if you want to charge for something other banks give for free. I went to chime. They give free cards even when you lose them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Thanks for leaving a review, we're sorry to hear that we missed the mark. We value the experience that our members have and feedback like yours helps as we continue to iterate and improve Current. If you have any questions or additional feedback that you'd like to share, feel free to reach out to us at reviews@current.com.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is a great experience, and banking with current, for the most part, was pleasant. I loved having the $100 overdraft limit for when my paychecks just couldn't stretch out until the next one, and getting an early payday! However the cons of this bank have made me go to capitol one; For starters, making large purchases such as for a car or housing is nearly impossible with the limits that they set to access your own money, and they make no exceptions. Also, I used to be able to deposit cash
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thanks for leaving a review. We appreciate your feedback and would be happy to share this with our team for their consideration as we continue to improve the services and features that Current offers. If you have any questions or additional feedback that you'd like to share, feel free to reach out to us at reviews@current.com.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a pretty great app. It's been a good alternative after Simple and One :( However I wish they had pockets for monthly expenses. The pods are great for long terms savings. It's a bummer they cut down the APY to 0.25% if you don't have automatic direct deposit. It would be great if you had a certain amount of money and maintain it you would still get it the 4%. We can't have everything I guess. I do see that people don't get spending alerts, I've never had an issue.

Horrible card. Limit to debit card attempts. They don't accept prepaid cards for transfers. ðŸ¥± Same old thing pretty much like Chime and all the rest. They don't accept prepaid card transfers and then they're "security features" will block you from adding a debit card if you try to add more than twice. Customer support is not helpful at all. Just repeat what the error message told you. They don't even try to fix the issue. Just say they're sorry a thousand times. Not so "current".
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Thanks for leaving a review, we're sorry to hear that we missed the mark. We value the experience that our members have and feedback like yours helps as we continue to iterate and improve Current. If you have any questions or additional feedback that you'd like to share, feel free to reach out to us at reviews@current.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Decent enough app/banking experience. Be aware however that you literally cannot make a transaction larger than $2000. No authorizing charges, nothing. There is no possible way to do it. Their recommendation was to use a different bank account to make the transaction. What's the point of having my money in an account if I have to have another checking account with a different bank? Immediately switched back to my credit union.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for leaving a review. We're sorry to hear that we missed the mark, we value the experience that our members have and feedback like yours helps as we continue to iterate and improve the service that we provide. If you have any questions or additional feedback that you'd like to share, feel free to reach out to us at reviews@current.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I signed up because I wanted a payment method that I could easily differentiate from my primary bank account. I got that and more, being immediately given a virtual debit card number to use, which remained active once my physical debit card arrived. It also gave my routing and account numbers, enabling me to use the account for automatic payments and deposits. The only bad thing was waiting for online deposits to be available, but they were quickly made instant, so I am pleased overall.

Was pretty curious about this app, looked cool, thought I would give it a try. Upon creating a account, I specifically picked the free one in order to go through the app and see what there was. However, after selecting that and going through the app for a bit, realized I was put as a premium account, the paid version of Currents banking. There is no easy way to change it, it would seem, and I cannot trust a company that does something like that. Especially with my money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Our apologies for the difficulty that you experienced while registering with us. If you would like some assistance with your subscription, please contact us via reviews@current.com and we will be happy to help you further. Sincerely, Support@Current

scraped_reviews.content: I recently had a great review for this app. But since I had to get a different phone number, its been a disaster. This is the most difficult company to get ahold of anyone in customer service. And I finally received my debit card and I can't even get it activated. It says I can only do that inside of the app. Which I can't get into because of my old phone number. The worst experience EVER!!! AND I DEPOSITED MY WORK CHECK INTO!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we'd be happy to help you out with this but we couldnâ€™t locate an account with the username that you used. Please contact our member experience team at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account for assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: 1) Didn't realize there is a annual fee. 2) You can only have one "savings pod" with the basic account but you can upgrade the account for more pods. 3) The app isn't intuitive. I have Simple right now, these features are free with them. What is driving me away from Simple is that they no longer do online bill pay where I am able to mail checks directly from the bank. Overall, Current isn't what I'm looking for and I will continue to wait for Revoult.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: With every new app version we are introducing new features and improving existing ones. We are sure that your feedback will only help us improve our products so we appreciate it.

scraped_reviews.content: Excited to try it, but had to go through the pain of trying to get my bank set up with it. Went to support and basically got, "we can't accept your bank account, but also make sure you're putting in your bank info correctly. Can't give you any more details about it, if you have another bank account though try that." I can see my account's funds in the app, and my checkings and savings. Why can't I use it?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Demetrius, we're truly sorry to hear about your experience and would be happy to help you out. A member of our team has reached out to assist you, please keep an eye on your inbox for an email with the subject "A Message from Current." We look forward to your reply.

scraped_reviews.content: I had no problems with the app or the account at first. Then, I upgraded to premium. I never recieved the card I was paying for and every time I reached out to support, all they had to say was that i shouldve definitely recieved the card by that point. I waited for two separate cards after having to reorder it after it never showed up. No real help whatsoever. Just the same response every time. If you choose to use this app, I would stay basic.

So, if you want quick deposits and overdraft protection it is not free as the commercial suggests. It is $4.99 per month. If you add a teen it's $36 per year. If you want to move money from a bank account plan on waiting a week for it to become available. Depositing cash? Find a store that allows it and that costs money too. Commercial is very misleading. I do get my direct deposits 5 hours earlier. Also you will still need another bank account to pay all the fees this free account charges.

This app doesn't require a password to log in. So anyone using your phone can just log in with a verification code texted to your phone. App doesn't auto log out, neither after inactivity nor after app is closed. It's lacking in basic security on the customer-facing end. I can only imagine how lacking in security it is behind the scenes where customers can't see. Reply: if you don't require a password, you don't do the most basic thing to secure your customers' funds.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jonathon, We apologize for any frustration that you've experienced, as the security of our platform and members are our top priorities. If you have any concerns, please contact us at reviews@current.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I love Current, I have been a customer for 4 years! ðŸ˜ Current is wonderful. The mobile app is amazingly designed. They have some great features I enjoy, such as the minimum cash deposit of $5.00 instead of $20.00 I also love the fee-free overdraft and cash advance as well. The credit builder card is phenomenal, and I adore it. However, I would love to see it report to all 3 major credit bureaus instead of just Transunion. It's a great app & bank!

In the short time my Current accts have been in use, my credit score jumped up +44 points in a matter of 60 days and no other changes on the report. They was nice. I do however had a few minor issues with Current. 1. Why have the documents tab available only to click or tap the link to retrieve statements and the link is dead. I would like to review my monthly statements. 2. Blocking a business does not block them when they add a * before the name. So much for stopping merchant from stealing

I open the account, got my debit card in the mail, and before I even funded my account there was a debit charge that was declined because of lack of funds. So I ask myself, how on earth would anyone get my debit card number, considering I've never used it and it's supposed to be brand new. Anyway, this was suspect AF, so I closed the account. Before doing so I will say the app is decently nice. Although, not great, and they charge a fee for some features you can get for free from other banks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the trouble that you experienced. We'd be happy to take a look into what happened here, feel free to contact us at reviews@current.com. Thank you.

Sincerely,
Support@Current

scraped_reviews.content: If I could give them negative stars, trust me, I would. This app allowed someone to open an account in my name without verification. I've tried to get the account closed, but you can't even talk to a real person unless it's on chat. And what's crazy is that all I had to do to find the account was use the email they used to sign up with to log in and I was able to get into the app. That's how I talked to a chat agent and asked them to close this account. ALL I WANT IS THE ACCOUNT CLOSED!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for leaving a review. We're sorry to hear about your experience and would be happy to investigate this further. Please contact our member experience team at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account for help.

scraped_reviews.content: I do not recommend anyone to use this bank. I was notable to add money to my account using external card for several days( still can't do it). It just says I've reached my transactions limit. I wasn't even close to the maximum amount of money that this "bank" allows you to deposit, neither I reached my spending limit. I read all the FAQs, it doesn't even say that there could be deposit transactions limit. Wrote to support , never got an answer. Discover or Chime are better alternatives.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for leaving a review. We're sorry to hear about your experience and would be happy to investigate this further. Please reach out to our member experience team at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account for assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: I've used this for banking for my children for years. Recently, my son lost his card and has been unable to access his account. 20 days ago I was logged out of my account and have been unable to log back in to do anything. Support has been slow to respond and has been absolutely no help at all. At one point they even said they were happy it was fixed, despite me never saying it was and them never fixing anything. If you use Current, you risk losing any money in your account.

Quick transfers of automatic deposits. Easy to use app. You have the ability to enable or disable your card at any time at your convience. So you dont have any unexpected charges that you didnt make on your account. The app is easy to use and its fast. You can literally go in the app and enable your card while standing in front of the cashier without a wait. You can then disable it right away if thats what you choose. My direct deposit is always early. I really like this app and Current Card.

So far I've had a good experience using the Current app. The only thing I've had issues with is the customer service. I've had excellent knowledgeable, helpful agents, and agents who are ignorant AF! Overall, I like the product that Current offers so I do recommend it if you're looking for a mobile banking app that offers a debit card, real checking account you can actually link to other accounts, and many free atm services.

Naw, it's cool that you removed my review. I'll just say it again. Current is a third party pay processor and you are unable to link it to stock market or apps such as Earnin or any type of financing. Advantage is 2 days early pay, but that's about it. Until they become a primary pay processor I wouldn't recommend unless you don't need to link the account to anything. Remove it again and I will just keep uploading as a 1 star. I would have given a 4 star, but you do you.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dojjin, we're sorry to hear this. If you're unhappy with any of the features, you can contact us at reviews@current.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm unable to log in to my checking account and access my money. When I try to log in the app and go through the phone number verification (which I've successfully done numerous times to log into my account previously), the screen switches to one that states 'Something went wrong. Please try again later.' Support has been zero help so far in helping me get back into my account. This issue has been going on six hours!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for leaving a review. We're sorry to hear about your experience and would be happy to investigate this further. Please contact our member experience team at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account for help.

scraped_reviews.content: The longer I use the app, the more issues I find. You can't transfer funds from app to bank instantly. They actually DELAY direct deposit payments when you don't have premium. I scheduled 4 payments, 2 before I became premium and 2 after. The 2 payments I scheduled after becoming premium were received the other 2 delayed further. Not good or recommended at all. The customer support doesn't tell you any information you don't already have. It's honestly not worth the time. Just get cash app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're sorry to hear about your experience. If you can please reach out to our member experience team at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account, we'd be happy to investigate this further.

scraped_reviews.content: Best bank I've ever had! They don't make you jump through any hoops the app is easy to use and stress free all the way! I love current they are everything you would want in a bank and more !!! Highly recommend ! I had been looking for a mobile bank app and was frustrated by how many of them just ended being huge waste of time just throwing obstacles left and right to make it difficult to do anything you need to do . CURRENT makes it just easy and just hassle free. So impressed thank you guys !!

title: World of Tanks Blitzâ„¢
description:
It's World of Tanks Blitz, a legendary action-adventure tank game. Blitz is not about war, but tanks! Join this action-packed PvP shooter and explore unique vehicles and a variety of battlefields. Experience the adrenaline rush of intense tank battles that test your skills and strategy. Join the fray in this action-packed adventure of vehicle combat games!

 This FREE tank game keeps you engaged and brings everyday challenges and unique events. Breaking away from conventional war games, Blitz offers a singular focus on the adrenaline-fueled thrill of a tank game! Immerse yourself in this dynamic PvP shooter, where you'll navigate a landscape brimming with diverse vehicles, sprawling battlefields, and monumental tank warfare.
 
 UPGRADE YOUR TANKS
 Choose from more than 400 vehicles, ranging from Tier I to sophisticated Tier X machines, and command a massive army of battle tanks to dominate the battlefield! Pump up your metal beasts in the Garage to enjoy this PvP action game! 

 AND FANTASY VEHICLES TOO
 Test experimental vehicles brought to life from the blueprints of famous engineers to feel extra special! Customize your combat vehicles and have fun, but not war!
 
 USE YOUR TANKSâ€™ ADVANTAGES IN BATTLE
 In every battle, each tank presents distinct gameplay mechanics. The various shapes of hulls and turrets can deflect even the most powerful shells. This adds depth to the tank simulator experience and enriches the gameplay dynamics of the vehicle combat game.
 
 WIN REWARDS
 Enjoy in-game events inspired by monsters, dinosaurs, cartoons, musicians, and other game universes! Complete your special missions for rewards to upgrade your favorite vehicles in World of Tanks Blitz.
 
 FIGHT IN 30+ BATTLE ARENAS
 Shooting games are never boring, and tank battles are no exception. Discover a variety of battlefield arenas with their unique features and machines. Avoid the heat in a sunbaked desert, study ancient ruins in the Mediterranean, or crawl through a dark and dim secret base lost in time. But thatâ€™s not all! Launch your war of tanks on the Moon in low gravity or surprise your enemies with mystical abilities like rising from the dead.
 
 PLAY IN A TEAM AND WIN TOURNAMENTS
 You never play alone! Join clans and play with friends in World of Tanks Blitz. Build your own platoon, roll into battle as a team, and compete for glory, high rankings, or prizes! WoT Blitz is cross-platform, enabling thunderous tank warfare across various devices.
 
 DRIVE HISTORICAL VEHICLES
 Drive and upgrade historically accurate tanks and tank destroyers from Germany, France, Japan, Great Britain, China, the USSR, the USA, and other nations.
 
 OPTIMIZED GFX FOR ANY DEVICE
 This PvP shooter is automatically optimized for your device. Get the most out of driving exciting tank models, and watch massive explosions and spectacular blown-off turrets flying around a battle arena. Go to the settings of WOTB to find the balance between fantastic visuals and high FPS.
 
 World of Tanks Blitz is a living tank universe that never stops evolving. Join the world of shooting games, where precision, strategy, and reflexes are put to the test in combat scenarios. Upgrade your combat vehicles and command an army of tanks! Experience the thrill of vehicle combat games as you commandeer powerful tanks and strategize your way to victory! Hurry up to enter this tank game and roll out into battle!
 
 2025 Wargaming.net

summary: Tank Battles: Modern PVP shooter with action! Prioritising strategy over war.

scraped_reviews.content: Plenty of opportunities to gain currencies and boosts, but for gaining premium tanks your really gonna need to empty your bank account, as this game has a lot of gambling for premiums and special items. It's obviously gotten worse over the years and doesn't look like it's gonna get better. For new and returning players, play at your own risk and Progression is gonna be tough, but it's not the worst that it could be.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Premium tanks can be obtained completely for free in certain in-game events that occur regularly. You just need to complete the mission, and the tank is yours.

scraped_reviews.content: While the game is "free-to-play", all of the best content it locked behind paywalls. In most cases, tech tree tanks are inferior to the paid premium tanks. Additionally, the game features the now common gambling lootbox mechanics, where most premium tanks that you don't have to pay money for are found. The game has a strong foundation, but suffers from predatory monetization, despite what wargaming claims. I say all of this as someone who's played the game for 8 years.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand your concerns about monetization. While the game is free-to-play, premium content and tech tree progression are designed to offer optional advantages, not requirements. We appreciate your feedback and will continue monitoring player experiences to improve balance and accessibility.

scraped_reviews.content: 5 years with wotb. It's been a fun time, enjoyable game, great graphics, and a frustrating matchmaker. All in all, it's been a great game. I enjoy the game the way it is. The French options offer speed and a good gun. The british steady and mission oriented. True workman like approach. I wish there were less trolls and a bit more commaradairee. It's a game. You should have fun collecting the tanks, these are representations of famous tanks. The game is appealing in many ways.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your positive feedback. We are glad that you liked the game. Enjoy!

scraped_reviews.content: Your game is fun but sometimes the game dynamics can leave me a little disappointed like with the lineup of the teams, bounces, hits and misses leave me wondering how that was even possible. Your tank graphics do look good, although some of the hybrid tanks look very goofy. I'm still here playing your game after many years. It's difficult to earn the points necessary in regular game play to earn the event tank because I can't spend the whole day playing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your thoughts! Every feedback matters. Feel free to join our Discord (https://discord.gg/wotblitz) to share more. Let's shape future game updates, together.

scraped_reviews.content: Fun game. The biggest complaint I've always had is that enemy tanks dissappear in the open in plain sight. Its completely ridiculous and has been the cause of many missed shots. Please get rid of this feature. Edit on Oct 17 2025 to Wargaming Groups response: Im not talking about when detection conditions are first met, I'm talking about after an enemy has already been spotted or "detection conditions met", they can literally be sitting in the open, in full view of your sight and dissappear.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your interest in our game, Commander. As WoT Blitz is not an exact tank simulator, some features, including detection and concealement may be different from real life. Feel free to contact our Player Support, our team will look into your battles and will explain how exactly this mechanics worked in them.

scraped_reviews.content: good on some platforms. Its a great game on Nintendo Switch. Very fun and competitive but backing up controls are mediocre and can get you hopelessly turned around in the middle of a fire fight, so you must be situationally aware of obstacles and tank turning using a stick. I dont think this is capable of being played on a chromebook. I dont have a touchscreen, only mouse and keyboard and those options are not available, even if it is downloadable. too bad. still, great...no arties!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! The input method depends on the OS that your device is running. Our support team will be glad to consult you further: http://wargaming.net/support

scraped_reviews.content: I only recently started playing Blitz, after many years of playing WoT. The game is fun, but a huge distraction is the amount of bots playing. Thank goodness there is a fast timer to end the game in a draw, because watching the bots play (mindlessly shooting and missing) is frustrating. I thought the bot problem was only in the original game...just as bad here.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: After completing the tutorial, newcomers play mixed-type battles for some time. In these battles, bots fight instead of some players. Bur, gradually, the number of players in mixed-type battles will increase. Thus, mixed-type battles will smoothly change into regular battles with only real players. Bots are added purely in tutorial purposes.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the best multi-player game I have ever played! I would like to see an update where the XP gain is quicker and more tanks, it would be cool if there was a separate app or mode in-game to create tanks. For beginners, I recommend you grind the German tech tree. Overall great game. It has a competitor, War Thunder, but still, I like WOTB much better. I would like to see artillery make it to WOTB. I have a small problem, I got half of the silver I paid for when I bought Tiger 1. -Skinwalker
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are glad that you like the game and thank you for sharing your opinion. In the game, tanks are sold for 50% of their cost, so if you sold a tank, the fact that you received only 50% of the credits spent on it is not a mistake.

scraped_reviews.content: not as good as it use to be, so much has been removed, tanks that were in the game were removed and brought back as "exclusive tanks" and they want you to pay over $30 just for a tank that used to be free. on top of that so many parts for tanks were removed like it never existed. it used to be fun but now it's like pay to win cuz the new exclusive stuff is beyond strong you can't win aga8it u less you buy it. really taking a page out of EA
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand your concerns and are sorry if weâ€™ve disappointed. Improving the game is our focus.

scraped_reviews.content: Pretty good game... at the beginning. Things are either cheap or simple to buy without griding a 100 battles. Now, at V-X, things... are way too much. It's expensive, and probably requires 500 battles, and the players are mean at the higher levels. Plus, new maps of higher leveled tanks. which you don't know where to go. Also, less balance. Can you lower the cost and experience of all those tanks? Thanks. Anyways, it's enjoyable other then being expensive.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We are glad that you liked the game. Your feedback will be passed to the developers. Good luck in the game!

scraped_reviews.content: I have 9 years in this game. The player base has shrunk. Less players playing equals lower value of your product. your prices should go down but they have gone up. On Reforged, all I was hoping for was better graphics. After seeing the first and second preview of Reforged, I wish you had just left the game alone. I don't like the direction Wargaming is going. I am hardly logging in anymore after thousands of dollars over 9 years and thousands of hours playing, I am pretty done with this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that current implementation of some aspect of the game do not perfectly match with your expectations. At the same time, we want to assure you, that we are constantly working on improving the game. Maybe you will like the future updates more.

scraped_reviews.content: The game used to be fun, but now that I came back to it, the camera angle feels off. Like the tanks seem so small while playing compared to how it was a few years ago. It feels like you're too far from your tank in 3rd person. Also, the sensitivity also feels off. It feels all slippery. It just feels like the game is no longer for the mobile player, but for the pc players.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Weâ€™re sorry if the game hasnâ€™t met your standards. Your feedback helps us make it better.

scraped_reviews.content: Played for 11 years. Great at the beginning. The match making is horrible. Had my rating at 54% and over the past three years has steadily declined. Now they have tanks that hardly look like a tank. It's not uncommon to have an afk in every game. Very frustrating. I would not recommend this game to anyone. I would never pay another dime for this game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We hear your concerns and appreciate your passion for the game. On our part, we are always listening to your feedback and working on ways to improve team-based experiences to make gameplay fair and smooth for everyone. The matchmaking system is continuously being refined and updated to improve it.

scraped_reviews.content: So I started playing this game, and at first, I loved it. The controls were pretty good, graphics were superb, historical elements were awesome, etc. After a short while, I researched my first tier IV tank, not realizing this would officially force me to play with all the pay-to-winners with their premium tanks, which are nearly unbeatable to the standard tanks you can get without paying. I was so frustrated by this I uninstalled the game. Could be remedied by adding single-player against AI.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please be informed that premium tanks have no any significant advantages, allowing them to dominate them in the game. Please note that every tank has vulnerable areas, shooting at them you can penetrate them and deal damage.

scraped_reviews.content: One of the best games I have ever played, the only two major downfalls that I don't appreciate is that some tanks, like the Maus, have terrible RNG and are so annoying when firing because it's an almost guarrenteed ricochet. The second is that it isn't adaptable with laptop controls, like the WASD controls and looking around with the mouse. Luckily, though, my laptop can be touchscreen, but it's still annoying because of the bulk of laptops. Overall, great game, just needs a little tweaking.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. All vehicles in our project are prone to constant changes should they need it. Almost every update brought changes to the characteristics of tanks. We are not interested in unbalanced vehicles in our game. We are doing our best to improve the game and hope that future updates will please you.

scraped_reviews.content: Was great at the beginning, got unpleasant as I played more. When I got to tier V tanks after playing for 2 months I can't gain credits, only lose cradits. Even with gain in tactics & experience I get knocked out by other players too easy. After struggling with it for a few weeks I've uninstalled the game because there's no more enjoyment in playing. Shooting opponent's tracks gets fixed in a second. How? And I can be blown off in two shots. It's not worth the aggravation.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for review. We'd like to remind you that the amount of credits received from the battle is based on accruals for battle achievements and costs of vehicle repairs and resupply of consumables, ammunition, provisions, and camouflage. If you have a question about the specific battle moment, please create a ticket: http://wargaming.net/support

scraped_reviews.content: Great game in theory. One of the worst pvp games I've ever played. Who the F makes maps in a tank game that limit tanks on where they can go. Nobody wants to be freaking limited in where they can go in a tank that's the whole goddamn point of designing and having a f-ing tank. The controls are complete cheap. And yeah I get it. It's a tank. But if youd put slightly more emphasis on forward/backward and less on the whole damn 'it can turn any direction!' Ppl would adjust a whole lot easy. Sucks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to acknowledge that our game doesn't meet your expectations. Hopefully, you'll like our future updates more.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this game. The graphics, the controls, the tanks, the pay-to-win aspect that ironically I've only had a taste of. But there's one thing that really clipped my ammo rack. It's the fact that Wargaming decided that removing tanks or entire portions of tech branches would be a good idea. I'm still curious as to why Wargaming would do such a thing. And I'm sure other long-term players like myself would say the same. But hey if it's for a reason then let it be a good one.

great selection of tanks, great graphics, and a decent player pool. if you love tanks, this is a cool game to pass the time. I've been around from day 1. The part I hate is how they have made all of the tanks so vanilla in the quest for balance. The KV2 used to be a blast to play. It was hard to play, but the HE made it fun! The one thing that tank had going for it has power krept out of existence. There are few tanks left that are truly fun to play. No DERP here if that's what you want.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for your review concerning our game. We work hard to make our game better. We hope our upcoming updates will please you more.

scraped_reviews.content: Game is VERY slow. Too slow. upgrade takes forever. Gaining coins takes forever. If you're an average player, you'll be stuck. I have just upgraded to Level 5 tank and I have 130,000. After playing over 30 games, I am at about 140,000. To put that into perspective, 1 upgrade is 80,000. So, 240 matches will get you 1 upgrade. Not only is this long, but if you want to start a new nations tank...Good luck finding a match. I swapped from Germany to USA. I literally waited 12 minutes for 1 match...

This game offers a lot of tanks that fit everyone's playing style. Whether you prefer to spearhead your team's attack, or prefer to stay back and snipe at your enemies from cover, you always encounter something new! However, this game has some drawbacks, though: gold is semi-hard to get, and the tanks in the store are a little overpriced. In general, though, this game is fun to play!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for your detailed review and feedback. WoT Blitz is very versatile in terms of vehicles, tactics, and in-game activities. Every player can find something that suits their gaming style and preferences. We will keep working on the improvement of our game and we hope future updates will please you. Good luck on the battlefield!

scraped_reviews.content: Fun at first, but over time the repetitive gamestyle start to weigh you down. (This is not an ad) but I >HIGHLY< recommend War Thunder. I have played many games and bought some of them for $50 apiece, and free WT is still the absolute best game I have ever played. Some people play it for upwards of 9 years. To explain WT in detail would require a 3,000 word essay on the subject (which I have written!) So just try it out yourself and see what you think. Hope this helps!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: Wargaming, don't get me wrong. The game is good and all, but there are two small but huge things. First, the game is EXTREMELY pay-to-win. There are premium tanks that are a tier better than their tier. Secondly, the ADS. It asks you to spend money around EVERY corner in the game. Enter the game and you get ads even! Fix the ads PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: The game is free-to-play, you don't need to pay to play the game. The amount of invested funds doesn't influence the work of game mechanics in any way. If you don't want to purchase anything, you're free not to do that.

scraped_reviews.content: Money wasted after new update. Made way to complicated on modification of tanks. You can build up tanks only to have almost every round bounce off enemy tanks, and way to many misses. Good game if you want to spend a lot of money to win. Other than that, it doesn't matter if you have been playing for a long time. Anyone with money can come in and win. No loyalty from the creator to old players.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You cannot gain an advantage by investing real money In our game. This is an important condition for our game and we follow it. Thanks for the feedback, have a good day!

scraped_reviews.content: It used to be a good game... Now you can't progress because even with credit booster on AND the account boost you still lose credits. Severely broken systems that force you to spend money. And the balance is very broken as well.... paid tanks are OP and don't even make sense most of the time. Developer keeps trying to push the article.... it does nothing to help. The game is broken when it comes to earning credits at higher tiers. I've been playing for a long time and it didn't used to be.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: 1) The game economy has not changed. 2) Premium tanks are balanced in the same way as researched tanks.

scraped_reviews.content: I would rate this game better if the tanks in your sights would not dissaper. They can still see you but you don't have a chance. The other issue is while your looking at an open area and moveing tanks will magically appear and you again have no chance. This to me is an issue that is getting worse. This gives the Allies hardly any chance of a fair game. Be nice if the problem could get fixed. Thanks for reading hope it was helpfull!!! Also the matching of battles needs tremendous amount of work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry if the implementation of the game does not meet your expectations. In case you need a comment on any aspect of the game, please create a ticket: NA - https://na.wargaming.net/support/en/products/wotb/ EU - https://eu.wargaming.net/support/en/products/wotb/ ASIA - https://asia.wargaming.net/support/en/products/wotb/

scraped_reviews.content: Alright let's get what i don't like out of the way. I don't like how you are limited in how many times you can sell tanks. That's just idiotic. You already have plenty of ways of making money via the many ad based options. Trying to shoe horn people into buying gold to get more garage slots isn't cool. Please change this feature. Everything else i pretty much like. Gameplay darn near nails the PC counter part, and is overall a fun 7v7 team based stragey historical simulation game. Wud recommend.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: There's a limit on selling imposed in order to protect your Garage from being completely sold out, by accident or otherwise. We're sorry to hear that this feature caused any inconvenience. Thank you for your feedback and Happy Holidays!

scraped_reviews.content: If you're looking to try this game, read this first! I downloaded this game today, and here is what to expect; Pros: The graphics and mechanics are great! You can tell a lot of effort was put into the game. It would have definitely been a fun game had it not been for the negative Cons: The matchmaking is terrible! While you try to learn the basic controls, be prepared to get destroyed by higher level and seasoned players. Definitely wouldn't spend money on a game just to die over & over.....
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We work on the game every day and hope that you'll still continue to enjoy the game for all of its positive aspects. Thanks for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: A very meh game. The matchmaking is very under par, the rating system for tanks is very under par, and they dont fix things, they just add more things for you to pay for. So much for a "free to win game". This is NOT a player friendly game. It's gotten to the point where they have to rely on "statistics" to explain things. It's sad where it wound up after these years. Even gaijin does a better job at stuff like this (not to be biased, just an example). This review sadly wont do much.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you have such negative emotions towards the game. Hope that one day your decision might be changed for the better.

scraped_reviews.content: Don't even bother downloading. 0 STARS!!! I used to give them 4 stars. With the 5.5 update they destroyed the game. The bottom tiers of tanks have been dumbed down and many tanks we worked hard to research have been removed. They have nerfed anything good to t where there is no variety. A lot of the strategy has been stripped from the game. They made upgrades much easier so players reach the top tiers having no idea how to handle them. When I miss the old game and log in it is worse each time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to acknowledge that the new update does not meet your expectations. However, we are doing our best to improve the game. But anyway, thank you for your interest in the project and sound feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: I have been playing this game since introduction May 2014. The matches are predetermined for one side to be more aggressive so that matches are over fast. Server turn around rate. You will be mostly on the losing side and it's not so much fun losing more than winning. Don't spend money on tanks that you can buy, because you'll just lose more in it. I guess it's been less and less fun to play the more I do play. The multi company owned wargaming now is just hoping for your new players money.NO
scraped_reviews.replyContent: The MM cannot affect who will win in the battle and what the result will be since it is impossible due to the fact that you play with real people each of them have their own view how to play in the battle.

scraped_reviews.content: Now, I have been playing this game for 4 years, and have realized no matter how much skill you have, being a new player is a draining experience because of how long it takes to get resources and experience, and sometimes you just can't grind out tech trees for hours. Yes, some people will pay for gold and premium tanks which sometimes makes the game look like pay to win, and puts inexperienced players at higher teirs, and other players just leave all together. I just wish for a lighter burden.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry that the game has disappointed you. In our game you can play without any cash investment. We also want to note that all game mechanics work equally for all players. Best regards.

scraped_reviews.content: Good game, but original pc game is better (World of Tanks). This game is a dumbed down version of WoT for mobile devices and even PCs, and Switch. Some BS can be encountered, like OP tanks you can counter, but new players aren't in the loop. If you want a premium experience if youre serious, play WoT PC, also free. It can be hard to wrap your mind around, but its worth it in the long run, plus a larger scale maps and more tanks, and more features. Happy tanking
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: I'll give it 4 stars because it is the best game out there on mobile, especially if your into tanks and pvp combat. However this game is kinda pay to win, you can go ahead and go through the struggle of grinding without spending a dime on the game, but it is a hell of a struggle your going to have to go through. But other than that the game is pretty great, only complaint about gameplay is probably rng, sometimes it can be out of this world stupid but its not a big deal.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. I am glad to hear that you like our game. I want to tell you that we continue improving it.

scraped_reviews.content: After quite a bit of time playing this game I had to quit. The "multiplayer" is mostly bots with a terrible AI and not actual people, the tanks are unrealistic and unbalanced, and the game gets really frustrating as a result. The developer says there are only bots at the lower levels, but this is not true. I have played many battles at level 6 and 7 with only one human (out if 7 tanks) on my team. There are some bright spots in the game, but more bad then good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to acknowledge that some aspects of the game donâ€™t meet your expectations. We appreciate every player's feedback and hope your opinion will change for the better in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: A great game. Been playing for over 5 years. My only complaint is with matchmaking and player behavior. I've been in countless battles in which players on either side would ruin the game for the team by being reckless/inactive on purpose, or rude in chat. I end up encountering repeat offenders all the time, so reporting doesn't seem to do anything either. Wish there was a harsher punishment for players who just don't know when to stop being a party-pooper.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry if the implementation of the game does not meet your expectations. In case you need a comment on any aspect of the game, please create a ticket: http://wargaming.net/support

scraped_reviews.content: Way too much content for my phone, took way too long to load and bogged down to a complete stop in the middle of battle. It only took 2 days for me to figure out the game wasn't for me. There's too many other tank games out, to get pulled into this bloated, over hyped, wants money for everything and if you think you can go far without paying, think again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our game is free-to-play. You don't have to pay to play or to win. Whether to put money into the game is the player's personal choice.

scraped_reviews.content: It is the best mobile game i have ever played. It definitely does have a wallet warrior comunity, like most free to play apps, but there is a big difference. On clash of clans or boom beach a wallet warrior will come in and completely destroy you day one, but on world of tanks you can blow one away without spending anything. That said the things you would pay for are usually worth paying for, instead of paying just to get that wall upgrade someone else just waited to get, you pay for unique and fun tanks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: The lag is absolutely horrific. You enter a game with a 21ms ping, after a few seconds of play I drop to 150-250 ms lag. Which results in you playing in a ghost real. Where you cant cause any damage. Another gripe about this game is its costs. Better have a trust fund or have recently won a large lottery prize. Everything costs a small fortune. At first you can watch videos for free gold but at some arbitrary point they take that away from you so you're left with the choice to either be cannon fodder or broke. The community of gamers associated with this game could be another turn off. Nothing like being berated by a teammate when you get eliminated too quickly fir their liking. Pretty hard to be competitive when you are playing in the ether.

Here to write a more detailed review. Honestly have to say it's not a bad game, I especially love how the devs added an option to completely block out chat completely because that's what really made the game toxic. Other than that it's a pretty balanced game. One thing I will say is some prices that you pay for some premium tanks are EXPENSIVE! Other than that it's a pretty decent game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for sharing your review with us. We hope our upcoming updates will please you more.

scraped_reviews.content: An amazing game!!! It is truly free to play. There are of course ingame purchases. But you can still have great time without paying a single cent! The graphics are high quality and the tanks are wonderfully detailed. My only wish is that artillery would be brought back. I do appreciate the company for trying to minimize space usage. Also the matchmaking could use some work. All in all it is fun and enjoyable! A must have for any tank enthusiast! Well done Wargaming!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback and hope you'll keep enjoying the game.

scraped_reviews.content: Great game wish for better matchmaking but excellent all rounder, I have played for a few years and anything that you can buy you can also earn, is a true non pay to play, even though you can there really isn't much of a difference in power between paid and earned, wish it was a bit more realistic with tanks available and strengths of those tanks for the time period. I don't like the Nazis but in all honesty they built some of the best tanks of the era.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We work on the project improvement and hope you'll enjoy future updates. Good luck on the battlefields!

scraped_reviews.content: Would be a good game if the devs weren't corrupt, greedy and incompetent. There's potential but the current state of the game isn't fun. That's the point of videogames. The biggest problem is the RNG system. I've read the in-game mechanics section and didn't find where it says green armor can cause ricochets. The devs have to know that it shouldn't happen. The algorithms override in-game mechanics. The solution is simple: remove the algorithms and let the players decide who wins.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Armor highlighting is an auxiliary element of the game and does not guarantee penetration. If you have a specific question about the in-game situation, please contact Player Support. We'll be able to give you a complete answer there.

scraped_reviews.content: Awesome! There are amazing graphics and great gameplay, and you can call out hackers and/or unfair players. Maps are balanced amd you have many options on all of them. There are many tanks to choose from, and from quite a few nations. But it gets a 4 star review because i got A few Random German tanks, all were Tier 3, and take up space, they aren't of any use. Also i got some X Tier American Tank, then it left. Also Two Premium Russian Tanks, the Valentine ll and some SU tank. Great Game Tho!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Please contact Customer Support if you want to receive more comment and detailed information. Unfortunately, we cannot post a big reply due to technical limitations.
Thank you for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: I love this game so much I would play it for hours if I could. It's addicting to the point in which you could plan on playing for an hour and end up playing for the entire evening. This game is just that good! (Edit - be prepared to lose your cool when the match maker puts you on a team of people who dont know the first thing about the game and have a tier 8 tank (of 10) and still dont know how to use a tank. It is absolutely infuriating)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We wish you a fun game!

scraped_reviews.content: Chromebook support? Let me preface this by saying I have been playing this game for over 6 years and I love the game. I spend a few dollars on it, but that is a small price to pay for the hours I have spent playing. That said, in the store it says "play your favorites on your Chromebook." Great idea but there is no option to use keyboard controls. You can play it on a PC with keyboard support, but not on a Chromebook without keyboard. Please add keyboard support.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback on our project. We will certainly take this feedback into account for future patches. Please do note that while this does not automatically mean that your suggestion will be implemented in the next update, all feedback is highly appreciated! Good luck on the battlefield!

scraped_reviews.content: Response to developer: Please try that with new players who don't know better, take a survey from players then tell me that I'm lying. Good graphics. Fun to play but BE PREPARED!!! If you plan to play for free You will not have the same experience as someone who does. And be prepared to progress 1 inch to the 1 foot progression people who purchase items from the game will get; And it's not the difference in equipment, you will literally be held back. Only speaking from experience. Good luck.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Investing money gives players access to unique items and tanks and can speed up progression. But it does not provide an advantage in battles. Premium tanks are not stronger than researchable ones. Many boosters that accelerate progress can be obtained for free in game events. Also, in such events players can get premium tanks.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been playing this series for the longest and it's sad to say it has gotten to be more of a cash grab. You used to be able to grind and get tanks now a good chunk of them are behind pay walls and the ones behind paywalls give players a unfair advantage not all tanks but a decent amount. The graphics are great. They've come a long way. But please don't follow Activisions route when all they started doing was thinking about the cash.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We are doing our best to improve the game!

scraped_reviews.content: Game is great, but controls can be frustrating. Aim-assist often causes point-blank shots to miss, and is worthless at long range. While traversing, a slip of the finger can cause the tank to start reversing in the opposite direction. Edit: the aim assist function is complete trash. Never before have I had so many issues aiming in a mobile game. It regularly sticks to the terrain instead of enemy tanks, and generally does things other than pointing the gun at the enemy.

The game is excellent and addictive. I have been playing for several years now and still enjoy getting into a battle. It is heated, meaning learn the lower levels before going to a higher level to just because you get a bigger tank. Lower tiered tanks are amazing to fight in, but it allows a player to hone skills need for the higher levels. I do love the game. I play this one game more than anything else. Sit back maneuver and destroy the enemy teams tanks. Enjoy! Straight up! There really is only one issue I have and I consider it to be extremely frustrating as well as other players. WOT tank merely gives generic answers which is like duh, but do not address the issue. Your play style is dialed in, meaning you you consistently high on the points leader board for scoring points. However at certain points of playing you will find yourself in a tailspin spiraling down in stats. When you look at your opposing team their skill set is at a higher level than the teammates you have. Your team can be at an of say 45% with most players having less than a 1000 games under their belt, but your opposing team is at a 54% win rate overall 10,000 plus games. The opposing team has the upper hand. Now WOT will merely brush it aside rather than address the issue. There was a time when games were better matched, but however when you have losing streaks of fifteen or twenty games with one win it is definitely annoying. There was a time when WOT would not allow new players to enter into higher matched games, but they have been for the last couple of years. My hope is they address this problem rather than spinning it. They should be able to take players at various skill sets or tiers and advance them accordingly. Its an algorithm problem, but I do not know why they continually ignore the problem.I have brought it up in their help desk forum, but I merely get generic response. We will see what happens. Frustrated.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback on our game. We will certainly take it into account for future patches. Please do note that while this does not automatically mean that your suggestion will be implemented in the next update, all feedback is highly appreciated! If you need our assistance, please contact our Player Support: http://wargaming.net/support

title: Clapper: Video, Live, Chat
description:
Welcome to Clapper, one of the fastest-growing social media platforms focused on promoting real lives, connections and communities. You can see the latest trends and peopleâ€™s real lives as they unfold, as well as peopleâ€™s opinions and talents. Our mission is to use technology to empower everyone's life, so that everyone has the opportunity to show, the channel to speak, and the possibility to be seen. No troll, no shadow ban. 

-Be heard 
Build up your own following and be an opinion leader. Connect with friends and follow those whose opinions you want to hear. Our â€œClapbackâ€ feature is unique in that you can simply express your opinion and easily view peopleâ€™s opinions with support or opposition. 

- Be seen 
Clapper uses â€˜equal opportunityâ€™ algorithms to show ordinary, real, and diverse communities of people through the sharing of short videos and live streams, Everyone can easily record videos and be a part of the heartbeat of your community. Based on your location things that are local in your area will be aggregated for you as well. 

- Be valued 
Clapper launches live streaming to further increase the timely communication and interaction between creators and users, and add more new ways for creators with a moderate audience to obtain substantial income. With monetization, Clapper now offers a practical path for content creators to sustain themselves on an ad-free short video platform. 

*What can you expect?* 
a) Post Video: Short video is the foundation of Clapper where users can post videos for up to 3 minutes and you also have the option to use our additional features like add text, video trimming, music, and other effects. Interact, sing, dance, talk about your day, send messages to friends and followers. 
b) Radio: Imagine an auditorium but with only vocals. This is the audio-only feature that allows you to create a room of up to 2000 listeners and up to 20 speakers to 'talk'. 
c) Group: Create a community of your super fans where you can share interact 1:1 with them. 

Website: https://clapperapp.com/ 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/theclapperapp 
Instagram: https://instagram.com/theclapperapp 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/theclapperapp 
Email: contact@clapperapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: there are things I like about the app; that it's 18+ the lack of censorship, the ability to grow. but the platform needs SO MUCH IMPROVEMENT. editing tools are non-existent, so I recorded with my phone and upload my edited versions. however, the footage uploaded looks entirely different than what I actually filmed. colors are muted, & the video turns out grainy. don't even get me started on the music selection. there's not a single recognizable song available.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Clapper is built to highlight authenticity, which is why we donâ€™t offer heavy filters or advanced editing tools in-app. We want creators to share real moments. We are exploring ways to improve the experience without losing our core focus. Weâ€™re also working on enhancing video quality and expanding our music library. Thank you for your input!

scraped_reviews.content: There appears to be a bug where views don't always get counted for, example; I'll get a few likes on a video, but the view count stays the same, which makes no sense. Also, it sometimes crashes when I edit videos, but I can easily edit them before uploading to the app, even though that might be an issue for other users that aren't as technologically inclined. There's potential here. You can not create more than 1 account at this time. 1/7/25
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience with us and weâ€™re truly sorry to hear that the app may sometimes experience some technical issues. We want to ensure that everything is addressed immediately. Please reach out to Iya via email at iya@clapperapp.com for technical concerns and she will get in touch with you promptly!

scraped_reviews.content: App won't allow me to create a profile, "opps, something went wrong" error code. Can't create a profile using either of the tree options. What's the point in downloading! Response to Clapper media group 6/27/24, I've deleted and reinstalled your application multiple times in the past and again today. Still nothing happens, my phone is up to date and everything is working fine; with the exception of your app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Luis, We for the troubles in Signing up an account with us. Please try to reinstall the app and try to sign up again. In case you are still facing the problem, let us know at contact@clapperapp.com and we will help you through this process. We'd be happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: Edit: Sounds like a lot of hassle. It would just be easier to delete it and look for something better. Next time make a fully functional app. Just downloaded and tried using ph. number to sign up for an account. Then I entered verification code at sent through text. This is as far as it will let me go because after that it just kept trying to tell me to sign in and I haven't even made a password yet. What's the point in having this app if you can't even sign up for an account?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are very sorry to hear about the difficulties when trying to sign up for an account with us and weâ€™d like to help resolve the issue. To better understand the issue and for a further assistance. Please feel free to provide with any additional details to iya@clapperapp.com, and Iya will help you immediately to get you gain access with the app!

scraped_reviews.content: Terrible algorithm. The more you click "not interested" the more they force the exact same content into your feed. Not worth the download. Likes and follows mean nothing because they force you to view what they want you to view. Even if a "wide variety" of content is available, it forces the same set of videos you've already clicked "not interested" on half a dozen times already
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We know it can be frustrating to see videos youâ€™re not interested in, but we have a wide variety of content on our platform and It can take some time for the algorithm to adjust to a new userâ€™s interests. Try searching topics youâ€™re interested in and following creators youâ€™re interested in.

scraped_reviews.content: Have tried for about a week to get this app to work. Will never let you sign up for an account or load anything, just keeps sending notifications but can't ever open them because the app won't let you sign up, every time I get to the birthdate screen, it says there's an error and won't go any further. I've tried signing up using Google, Facebook and phone number, all 3 same issues. Have reinstalled numerous times with phone restarts between. Totally unusable. Uninstalled and moving on. Bye ðŸ‘‹
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We regret and sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had signing up an account with us.
