title: boohoo â€“ Clothes Shopping
description:
Get ready to revamp your closet with the boohoo app - the ultimate destination for affordable fashion shopping. With just a few taps on your phone, you can explore the latest in women's and men's fashion, accessories, shoes, beauty, and homeware, all in one place.

At boohoo, we understand the importance of convenience when it comes to online shopping. That's why our app offers you an easy-to-use interface, with thousands of products at your fingertips; shop products from boohoo, boohooMAN, Misspap, and Nasty Gal all in one place. You can quickly add your favorite items to your wish list, sign in to your account, and automatically sync your baskets across all devices. With multiple payment options and fast and secure checkout, shopping with boohoo is a breeze.

But that's not all! Our app comes loaded with exclusive features that you won't find anywhere else. Keep track of your orders with unique tracking numbers and receive notifications about the latest collaborations, sale alerts, and exclusive offers.

From date night dress dresses and party outfits to weekday tops and everyday shoes, we've got you covered. Our size-inclusive clothing range includes maternity, plus size, tall, and petite collections, so you can find just what you need, no matter your size.

So what are you waiting for? Download the boohoo app today and discover exclusive deals, discounts, and offers that are too good to miss. With hundreds of new products landing every week, you'll find the trendiest clothing and accessories that will make you stand out from the crowd. Shop now and thank us later!

The boohoo clothing app hotlist:
 â€¢ Fast and secure checkout â€“ shop your latest obsessions & favorite pieces quickly and easily thanks to our multiple payment methods.
 â€¢ Track your order â€“ track it to your door with your unique tracking number.
 â€¢ Wishlist â€“ see it and save it to your wishlist to view again or checkout later.
 â€¢ Notifications â€“ hear about exclusive offers, and the latest collaborations and get sale alerts via app notifications.
 â€¢ Try before you buy â€“ buy now and pay later with the help of our shop now pay later partners.
 â€¢ Step Challenges - we're using Google Fit for our Step Challenges.
descriptionHTML:
Get ready to revamp your closet with the boohoo app - the ultimate destination for affordable fashion shopping. With just a few taps on your phone, you can explore the latest in women's and men's fashion, accessories, shoes, beauty, and homeware, all in one place.

At boohoo, we understand the importance of convenience when it comes to online shopping. That's why our app offers you an easy-to-use interface, with thousands of products at your fingertips; shop products from boohoo, boohooMAN, Misspap, and Nasty Gal all in one place. You can quickly add your favorite items to your wish list, sign in to your account, and automatically sync your baskets across all devices. With multiple payment options and fast and secure checkout, shopping with boohoo is a breeze.

But that's not all! Our app comes loaded with exclusive features that you won't find anywhere else. Keep track of your orders with unique tracking numbers and receive notifications about the latest collaborations, sale alerts, and exclusive offers.

From date night dress dresses and party outfits to weekday tops and everyday shoes, we've got you covered. Our size-inclusive clothing range includes maternity, plus size, tall, and petite collections, so you can find just what you need, no matter your size.

So what are you waiting for? Download the boohoo app today and discover exclusive deals, discounts, and offers that are too good to miss. With hundreds of new products landing every week, you'll find the trendiest clothing and accessories that will make you stand out from the crowd. Shop now and thank us later!

The boohoo clothing app hotlist:
â€¢ Fast and secure checkout â€“ shop your latest obsessions & favorite pieces quickly and easily thanks to our multiple payment methods.
â€¢ Track your order â€“ track it to your door with your unique tracking number.
â€¢ Wishlist â€“ see it and save it to your wishlist to view again or checkout later.
â€¢ Notifications â€“ hear about exclusive offers, and the latest collaborations and get sale alerts via app notifications.
â€¢ Try before you buy â€“ buy now and pay later with the help of our shop now pay later partners.
â€¢ Step Challenges - we're using Google Fit for our Step Challenges.
summary: Shop on-trend, affordable fashion with boohoo! Discover clothing, beauty & more.

scraped_reviews.content: Signed up for the app and was able to look and add items to my cart, but when I went back to the app to purchase the item I had put in my cart and shop some more I was unable to access my account or change my password. It was impossible for me to do anything, it repeatedly showed ( oops, something went wrong). This was very annoying and aggravating, especially for a first time shopper. Rethinking my decision, looking forward about handling future problems. Sincerely yours Diane Smith

This app has always been kind of glitchy, but I've used it anyway & have made who knows how many purchases via Boohoo for years. Lately, it's gotten so bad that I can barely use it. I've started to just shop on other boutiques where I don't have issues because I don't want to deal w/ this annoying app. I can't view my wishlist, I can't add anything to my wishlist. It constantly says, "Oops, something went wrong. Please try again." it's beyond frustrating. Edit: Finally deleted it after 8 months

Disappointed!!! The app is so slow and buggy. I was trying to order a dress that i really liked, and it wasn't allowing me to use paypal nor my card. It was saying it had a problem, please try again later. I am so annoyed that I had to put back my stuff in the wishlist. If i have to go back later to try get the dress, my size will already be sold out. Please fix the app, you're losing sales.

Charges you for "failed process during checkout". They will take your money even though there is no existence of the order, then make you wait over 2 weeks to get your money returned. Gives you an order number that they can't find even tho they charged you the amount for that order number. Doesn't give you all of the items you ordered but charges you for them all. Collar for every single t shirt is too damn tight for plus sizes. Their website AND app has too many errors and bugs, slow.

Disappointed in this app. I have tried 3 times to pay for items and it glitches so bad and then kicks my items out of my shopping cart. So this is the third time I have had to go back through to add the items back. Something that should take me a few minutes has taken hours. I really want the items and am very discouraged from even trying anymore.

Having an absolute nightmare of a time trying to get logged in but out of 3 ways to contact them in the space of a week several times, all I get is ignored and no help at all as reset password isn't working for me. ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ But still I get promotional emails and messages. If I ever get some help again, I may leave a better review. I bet if I was late with a payment I'd be bombarded with emails.

I normally make purchases through the website because the app always state that my wish list is empty when it isn't, and I can't see prices on my wish list items unless I click on the photo, I don't like how there is no listing of your items if it's no longer available. I feel shipping and handling is grossly overpriced and I prefer 50% sale items because it's more cost effective than the " up to 80%" off items.

I had a terrible experience with this app. When I went to go check out my items and put my card info in the app said, "Something went wrong when I didint put any wrong info down. Its also very inconvenient that Boohoo doesn't have a phone number to call if there are any issues happening with ur package. When I emailed boohoo they keep telling my to check my card, or my basket. I did that multiple times and I had not made one mistake. I emailed them again n again n they said the same. ðŸ˜¡ðŸ¤¬

Great app but I find it very slow when filtering categories. Each box takes ages to load when you press it and you have to wait a couple of seconds to press the next box. thats the only downside for me. everything else is great!

Unfortunately most items are now shipped via partner brands. This means no next day delivery and returns cost. So not sure what I'm paying premier for. It should be made clear that branded items charge a return fee before ordering. Not once I got the receipt in the parcel. It's false marketing.

the app seems to be constantly broken. I've uninstalled and reinstalled it 3 times and every time I load the app it doesn't load, it is updated to the latest version too. it never remembers my account. nice clothes but when the app doesn't work to look at them, makes it a bit difficult

Quality of clothes and everything is good. I've ordered 4 items which larger in size. First I returned one item selected inpost and got qr code. then I'm trying to return other items but unable to select carrier. it says no carriers available. It's a nightmare to contact you guys. As a big company you just have two options for return apple message and messenger which is hard to chat and contact you.

been advertising the same jeans on sale for months but when you try to buy says just sold out ! I've emailed you got no response so it's trading standards who need to revisit your tactics. Also tried to get you to stoo marketing me with female offers and goods but no you prefer to annoy with all female deals and offes. Using as last minute option only but not for much longer as soon as next day postage is ended . Aduos m Keep your fake sales !

the app hasn't been loading for weeks, I've uninstalled and reinstalled which got it working but now it's back to not loading or letting me sign in again, I can't keep uninstalling it every time I want to look or shop, please fix the issue

Customer service is terrible. I placed a large order and TWO items were missing. Initially, I thought only one was missing. Snotty response, implying that I lied, no refund. The app itself is okay, if you don't mind paying for items that you don't actually receive.

This app is one of the worst I've used, the moment you add something to the basket it freezes and either you wait anything from 2 to 5 minutes for it to unfreeze or you risk losing your search by hitting back until it works. I gave up in the end and didn't bother to buy anything
I keep having to uninstall the app as it won't log me in. I've never had so much trouble in my life with it. absolutely awful

ngl I don't shop boohoo anymore, it used to be good with a wide range of clothing but now it's always plus size, petite or crop and I'm neither of those. it's annoying when it's a set, but doesn't list/link the other half. I do like how there's other brands now but that's it. ngl I don't see anyone spending Â£1,568 on here though.. the app and website, have an issue with once added to bag it'll take awhile to go back to the exact bit you were on, idk why either but the website is super slow.

Since the updated site nothing works properly. When I've tried to place an order, twice my card has been charged without the order being processed. Have contacted them several times via their different methods and they repeatedly deny there has been a charge so haven't refunded my money!

The payment option is currently unavailable remaining greyed out ... on two android which appears to be a system failure. Despite a previous email to customer service, no response has been received. Addressing this issue promptly would be beneficial.

new app is awful. boohoo refunded me a gift certificate that i I can't even spend because the new app asks for a pin, and i haven't been sent a pin. I've been stuck for days while everything I want goes out of stock because I can't use my gift certificate to pay. having no luck getting help from customer service about how I am supposed to spend the gift certificate if they haven't provided ne with a pin to use it. the new app also doesn't have size guide/measurements for items
please I have returned some items but have not received a confirmation as to whether you have received it or not. the contact section in the app is not working

I spent 3 days trying to log into established boohoo account for which I've paid premier delivery. No help from retail agent. Ignored my messages on Facebook. Had to check out as a guest and pay additional delivery cost for item I wanted. Reluctant to shop here again...
Awful support. Returns are an absolute nightmare and support is no help.

The app itself is not great. I uninstalled last year for problems. Reinstalled today and the exact same problems are still happening. Extremely long loading times when trying to edit or delete items in your wish-list, continuous crashing and overall buggy. Edit 2025: I don't know how but the app is even worse now. Won't favourite anything and error occurs so that wishlist doesn't load. Glitchy buggy and horrible, how do people use this app at all???

I love Boohoo, great deals and some clothes for a good price. But the app is rubbish. I was scrolling through, putting different items on my wishlist to pick through once I was done. But when I clicked on the wishlist it would show me none of my items, they weren't there. So unless I wanted to scroll through hundreds of clothes again, I'd lost them. This isn't the only issue. When I tried to pay for a couple things neither my card or my Paypal were accepted (& there's nothing wrong with my card)

Takes 20 minutes to load (if it even loads at all). When and IF it finally loads, it is pretty easy to use and order from. Most of the good deals are exclusive to the app so you don't want to order via the website as an alternative. But on the plus side, it's probably saved me hundreds of Â£ because I've just got frustrated and left the order. To whoever is reading at Boohoo, get your app to load and you will make money.

This website is absolutely terrible, you can be 30 minutes into scrolling, select an item to view in more detail, click back to the items to continue shopping and its taken you RIGHT back to the very beginning! Every single time, boohoo has just lost my custom for this reason. Sort your app out immediately, I haven't got time to spend half the night trying to get back to where I was every single time I try to buy an item. This needs serious attention.

Absolute rubbish app. Doesnt recognise my password on a regular basis. Each time i need to use the app, i have to reset the password, EVERYTIME. its a joke. Also they list items that are not available. Why list them if they are not available.?? Quality of the clothes are dire in some cases, worse than a thin rag, worth throwing away. Bits coming apart. Other cases the clothes are not too bad. So its a mixed bag, luck of the draw. Also the sizes can defer from item to item. Size not accurate.

get fed up shopping on this app as whenever I look at an item or add it to basket, as soon as I go back to keep scrolling it takes me right back to the top again! It's so frustrating having to continously scroll down to where you left off, especially if I've browsed a lot of items. Most of the time I just give up & don't bother buying anything because I'm annoyed. There is another, similar shopping app that has the same problem.

Always loved the app, but even after updating, it keeps on glitching and refuses to go back in properly. Also, an issue with gift cards - have been told to rather use the website, as the app makes using gift cards impossible! This is made even more frustrating, as my phone keeps opening the app, rather than logging onto the website! I just can't win ðŸ˜•
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Mary-Anne, we're sorry to hear you've not had the best experience with our app. We noticed some of our users having the same problem so made sure to investigate and get the issue fixed. You can also now checkout with your gift card so make sure you update the app to the latest version to get the best experience. Love, boohoo x

scraped_reviews.content: Really disappointing. Lost all of my favourites. Just says theres an error and try again. Been saying that since before xmas. Customer services not interested and told me to just find the stuff using search and buy that way. But I obviously can't remember everything I've saved. That's why I saved it! Such a shame as I like the clothes but they're obviously not interested in keeping Customers.

EXTREMELY frustrating to use. APP IS NOT user friendly. If no stars is an option, that would have been more truthful. Keeps saying "oops something went wrong. Please try again" over and over again everytime you try to add items in cart or wishlist. How do you expect customers to browse and then purchase your items? Please do better.

The clothes and prices are great. The app is so bad it's almost traumatic to use, I need anger management classes after using it. In short, It prevented me from making an account, so I saved items as a guest and when I was finally able to make an account they all disappeared. It then refused to let me log in, the password link only took me to the homepage and even when I worked out how to reset it still didn't work and every. single. page. was so slow. Would rather sew the clothes myself.

Not a fan now. The app/web shows you a price for something and when you go into the product the price is higher. Blatant false advertising. I asked the question and was told "it's because our prices change often" but the same jumper on the app before you click it to pick a size is â‚¬16.80 and when you go into the jumper every colour/size it's â‚¬21.80 for days now, no price changes, just want to get you in and hope you don't see the price is different until after you've ordered. Poor form!

Boohoo I'm really disappointed with the app. I save items to my basket, then later find they have dissaperared and my basket is empty. This has happened several times since I have used your service and it's really upsetting as I cannot locate the items again. Please can you sort this out and I will be a very happy customer!! Thank you.

I see some lovely prints in your plus sizes, could you please make them in smaller sizes too. Also there does seem to be a problem with your website, it refuses to let me on it, I have to come out of it numerous times and I eventually get on it, but it could take hours, I've even uninstalledl the app but it changed nothing after reinstalling it. Very slow frustrating process.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Gill, we're always trying to provide our customers with the latest fashion trends at a high quality so keep looking at our New In so you don't miss out. As for the issues you've faced with the app loading, we investigated what was going on and made some fixes, and you should see some improvements with the latest update. Love, boohoo x

scraped_reviews.content: Currently not impressed. Most of the products are out of stock. Everytime I see something I finally like, the size 12's are always out! I was waiting, hoping they'd restock. But, I've just been informed that they only restock certain items and rarely, meaning that my products of choice will be gone. Not the biggest problem of course, but incredibly disheartening once you've got your heart set on something! I can rarely find anything I like to purchase!!

Absolutely terrible recently, app gets stuck on the loading screen and no matter how many times I restart it it doesn't work, I just have to come back to it hours later and hope it's resolved itself, by which point typically my "limited time offer code" will have expired, so I end up not purchasing. I have tried force quitting and restarting app, clearing the cache, uninstalling and reinstalling, nothing has resolved this issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Rebecca, we're sorry to hear you faced issues with the app loading, we investigated what was going on and made some fixes, and you should see some improvements with the latest update. Love, boohoo x

scraped_reviews.content: I've used the app for sometime and it's worked fine but recently it's refusing to open. All troubleshooting tips haven't resolved the issue. Uninstall/reinstall. Clear cache, cookies, etc. Force close. Using on an Android phone and have checked if there's an update which there isn't. Device is fully updated too. Please fix this. I will eventually uninstall if not fixed as it's just wasting my space.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Samantha, we're sorry to hear you've had troubles using our app, that's not the experience we expect for our users. The team investigated what was going on and made some fixes, so make sure you update to the latest version to make the most of the app. Love, boohoo x

scraped_reviews.content: The app hasnt worked sinde november despite several updates. It gets stuck on the loading screen most of the time. If I manage to get into it through the website version, it won't let me login and if I eventually am able to login, it doesnt save my likes and then logs me out. I've paid for the year long next day delivery but have had to go to other websites for Christmas orders so it has gone to waste.

There some areas that really bug me. 1. The clothing "descriptions" are the same across all items in a category eg jackets. So you can't find out much specific details about an item. 2. I think I remember there used to be a feature of promoting 'other items in this photo', which was great for getting the Whole outfit look, knowing things would match. That feature is not here, would love to see it! 3. Sometimes you just can't open the app. It just shows the Boohoo logo.

Frustrating! Sometimes my wish list is there, sometimes it isn't! More often than not I can't load it. It just pops up 'oops something went wrong'. I spent ages looking for holiday clothes and added loads to my list that now aren't there so was a total waste of time! Also, you can't just tap on the love heart to add it to your list. You have to click on the item of clothing, then tap the love heart. Then good luck getting back to where you were! Also shows out of stock items. CBA now

This app needs to take a leaf out of Shein's book and learn a thing or two. It's absolutely terrible. Say you're scrolling through pages of results then you randomly get logged out or there's an error and you have to start right from the beginning. It's absolutely abysmal. Also, why can't we just see the sizes actually available instead of having to add the item to our basket first? Better off looking on my laptop. Please improve the app!

App needs to be brought up to date. Sizing should be available to see on the item rather than having to "add to basket" to see the available sizes. That's just so weird. If items are out of stock, again, you only know when you "add to basket". Considering you have so many items, they need to load quicker and have an option to see more on a page. At times, the struggle is real, and even the app gives up, just loads, and nothing comes up. Then you have to shut the whole app & start again. ðŸ™„

The app keeps loading but never actually gets to the shopping section. It's been like this since last year. I've uninstalled and reinstalled, made sure it's up to date and still nothing is working. It once took me almost half an hour to get to the shopping section. Not good at all. Used to work great but with the last few updates it's to just useless. Please sort out the issue.

Paid for premium, didn't receive my order the next day, was advised by customer service that I need to click next day even though I have premier membership, the next time I ordered I can't find an option for next day, only to find out it's not available in my postcode. not something I was advised of when I purchased and paid for premium. Also can't click on previous order items to go to them to reorder, have to search for them (as they can't amend orders you have to cancel and reorder).

After you click on an item to view or add to basket and go back to the search list it takes you right back to the top, everytime! When you've scrolled down a fair bit this is very annoying and I give up looking. Also, it takes so long to delete/change stuff in your wishlist. I've got hundreds of items in there and most are out of stock now but it takes so long to delete just 1 item I don't bother. I'd be there all day if I wanted to clear it. Needs tick boxes so you can delete more than 1.

This is a great app, with amazing deals and great alerts especially for those impulsive buyers (Guilty). Brilliant range for the petite and Larger ladies, with endless great choices in different variations of up to date fashion. Three stars where I would usually give 4.5 as the app isn't working in the normal way, which makes browsing less desirable and takes longer. Come on IT team ... Fix the issue to up the rating.

I was having trouble processing my order online on my laptop for days so thought I'd try the app. although I had to search everything up I at least still had the items in my wishlist and found them no trouble. There was no problem with the ordering process and was able to checkout quickly. Definitely more effective than the website, except the pain of only seeing a few things at a time

scraped_reviews.content: I had created a return item, which hasn't been picked up for more than 1 month. I have raised multiple complaints at chat support with each representative claimed to be solved in the next 2 3 days but still the item is not picked up and my refund amount is stuck.. it's pathetic that I have to face this issue whereas Im the one following every other day with them to pickup the item
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello, We're truly sorry to hear about the unfortunate experience you've had. To resolve this issue and provide you with the assistance you need, we kindly ask you to contact Trendyol Assistant.

If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

All the best,
Your Trendyol Team

scraped_reviews.content: worst online shopping experience ever, sending wrong products, and when it comes to return they ask for shipment fees, in addition to lots of products have wrong description on the app! I'll never use this app ever again! reply to you reply: I've already contacted the trendyol assistant , and I'm totally not satisfied with the outcome!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello, We're truly sorry to hear about the unfortunate experience you've had. To resolve this issue and provide you with the assistance you need, we kindly ask you to contact Trendyol Assistant.

If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

All the best,
Your Trendyol Team

scraped_reviews.content: Good app. The discount and offers were great when it started. I have stopped ordering since I noticed the price variation. The price shown on the product page is inclusive of VAT minus discount, but when the same product is added to the cart the price increases! What kind of math is this?
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello, We're truly sorry to hear about the unfortunate experience you've had. To resolve this issue and provide you with the assistance you need, we kindly ask you to contact Trendyol Assistant.

If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

All the best,
Your Trendyol Team

scraped_reviews.content: The product I ordered came different from description, I ordered a refund, but had 10 euro deducted from refund amount, just because. Notifications cannot be switched off, so I get notified about some product I once viewed around 20 times a day. In general the app is good, but some things could be improved. I hated being charged 10 euro for basically sponsoring a lying seller, and seeing no punishment for the seller whatsoever. Uninstalling because of absolute lack of care.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:

descriptionHTML:
Looking for WW2 first person shooter games around? Battle players from around the world in a crazy WWII-era online first person shooter game!
Destroy the enemy and survive tank battles in the center of Berlin and other cities. Participate in team and deathmatch battles, plant bombs and defend them, take part in world war massive warfare!

Why you'll love playing World War Heroes first person shooter:
âœ¯ Play on 12+ legendary WWII battle warzones!
âœ¯ 4 types of combat equipment from the USA, USSR, Japan and Germany!
âœ¯ Enjoy 6 dynamic shooter game modes and even create Custom Games with your own rules.
âœ¯ Operate your own tank on the battlefield!
âœ¯ 100+ unique weapon types: pistols, sniper rifles, machine guns, shotguns and more!

Rules of war:

âœ¯ Team deathmatch!
Two teams fight for domination. The team with the highest score at the end of the round wins;

âœ¯ Death match!
World at war! You fight for yourself. Player with the highest score wins the round;

âœ¯ Point capture!
Both teams capture points on the map that give them battle points. The team with the highest score wins the round;

âœ¯ HQ defense!
Each team must protect their own headquarters and destroy the enemy one;

âœ¯ Capture the flag!
Capture the flag of the enemies' team and bring it to your base. The team that brings more flags to the base wins the battle;

âœ¯ Team battle!
Two teams fight each other with no respawns. The team which has at least one member alive wins;

âœ¯ Officer defense
Each team must protect its own officer and destroy the enemy one;

âœ¯ Custom mode!
Your game - your rules! Play your way! Create a lobby, invite friends and enjoy the warzone!

HUGE ARSENAL OF WEAPONS!
All sorts of new weapons will be available to help your team come out on top. Use the whole arsenal, featuring machine guns, grenades, rifles, sniper rifles, bazookas, etc.

AMAZING GRAPHICS AND OPTIMIZATION!
Dive into online shooter combat with crisp graphics and intuitive controls.

UPGRADE ARMOR AND WEAPONS!
Build your dream arsenal by upgrading damage and max ammo and decreasing kickback and reload time!

DAILY REWARDS!
Play pvp shooter every day to earn prizes and get daily tasks and tons of free stuff!
Complete daily tasks and upgrade your gear!

You will love World War Heroes first person shooter action game if you are a fan of tactical realistic PVP shooters, world war shooting games, and multiplayer online army battle games!

WW2 FPS game is specially optimized to work on both strong and weaker mobile devices!
Action shooting game is absolutely free to download!
GOOD LUCK, SOLDIER!

summary: Legendary tactical shooter with players around the world! Thrilling 5v5 battles!

scraped_reviews.content: I love the game! I spent a lot of money getting my new weapons it's not understandable how you put people over level 50 and 55 up against people that are under 50 their armor is better try to choose who you put in a battlefield little wiser so it's fair. the new dice game is good I paid the $9.99 to get the plus three times so far it's still not enough dice to get the top stuff you guys are cheap x4 is mote like i double the compases get rid of the b******* and put all compasses on every square.

I've been playing this game for a few months now and use to love it, i even spent a couple bucks and was ready to invest more, after these last couple of weeks, I refuse to waste anymore money. The last 2 weeks this game as been so glitchie, characters freezing, characters movie on their own in whatever direction. Molotovs thrown but no fire, grenades with no explosions. Im trying to shoot the enemy but my character tries to stab them. Im going to give this game a few more days b4 I delete it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Try reinstalling the game and rebooting the device, setting max FPS to "30", making sure your internet connection is stable and changing the graphics settings to min. If this does not solve the issue, contact us via worldwarheroes@azurgames.com and describe it in details, mentioning your device and attaching screenshots\screenrecords

scraped_reviews.content: so far I am enjoying the game very much. perhaps a little unpolished but, still good as far as mobile shooters are concerned. that being said I do have one major complaint. the game tends to want to respawn the player right in front of enemies, particularly enemy tanks. I lost track of how many times I instantly died as a result of this during just A single match. fix this and id gladly make it a 5.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Greetings! It's wonderful to hear that you're enjoying the game! We appreciate your feedback regarding respawning mechanics and the impact it has on gameplay. Your insights are valuable and will help us enhance the experience for all players. Thank you for sharing!

scraped_reviews.content: Ads makevit unplayable. some of them are so long that the game literally resets itself and you don't even get the reward that you were supposed to for watching the stupid ad. I cannot find a way to remove the really long ads. I used to really like this game but if I can't figure out a way to change that in the next few days it will be getting deleted.

updated the game in 27June, now I experience more bugs. the players generate, but the map doesn't so I can't see if im behind cover or running into a wall. also, I got in a tank and I froze and began to sink. I sunk to where I couldn't be killed by another player, I could only quit. enemies are also not indicated as enemies with the exception of the curser turning red, so there is no "auto aiming" with the advanced game play and no "auto shooting" with simplified gameplay.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Please try reinstalling the game and restarting your device to see if this solves the problem. If not, please email us at worldwarheroes@azurgames.com with your device make and model, ID, description of the issue, and screenshots or recordings if possible.

scraped_reviews.content: Okay, it's been 2 yrs of playing this game, and I love it. I play ad much ad possible. Graphics have gotten better, the movement, the background noise and Weapons have gotten better. My only concern is the server cutting out in the middle of the game or, the game itself freezing. When it's going smooth there isn't problems. Another concern of mine is the pricing of weapons, avatars, equipment accessories, and weapons upgrade. You should back on the prices of everything so people will buy more.

This game used to be fun and I would play for hours a week. Now unless you spend money on upgrades it is no longer enjoyable. Players who purchase guns just walk around killing everyone. You can shoot a player multiple times in the back of the head with virtually no damage, only to have him turn around and kill you instantly. Unless matchups are changed i will cease playing
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Don't feel like you have to donate in order to keep up. We understand that everyone has different playing styles and priorities, so we offer a range of options for you to earn in-game rewards. From treasure chests, to ad views, and contracts. There's no shortage of opportunities to grow and compete with other players! Good luck!

scraped_reviews.content: I've enjoyed this game for the action game play and variety of weapon options. Over time it has added more and more layers of tasks and challenges to progress if you don't want to spend a bunch of money. The last update finally went too far for me-- I was locked out from playing because I needed "Level 2" but there was no obvious way to play and achieve "Level 2" without paying to play. Uninstalled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! If the issue persists, please email us at worldwarheroes@azurgames.com with a detailed description of your situation, including screenshots or screen recordings, and your ID and device model. We will do our best to solve the problem!

scraped_reviews.content: It's a fun game and all, until you get past rank 4. Everyone uses the "rental" guns and destroy everyone else. It takes so long to get money that I started to lose interest in the game. You can use 30 rounds in the back of someone's head but you'll still be the one to die first. Even for real money, the guns are ridiculously priced. The gameplay is a good, fast pace. One round lasts about 5 minutes, which is perfect. The idea of contracts to swap game cash for gold is good.

Totally a pay to win game. There is absolutely no way to stay at a level that will allow you to compete unless you spend cash since the top tier weapons and armor are ONLY AVAILABLE FOR CASH. Great realism, control, and gameplay. The graphics and options allow you to customize the interface to suit. Overall, used to be a great game. The last major update to the game has effectively negated most of the years of play. GAME UNINSTALLED...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Ingame purchases only accelerate your progress. The game has many ways to get both gold and equipment: viewing ads, BP tasks, chests, contracts etc. If you are an active player, then you can safely compete with paying players.

scraped_reviews.content: Game isn't bad.. But the offers n pay options could be cheaper... 1 Last..but VERY IMPORTANT!! If we could sell old equipment to help upgrade the new, would be better than spending $$..just to find a cheaper weapon works better. Upon a further, in-depth research n game play, I'm forced to lower my rating. Mainly because of the upgrade system.. It's pretty much like playing the lottery. I had 16 weapon upgrades...which was spent to only gain 2 upgraded slots..

Long review short; nice graphics, ok controls, unbalanced gameplay (i.e. a pistol dealing more damage per second than an automatic weapon), crashes several times, and pay-to-win (people with money can buy the best gear to have unfair advantage over other players that don't waste money). They say that this game is an editor's choice, but they mentioned about "realitic" gameplay and "historically accurate" weapons, which is contrary to the truth.

Great graphics, hard to move though, feels a little too mechanical, need more ammo too, but over all great time killer. This game is starting to glitch more mad more everyday, my kills are delayed, and I end up getting killed while in a glitch, it's like I have no armor, get oneshot, bang, I'm dead, I love to play this game but the more I upgrade my weapons it's seems like, the less effective they are, I'm spending real money for a better gaming experience, thinking about uninstalling.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We want to help you return to enjoying the game as soon as possible. Try reinstalling the game and restarting your device. If the issue remains, email us at worldwarheroes@azurgames.com with all the necessary details, device information, ID, and screenshots/recordings. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to assisting you.

scraped_reviews.content: It doesn't seem like there's any real multiplayer or ways to play any other game mode. It throws you in a game almost immediately every time and all the "players" are very clearly bots with obvious auto generated names. And another thing, SO MANY GUN SKINS ARE OVER 100 DOLLARS!!!. I don't think I saw one less than $80.It sucks because the graphics and controls are great and the is movement smooth. Please add a real multiplayer, and lower the amount of micro transactions.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Since the game is developing and changing, we are sometimes forced to introduce changes to in-game purchases as well. Ingame purchases only accelerate your progress. The game has many ways to get both credits and gold: viewing ads, BP tasks, chests, contracts etc. Thank you for understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: Started playing this game about 2 weeks ago and loved it. Grinding away and building my player, made level 30 in 2 weeks already and everything was going great. That is until tonight, didnt understand why I shot one guy point blank 4 times with a shotgun, he wasnt even moving. Literally the very next battle someone else jumped through the walls while 3 teammates were shooting her point blank. Come to find out it was hackers hacking the game, takes all the fun out of it....completely!!!

Where to begin? I randomly get kicked out of matches, it's not my side, the game crashes, it's ENTIRELY P2W. Trust me all the best guns in the game are $70+. If ur willing to spend that to be considered "good" then more power to you, point is it takes no skill. Gold takes forever to come by, u need hundreds and sometimes thousands of it to make a single purchase or upgrade, not to mention it'll take you *months* to get it all back. Do NOT RECOMMEND.

paying players VS non paying players. Its really not cool playing against people with lvl 9-14 weapons when I've got 1 lvl 4 weapon. I get that there aren't many people playing but that type of difference in "experience" is just going to continue to run people off. There is no way to configure the controller/buttons. The auto aim is atrocious and fights against you for head shots. No jumping... EVERYTHING is in your way (as if a human can't step over a log or brick). why would someone pay?

Latest update caused a lot of issues. The main two being that whenever I pick up a weapon during game play, my POV goes haywire and spins all over and it takes a few seconds to regain control and in that time I'm almost always killed. The second is half of the time I do no damage whatsoever to the people I'm shooting at but take damage and get killed. It's very frequent that this happens and makes the game unplayable. Please fix these two problems because I love this game!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Please contact us via worldwarheroes@azurgames.com and describe the situation in details, mentioning your device, in-game ID and attaching screenshots\screenrecords.

scraped_reviews.content: Game can be fun, however, players who obviously have money to spend on upgrades will dominate and that takes the fun out of it, as it's a handicap. Unload a clip and don't kill enemy, get shot once, and you die. Earning or paying for upgarde points is rough when not every upgrade attempt is successful. Bottom line, if you want to play and keep the game developers rich, this is the game because they want you to spend your money on this game. It's fun to play while taking a dump ðŸ’©

I spent several thousand maxing out weapons. I enjoyed the game until as a high level the game isn't about skill but spending. Latest update still has messed the game up for weeks now. Weapons stop firing mid way through a clip, clan bonus are not always on, still some issues with getting into matches. I spent a lot to be frustrated if not altogether sidelined. Emailed technical support and never got a response. I deleted everything off my phone this morning. The game is genuinely not worth it.

In the early stages when it's more even, at it's core, it's a very well developed game. I think jumping and taking cover should be added, and it is a bit pay-to-win which puts people like me who are on the cheap side (especially for a phone game) at a disadvantage. However, I still have fun playing it when I want a shooter on the go. PvP is a great time killer!

The game itself isn't bad. Though there are more issues and bugs that I can count. The hit reg is terrible you shoot someone and around three seconds later they die. I don't know if this is just lag. You are rewarded when you watch the forced at after each round. So the devs are not crazy greedy. Overall would recommend if you think you would enjoy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please try reinstalling the game and rebooting the device, switching on V-sync, making sure your internet connection is stable and changing the graphics settings to min. If this will not solve the issue contact us via worldwarheroes@azurgames.com and describe it in details, mentioning your device, in-game ID and attaching screenshots\screenrecords.

scraped_reviews.content: Decent graffics, great layout, and is pretty fun for a while. After lvl 30, the game gets impossible to win if you don't spend money. Getting more armor after leveling up is stupid, this is the 1940s (armor wasn't a thing). Bullets should do the same damage, no matter what you do to the weapon. Get rid of upgrading weapons, armor, and the impossible prices on weapons and I'll be interested in playing again. Until then, 1 star and deleting the app.

Super fun game, good controls and graphics. I've put many hours into it along with buying in-game stuff. However, it takes a ridiculous amount to kill enemies if you don't pay money. In other words, pay to win. What's worse-- prices are outrageous. A few of the weapons are $50-$90. That's more then a brand new video game worked on by a studio for 5 years. Ridiculous. Nonetheless, fun game.

I do have to say I agree with some reviews in that it is hard to get a good weapon without paying. Also, I have a mid range device (galaxy, not a flagship, but a galaxy none the less), but it is so slow in the loading and the game play. Often times running at sub- 20fps. Fix please! Other than that it has a lot of potential.

I'm an avid player of this game and used to be a fun game. Now you can barely upgrade anything unless it's under level 5 after having 8 different weapon upgrades, all were failures. I can see 3-5 failures but 8 in a row? Nope. The AI of the game is horrible now. You can be blasting someone in the face with a shotgun and it doesnt hardly hurt them game is getting ludicrous. I used to buy gold packs, no more though. Like I said....used to be fun. Now....its getting bad.

Gun will fire after reload automatically and you can't stop it. (So basically you're wasting ammo) Most players hide inside tanks to rack up kills because 9 times out of 10 you will re spawn right in front of them!!! The concept is neat, graphics are okay...EVERYTHING ELSE is ABSOLUTELY GARBAGE ðŸ—‘!!! I would recommend you don't waste your time with this trash...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We're sorry you're not satisfied. Could you please describe the things you dislike in detail? You can contact us via worldwarheroes@azurgames.com. We're constantly working on new updates and will pass your request to the developers team.

scraped_reviews.content: This game started off as most, you learn and play and your equipment isn't any good and you will lose often. You earn exp and credits slowly and gold is difficult without paying. The combat is horrible now, I watched old videos and it looked fun. People died and guns worked, anymore the game bugs out, people don't die, and once I hit level 20 ALL I FIGHT are people with one shot kill sniper rifles and +10 or higher premium weapons. It's not fun once you hit level 20. Why is this? This is unacceptable and I almost put money on this game until I saw everyone with one shot kill weapons. It's unplayable. Fix your game and balance the weapons. Edit: Modern Strike is fairly balanced, the level system works properly, and you don't fight people who never die. The same developers and this game was ruined. Make is like Modern Strike, that game is fun and works properly...

World War Hero's gameplay is surprisingly good. There's less maps than I'd like to see, though, and I imagine they'll get tiring quick. The developer has done a good job with the tier structure, and being able to unlock better weapons as xp progresses. As long as he has the daily deals/prizes (today it was a Tommy Gun for 24 hrs), I'll keep coming back here instead of Critical Ops or PUBG.

Very fun game for the most part. Big problem I have is with the tanks, a tank should not be able to kill you when it fires and your like 50ft behind or even way off to the side " not in line of fire" and you dir. game would be more fun without the tanks, or at least tone the damage down. Also, I lose more points for team losing than you sometimes get from winning. You get with some bad groups,and you lose too many points. I've been stuck at gold V for 2 weeks, and it's getting ridiculous.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Write to us at worldwarheroes@azurgames.com and tell us about these difficulties. Please include your ID in the email. Our specialists will do their best to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: I have really liked this game for a year, I do not spend money on games and at first everything was fair and good, then my eyes lingered on other games for a while and then when I got back too it everything was different, for the better and worse. I accepted the change and liked it but then after a freakin' 20 games I realized that there was no way I could win or even get beyond 10 kills. I won't spend money so I can't get better. If you have money to spend, great this game would be awesome ðŸ‘Œ!

The game plays bad witch figures because it's a mobile game trying to have a decent first person shooter gameplay. I am always the only good one on a team and would have all the other teams kills combined in the end. The biggest problem is whether i can mak it to you the end of the game, the connection broke so easily and i lagged out 2/3 games. The game made no attempt at trying to reconnect or give me the so far gained rewards of that game (i might have had 7 kills near the end).

I would give it no stars if i could. I have a total gameplay time of almost 7,000 hours. I played every day for at least a year putting up with the the cheaters. But once you get to the level 40 and up the cheating with modified apps becomes to much. In a typical game you can expect at least HALF are cheating. You can look it up on youtube. "Mod menu for world war heroes gameplay" and see for yourself. Otherwise this could be one of the best fps games ever.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! The game is constantly being fixed and updated, currently, we are working on improving the anti-hack system. Please contact us via worldwarheroes@azurgames.com and describe the problem with hackers in detail, providing screenshots/screen recordings and IDs. We'll do our best to help!

scraped_reviews.content: Great game honestly. Fun to play. The prices of weapons are pretty ridiculous and really seems to fall in to the pay-to-win category. Gameplay: Â¹One thing that is kind of annoying is even though you take cover behind a wall you still take hits and die. Not realistic. Â²Having 2 people in a tank option would really be awsome. One to drive and operate the cannon and one to operate the machine gun. Â³A jump feature would be cool. This would add more depth.

Fun and captivating. War buffs will enjoy it. *EDIT* They've done updates to improve gameplay. Sometimes it starts skipping after playing a couple of games. It's also too expensive to upgrade the class of players. Costs thousands in gold which you can only get by spending real money. I don't have that to spend on a game when a loaf of bread and a gallon of gas costs $4-$5. I've done the work to reach a certain level, but now all my players can't upgrade their classes because of cost.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Making a donation only speeds up your progress, it's not the only way to get ahead in the game. There are plenty of other ways to earn in-game gold and gear, like daily rewards, watching ads, seasonal challenges, and more. So, if you're an active player, you can still compete with the players who choose to donate. Good luck!

scraped_reviews.content: Don't get me wrong, the game is amazing, especially for a mobile game, I really like it and I've been playing for 2-3 years. One thing I can't get over is the Pay to win bias that is widespread. You can have low-ranking players with high rank weapons and they would just ruin the games because players who are actually trying to make effort can't be successful. Besides that the controls are a bit wonky but they work most of the time. Great game otherwise!

This is the first time I've actually reviewed a game. I was really excited when I downloaded this game, and it was downright awesome when I began playing it. Then, after I made rank 10 I began another game. I was absolutely astonished at the level of cheating players; weapons fired infinitely, they would literally teleport behind you, infinite number of explosives, etc. I watched someone blow up a tank by JUMPING onto ii until it blew up! Overall I'm really bummed. Definitely not reinstalling.

A bit unfair. Hands down, i like the concept of the game, its just that its basically a pay-to-win style of game.people who really want to pay up get exclusive items that free players like me can never save up for. Also, gold is really hard to get, abd the only way to get it right now is to watch ads without paying, which is really annoying, and even if you do decide that you're gonna save up for something, it does not give you a lot of gold. If you dont waste your life saving up, or you happen to have money, there is no way you're gonna win, even on the tanks. Just, at least fix matchmaking and this game will be way better.

Was going good until it became the typical cash grab and play to win game, doesnt matter if your good or not as long as the other player has better EQ you're going to lose. Prices are extremely high I could buy a game on steam for these prices even with the contracts they offer to be able to unlock them. Gameplay and interface is great though.

It would be a great game, but something is consistently wrong with the servers. My connection is often lost in the middle of the round making it that much harder to earn gold and credits to upgrade weapons, which is already very difficult without spending a fortune in real cash. Surprised at how good the reviews are actually for these reasons.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Please try reinstalling the game and rebooting your device. If this doesn't solve the issue contact us via worldwarheroes@azurgames.com and describe it in detail, attaching screenshots\screenrecords, mentioning your device, in-game ID, and mail address you are using for the game. We will try to resolve this issue as soon as possible :)

scraped_reviews.content: Um it's alright outside of people cheating and hacking the game, besides it glitching terrible bad. Outside of the load time when you die takes about 30 seconds which takes away from the play time instead of automatically spawning, instead of a time limit for a team to get a certain amount of kills. It's just that.. okay. Nothing great. Nothing that I could see myself continually playing because the speed of this game is very very slow, which in turn makes it really really boring. Not to mention as well. It takes about TWO hours just to make enough money to buy a gun which most of them cost GOLD to do so. And once you run out of gold the game FORCES you to buy it, otherwise you will continue to stay stuck playing with really advanced players that have much better guns due to them buying the gold to get better guns Oh and in order to upgrade the gun you really can't. The game will give you only one upgrade point to upgrade your gun and when you spend it, it may be a successful upgrade or it may be unsuccessful. Which if it isn't successful, then it will ask you if you want to spend 130 gold to try again. Honestly guys it's just not worth it. If you want something challenging, this game isn't it. If you want to play a game that won't cheat you this game isn't it. If you want to watch a 45 second ad to earn gold or money lol this game seriously isn't it. The glitching of the game alone will have you very upset then you have cheating players from across the world that knows how to hack into the game. For instance someone on your team will send you a message that says hacked and then they will kill you but you can't kill them because... You are team mates.. The game HAD potiental. But just not enough to keep my attention. Good luck uninstalling

I am no longer have9ng fun with this game. Why you may ask? Because it puts you in games with people at your level. This is an issue because it strips any chance of you getting kills. It becomes no challenge, but absolute impossible unless you get better at the game every rank. I wish there was an option to where you can play with completely random ranked players. It gets worse when the other players have in app purchases, which means now they have good guns, and I am left with a Winchester. This dosent only apply to this game. PUBG does the same thing, and now that game is less fun for me. Overall not a bad game but is no longer fun because of the ranking system.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! If you experience any issues with the game, please, contact our support team via email: wwh-support@ll-games.com

scraped_reviews.content: 2 years later and the gun is still fun, unbalanced, laggy even at lowest graphics and fast internet, pistols like snipers, assaults with snipers, medics with ARs. Crazy! I'd like to play but it lags and glitches, some times I spawn with 0 ammo. Hopefully this gets corrected. From 5/5 to 1/5 because I cannot enjoy the game anymore. I have an idea. Create a paid lobby and a free lobby! I would purchase in game items if corrected. Thanks.

Good game but it does have its flaws. Im pretty new to the game and so i didnt know how much the newcweapons would cost. I thought they would be free but sadly that not the case, and so i spent my money before i could get the weapons i leveled up to. Maybe lower the price of the weapons by half, and more maps need vehicles (personal opinion) i played 1 match that had a tank and it was fun, didnt last long because of the lack of ammo sadly. Overall a good balanced game with some price issues

Not a game for college students trying to make ends meet. Everything is expensive in this game! Once you reach level 30, you are placed in battle with players at levels 35+ with fancy, expensive weapons, which manipulates you into buying guns to increase your chances at winning rounds. Addicting, expensive and manipulative design.

Having issues connecting to the server after this latest update. It's a great game though! One of the best mobile FPS games I played. The worst part about it is that it's definitely a pay to play a game. Unless you spend the $60 on good tier weapons, you have to rely strictly on strategic ambushes. Wish you could talk to your team during the game as well. It would be fantastic if we could purchase during warm up!

This ain't the first Azur game I've played. Infinity Ops had a lot of potential but didn't follow through since too many things cost too much, and upgrades aren't guaranteed. Plus, lot of P2W involved after reaching a certain point.That kinda set that game aside from the truly good ones. Yeah, this one is actually worse. I've seen prices for weapons that put quite the hole in your wallet. Spawns are bad. Ads are bad. Seriously, are you guys at Azur even trying to make this game good?

The game is great. it plays smoothly, it runs well, easy to play, similar to like a Call of Duty game (let me rephrase that) also the Graphics are really good. it's a game you should play for an online shooter. [P.S. those who were criticizing for having too much glitches keep in mind make sure that you clear your storage beacuse that way it'll be much easier to play and run faster, had to do the same thing, trust me I know.

Hi,   This happened to me last month as well.  I was playing a game and in the middle of it all of a sudden no one was able to shoot. Now every time I log on it's like I'm playing offline. I can only go against bots. I get this error message when trying to Squad with someone. Every match I play there is 0 points awarded for my clan points.  You guys told me it was something wrong on my end last time. But I've already uninstalled the app and reinstalled. Cleared the cache and data. I
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Please contact our tech support via worldwarheroes@azurgames.com and describe the situation in detail mentioning your device, in-game ID and attaching screenshots / screen recordings. We'll do our best to help you!

scraped_reviews.content: This game is good and all, but it's ruined by microtransactions and an impossible amount of grinding needed to actually progress. I can't count how many times my team has lost a match because someone (two or more in the worst cases) had a collectible weapon. It ruins the experience for me. If all weapons were even and had set stats, this would be better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Don't feel like you have to donate in order to keep up. We understand that everyone has different playing styles and priorities, so we offer a range of options for you to earn in-game rewards. From treasure chests, to ad views, and contracts. There's no shortage of opportunities to grow and compete with other players! Good luck!

title: ESPN
description:
All of ESPN. All in One Place.

Introducing our brand-new streaming offering that gives you everything ESPN has to offer in one place. Get ESPN, ESPN2, ESPNU, SECN, ACCN, ESPNEWS, ESPN+, ESPN Deportes, and ESPN on ABC content.

Stream thousands of live events, studio shows, sports documentaries, and on-demand content from the ESPN networks. Get real-time scores, breaking news, expert analysis â€” all in one place.


What You Can Watch on ESPN

ðŸˆ NFL (Monday Night Football) | ðŸ€ NBA | âš¾ MLB | ðŸ’ NHL | ðŸˆ College Sports | â›³ Golf | âš½ Soccer | ðŸŽ¾ Tennis (Grand Slams) | ðŸŽ¬ Sports Documentaries (30 for 30s, ESPN Originals, E60s) | ðŸ“º Shows (SportsCenter, GetUp, First Take, College Gameday & more)


Game-Changing Features

New Ways to Explore â€“ Discover personalized content, top games, and trending highlights faster than ever.

SC For You â€“ A SportsCenter with personalized highlights for you in the ESPN App. Every single day.

Streamcenter â€“ Watch live games on your TV and engage in real time with your phone.


Stay Connected to the Action

ðŸ† Fast scores, real-time updates, and breaking news for your favorite teams and leagues.

ðŸŽ™ï¸ Listen live to ESPN Radio & your favorite ESPN Podcasts.

ðŸ“º Stream ESPN, ESPN2, ESPNU, SECN, ACCN, and more.


Some content availability may vary by region. For specific questions, please visit the ESPN FAQ at support.espn.com.

See which plan is right for you! Download the ESPN App now and experience the future of sports streaming with ESPN!

Certain content requires a paid subscription. ESPN Select includes ESPN+ only; ESPN Unlimited includes all ESPN networks and services, including ESPN+. Content subject to change. For personal and non-commercial use only. Blackouts and other terms & restrictions apply.

*18+ only. ESPN Select includes ESPN+ only; ESPN Unlimited includes all ESPN networks and services, including ESPN+. Content subject to change. For personal and non-commercial use only. Blackouts and other terms & restrictions apply. Additional features and functionalities available only in the ESPN App and on ESPN.com, and do not require purchasing through ESPN.

Terms of Use - https://disneytermsofuse.com/
Privacy Policy - http://www.disneyprivacycenter.com

Your California Privacy Rights - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/your-california-privacy-rights/
Do Not Sell My Information - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/dnsmi

Before you download this app, please consider that it includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests., .

Please note: This app features Nielsen's proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen's TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information. You may also visit Settings in the app to opt out of Nielsen measurement.
