summary: Get scores, news, alerts & watch live sports

scraped_reviews.content: Hasn't worked in months. Notifications work but when I click them the app just goes blank. For a short while I could get the app to open and IF I was lucky I could find the article I was interested in. Now can't even get the app to work. Just a blank screen. Totally useless. Uninstalling since the only thing that does work is notifications and they tend to spoil the game or race, so not much point.

If i could give a negative star, i would. This app WAS decent and actually worked when navigating through the various pages and articles. Now, all you get is a random black page if you want to look at different scores or read an article. The only way to remedy that, you have to close out the app from "recent app" screen and reopen it while hoping it will actually work. This isn't just on android either, multiple people from my job have the same issue on iPhones. Android 16 8.0 S25 ultra.

Single worst app I've ever experienced. It works MAYBE 3% of the time. I have to constantly log in and log out of my account to get it to register that I have "access". Tonight, no matter what I do, or what game I try to watch, I get the "get access" notification and then "something went wrong". This app must have been programmed by lobotomzed chimps. I'm officially done. Canceling my subscription. I'll find other ways to watch the content.

This is hands down the worst app I've ever used. let's be honest, the main purpose of this app is to stream sports. I watched better quality video from pirated movies on limewire in 2003. It studders, it freezes, it drops out. Yet the other streaming apps I have are all flawless on my 1Gbps connection. If the videos would play you still have to deal with the interface. It's a convoluted mess that was designed by 3rd graders. Throwing this app away and hiring some crackheads would be an improveme

Downloaded this app (against my better judgement) to attempt to watch one of the channels that ESPN/Disney is withholding in an effort to force users into their own platform. This app is clunky, unintuitive, and has a special ability to fail at whatever it is you want to use it for. The app made it so difficult to sign up for an additional package (required) that I ultimately uninstalled it. I would give this 0 stars if I could. It's GARBAGE and is even worse than ESPN's sports coverage.

Since the update, it is a complete disaster. Any time you change games, the new one won't load, nor will the one you left anymore. Chromecast is completely broken. Even if a game will play on the device, if you try to cast it you'll be met with a screen that says "This event will start soon" no matter how long that game has been going. Completely unusable.

I like using the app to keep up to date on sports. but all the Ads in the app and the bloat ware when it comes to trying to see scores but instead I see news and I just have to scroll and scroll, is annoying. the fact that whenever I go to view an article that appears as a push notification and now it takes up to a minute to view. Seriously fix the app.

tons of bugs unless you're watching an ad. ads play just fine but then after 30 seconds of forced ads the 15 sec highlight you wanted to watch won't playback. watch the ad again and oh look, no video available. I even watched an ad just to be told the event was blacked out in my area. for those of you who say you deal with it because there are no other options, there are. you just need to know where to sail your ship on the seven seas. don't put up with this, fight back, cancel subscriptions.

I don't normally rate apps but this app has become garbage!! difficulty casting, when I finally get it to case it will cast something totally different. I get multiple alerts about the SAME "breaking" news. 9 times out of 10 I'll get "this isnt part of your channel package" when wanting to trying to watch something live. I just need retry 10 times to finally get it to load. I dont want to hear "try restarting your phone" or "clear chache" on the app. all has been done. only issue is with ESPN

Compared to YouTube TV, streaming via the ESPN mobile app and smart TV apps (like on Roku) is much worse. So I have made the mistake of paying $30 (fortunately for just one month) for a much worse experience. Disney should have made sure their app and streaming were ready before letting their networks go dark on YouTube TV. Very disappointed.

I have to downgrade my rating from 5 star to 1 star. Over the last year the app has gone through updates making it worse. You can't rewind anymore to review an important play or to catch something you missed. It auto switches between English and Spanish streams now so you miss game time while it loads if you don't have the controller at hand to hit the cancel button. All of this was done while increasing the price. I turned of the selling of my data and am looking for other options now. Boooo!

we got the ESPN+ package, and none of the MLB games are on it, the games I want to see aren't on it either. Seems like you can reliably get replays and documentaries though. I genuinely feel scammed. This is not what we paid for, we haven't gotten any more use out of it other than browsing and wondering where some major live sports are in the app. A waste of time and money. Edit: This is our 3rd day and only Sunday NFL Countdown and Fantasy Football is available when games are being played now.

there is bugs. a lot of bugs. it's always been that way not just the new version of this app. if you want to watch a 10 second highlight you have to watch a 30 second ad first. for being the "world wide leader in sports" the apps interface and ability to find stuff is really poor. but the thing is about a monopoly there is no alternative so we just have to deal with it because where else are we gonna go for all the sports content we need. that's their excuse for a mediocre product for $30...

the app "buffers" or freezes entirely almost every 30-60 seconds. has since we downloaded it a month ago. bought for WWE PLE's since the switch and this is the only streaming app I have that straight up doesn't work. for $30 a month I expect better. Every other streaming app does fine. do better! EDIT: seems to work if I play on my phone and cast to TV. only having issues with the TV app on 4 different TVs in the house. 3 WiFi and 1 Ethernet.

Streaming is very touchy. Video quality may suddenly get very bad and require closing and restarting app. Videos may stop mid stream and close without prompt. You can also forget about fast forwarding or rewinding, a person might as well just start it all over if you miss something. Brand new phone, computer, TV, 5G connection, WIFI, wired connection, doesn't matter. Video streaming quality is sub-par at best.

This has turned into the most unreliable app ever. I can never watch a game through to the finish. I'm ALWAYS getting an "Unable to play video" message (with or without VPN turned on), the app will freeze during commercials, and I must restart my experience every time. I've noticed these consistent failures with iPad but less so with Android devices. Is anyone else having this issue?

one of the worst apps I've used. ESPN makes it impossible to buy events, the user interface will make you run through multiple login loops. Clicking on events will get you any number of errors which makes it almost impossible to watch anything. Spoilers for events are pasted all over the home page, making it impossible to avoid.

I am so angry, with the new ad system this damn app keeps leaving me minutes behind the live action of the game. I am missing whole plays!!! This is so absurd when the previous app worked just fine before the update. Every time the ads run, it doesn't switch back to the game in time and I have to manually figure out what I missed and where the live stream is. Fix this!!!!!!

What's the point of push notifications that don't actually open the story they're pushing when you click on them? Then, when you open the app to try to find the story, half the time it doesn't open there either. If you finally get a video to play correctly, you have to kill the app completely to stop the sound from the next video to constantly play. It's been years. Fix the basic functions of your garbage app. P.S., stop with the forced UFC & WWE notifications.

ESPN doesn't understand the concept of "Mobile app" #1 Watching live TV is a hassle. You can't easily just click the channel you want to watch or easily reach airing shows. #2 you have to keep the app open and screen on, I prefer to listen to videos without worrying about accidental screen taps while driving. #3 Picture in picture. This is a phone app! let me use my phone and also watch ESPN. Now you have a paid Service so you need to make the app function like one

When the app works, it's fine, but when it doesn't, and it doesn't always because you have to now link some of your info to other companies for it to work, it's terrible because customer support is awful. I called support 3 times and each time the agent had a different explanation. After searching online I found the issue, and as it turns out, none of the 3 agents were even close to correct.

I need to find another sports app. This one is buggy, doesn't feature top sports events when they happen (e.g., you have to dig for last night's major sports results sometimes), and full of videos when I need articles that I can read at work. When it works it's fine but it's a victim of trying to do everything but nothing well.

This app is *a mess*. Good luck. If you have to rewind, forget about it - your entire game is going to be blurry and choppy. If you need to fast forward, good luck. it's probably going to fast forward you to the end of the game and you will see the final score. Also, if you need to cancel this app, prepare to spend about 15 minutes on the phone. This isn't just the phone app, it sucks just as hard on fire stick. These developers should be ashamed.

I have done pretty much all of the streaming services for sports. I really don't like this app. You should be able to minimize the screen on your phone so that you can check other things on your phone while still keeping the game going, but if you try to minimize on this app it just closes it. Also, I've had to re-log into the app several times to watch games because it wants me to log in with my cable or satellite providers which I don't have.

They need to fix notifications ASAP. i keep getting notifications for stuff I really don't care about and have tried everything short of deleting the app. Add a simple preference to limit number of notifications per day...it's really annoying to get 15 notifications in a day for sports not even in my favorites. Also, stop having your customer support team tell customers to reboot routers to fix app problems.. instead, fix your app! I am very surprised this is an editors choice app.

Content is good, but videos do not load many times on the android os, especially when clicked on the notification bar received via push notification. And, you must click on the widget for the scores to update. Lastly, the scheduled time for the games are in white/light gray, just like the background of the app so can't see the game time well at all in the widget.

There's about a one in three chance the app actually opens when I want. There's about a 50% chance of clicking on a notification and getting routed just to the main page instead of the article. While we're at it, I absolutely despise watching a 30 second ad for a 10 second highlight. God I miss real SportsCenter.

Its pretty useless except when your just trying to look at scores. Every time I try to watch any games, its useless. It always tells me I dont have a paid subscription even though I do. I've logged in several times and restarted the app. Same thing. No subscription. So if you just want to check scores, your all set.

Before this "New" app. I had 0 issues casting to any of my Chromecasts in my house all of various generations. Since this "New " app launched I get an error message of coding about targeted ads and it won't play the live game. I am signed into my TV provider and I have ESPN+...couldn't watch football the last several weeks. and now I can't watch the MLB playoff games. Customer support only provides scripted answers. While watching on my phone is a solution...that's not the issue here

If you want to watch commercials, this is the app for you. If you want to watch sports, too bad. You'll watch a minute of it before a different error pops up on the screen. Want to close the app to try and restart it? Cool, go watch more commercials before you can get back to the event that'll just eventually error out.

I have never been so consistently disappointed by an app from a major company. The ESPN app is an absolute nightmare, and it's a giant piece of junk. I primarily use it to stream UFC, and without fail, it constantly freezes up and buffers. The stream will be perfectly fine for a few minutes, then the picture freezes, the sound cuts out, and I'm stuck staring at a buffering circle while the action I paid to see passes me by. This isn't a rare occurrence; it happens every fight. PARAMOUNT PLUS

When I started with ESPN+ I was paying &4.99 or $5.99 a month. The programming waa incredible. Now I'm paying more than double the monthly price and the quality of streaming sucks! I've been watching the Intermediate Little League World Series. I've logged into three different Wi-Fi systems in 3 different cities, including my own over the past week. I'm totally disappointed! Games freeze up. Commercial breaks freeze up. Absolutely pathetic! Will cancel my subscription after ILLWS Championship.

I've been using ESPN for a number of years but I have never witnessed such a low quality of poor UI functionality and overall UX. Some replays just aren't able to be retrieved by the app and when I am able to watch a replay, if I pause the video on my phone to check something else and come back, even though I am logged into my account my progress in that replay is not saved. Adding insult to injury, if I attempt to get back to where I left off, the scrubber doesn't work.

Constantly crashing, constantly have to close it and reopen it in order for it to recognize I have an ESPN+ subscription. Yes, I do have the latest update as well, but it still happens. Edit: Don't dare rewind or forward on demand videos either. You'll just end up back to the previous section where you selected the video. Update(07/20/25): Still useless for watching on demand videos, but now you have 44 second ads followed by waiting for over a minute for content to load.[332Mbps download speed]

Has its pros for scores, records, etc., but what I really hate is when I get a push notification for a video, half the time (or more), after sitting through multiple ads that you can never skip, I'm taken to a completely different video. So after sitting through a minute or two of ads, I just wasted my time to get to a video I don't care about and didn't want to see in the first place! Also, what happened to the match-up predictor for NCAAF?

Horrendous!! Logs out of my phone and TV daily. then when trying to sign in it directs me to connect to a TV provider. I DONT have one. I have a paid subscription. absolutely useless and a massive waste of money - can't watch anything good on there UNLESS you have ESPN/Cable. most issues of any streaming app by a landslide. and if you have the bundle the process to "activate" Hulu and espn is so ridiculous, fire the person who came up with that process or approved it. CANCELING!

I've been using ESPN for a long time, and it's always been great and has consistently reliable for all things sports. I love everything about it, except recently, there have been increasingly longer adds. Now I am having to watch a commercial that's just as long as the video that I actually want to watch. Other than that you can depend on it for scores to games, videos, and more!

ESPN is probably the best sports app around! I've been using it for years but just now got the app. I have profound memories of my brother waking up in the morning checking scores first thing while eating a chocolate muffin lol! Honestly, I like the setup better on web search than I do the app because it's a lot easier to navigate. But anywho I'll still be using ESPN for the foreseeable future and most of all, LETS GO CHARLOTTE HORNETS!! #BuzzCity

I pay for ESPN+. This ESPN app doesn't ever open to make my subscription worth it. I can sit and watch it "load" for 5 minutes, and nothing will actually happen. I know this has nothing to do with my phone or network because other apps, including Disney+ and Hulu, load and work just fine. Update: (1/10/25) This app is getting worse and worse. Most of the time, it crashes immediately on the first launch. Now, when it does launch, there is nothing but a blank gray screen.

the app is pretty well laid out. My only issue is the video playback quality sometimes is horrible. A perfectly normal advertisement will play, and then a spotty, pixilated, glitchy highlight video occurs 50% of the time. sometimes the advertisement is longer than the actual highlights clip. How can one of the biggest names in sports not properly show sports highlight?

won't work on smart TVs, barely works on phones. constantly crashes and feeezes my entire android tv. rarely loads the first time on my phone, either; i get a blank white screen. clear caches, uninstall, reinstall sometimes those help , sometimes it'll crash 10 mins later.for the cost, the sports available are limited, likely because leagues go elsewhere due to this junk technology. if my team weren't in the FA Cup, I'd have already cancelled.

have never had my sign in, that it's set to remember, be remembered, every time I open the app it's like it's clearing it's cache, not to mention the multitude of issues with the app itself, it's just a shell for the website, it just runs worse, somehow. not sure how someone can put this out and be proud of it but it's Disney so ðŸ¤·ðŸ»â€â™€ï¸

I like the app, but it's so annoying to get alerts on my phone for stuff I don't care about. I get 15-20 ESPN alerts PER DAY and I'd say only 2-3 of them actually pertain to anything I care about. I've gone through all my settings and disabled alerts for darn near everything except for the teams I care about, yet I still get junk alerts. Please let me customize this, I don't care about tennis or golf!!

I can't subscribe to ESPN Plus thru Google anymore? Who thought of this genius plan? I'm a tennis watcher that subscribes to Plus 3 times a year for Grand Slams, but that's it. I use Google Rewards to pay the ever increasing monthly subscription cost. Now that option doesn't exist and I guess they think people will just sign up still, but they've miscalculated. I don't want any direct billing with ESPN, signing up and more importantly the ease of canceling thru Google Play was key.

Easily the worst app on my phone. Has been for years and years and multiple different phones. 95% of the time I click a notification to see a video/highlight, it brings me to the home screen. And when I am watching a video, it's so unbearably glitchy that it's not worth watching. I never leave reviews but this app has been bad for so long that I figured I should leave some feedback.

Notification preferences per sport/team are resetting to 'off' weekly. I have begrudgingly used this app for years. It certainly had it's heyday. But mostly it continues to baffle me at how poorly it performs on a regular basis. Simply unacceptable given it's prime content and vast resources at it's disposal.

For the last 2 weeks everytime i click a espn app notification it opens the app but it keeps clocking and will not open the article or video. I have to completely close the app then try to find the article or video manually for it to work properly. This is super annoying as there are some stories I cannot find to read or watch.

I feel like ESPN and BR are actively competing to make the most useless app. Notifications don't load or fail to take you to anything besides the home screen. Video's often fail to load or are "unavailable" after being forced to watch the 20 second ad. ESPN+ is a joke, this app is a joke. It can't be that hard for a multi-billion dollar company to make a half decent app.

now that I've cut the cord, the requirement to have a cable subscription to watch live stuff is annoying. but that's not the app's fault. love being able to watch a LOT of different sports including international soccer, and the notifications have gotten much better.

Better than the last time I left a review a little over a year ago. Recent app improvements are good, content is hard to beat, but the viewing experience is still not seamless. I cast from my Android phone to my TV via a Google Chromecast. Successfully casting some events takes a couple of attempts. Then, I can watch events for about 30 minutes before the app disconnects from the device. My other apps don't have this issue.

title: Ricochet Squad: PvP Shooter
description:
Ricochet Squad: PvP Shooter is a fast-paced 3v3 PvP top down shooter set in a vibrant, futuristic universe where chaos meets control. Jump into the ultimate battle game experience in this intense 3rd person shooter, where you go head-to-head with other players on the battlefield. Choose from a diverse roster of heroes, each wielding unique powers and bold playstyles that redefine what an PvP action game can be. With simple controls and intuitive auto-aim, anyone can jump in and stay competitive â€” whether you're a seasoned hero shooter pro or new to the fight.

Futuristic Arenas, High-Tech Havoc

Fight across dynamic, sci-fi-inspired battlefields â€” from shattered spaceports to high-tech industrial complexes. This top down shooter delivers richly designed maps that are not only visually striking but also fully destructible, turning every match into a unique tactical challenge.

Strategic Depth Meets Fast Action

Victory in this PvP shooting battle isnâ€™t just about reflexes â€” itâ€™s about smart decisions. Coordinate with your squad, counter enemy compositions, and adapt on the fly. With shifting objectives and interactive environments, every battle rewards sharp thinking and quick teamwork. Short, fast-paced matches mean the action never slows down â€” every second is a chance to outplay your opponents.

Choose Your Hero, Define Your Role

Armored Tank, Master of Explosions or Silent Assassin â€” find your role and squad up in this explosive 3v3 shooter.. With a wide variety of heroes and gameplay styles, Ricochet Squad lets you tailor your approach to every fight and build synergies that can turn the tide.

Command the Ricochet

Between battles, return to the Ricochet, your teamâ€™s customizable ship and mobile HQ. Upgrade your loadout, lead your crew, and unlock new rewards as you climb the ranks and shape your legacy in the world of online shooting games.

Endlessly Replayable

Fresh maps, modifiers, game modes, allies, and enemies ensure every match in this shooting multiplayer experience plays out differently. Whether you rely on precision or cunning, Ricochet Squad â€” a fast-paced hero shooter â€” keeps you thinking, adapting, and coming back for more.

Are you ready to command your crew, master the battlefield, and rise as a strategic force in the most chaotic combat zones on Earth?

Short, fast-paced matches mean the action never slows down â€” every second is a chance to outplay your opponents.

Choose Your Hero, Define Your Role

Armored Tank, Master of Explosions or Silent Assassin â€” find your role and squad up in this explosive 3v3 shooter.. With a wide variety of heroes and gameplay styles, Ricochet Squad lets you tailor your approach to every fight and build synergies that can turn the tide.

Command the Ricochet

Between battles, return to the Ricochet, your teamâ€™s customizable ship and mobile HQ. Upgrade your loadout, lead your crew, and unlock new rewards as you climb the ranks and shape your legacy in the world of online shooting games.

Endlessly Replayable

Fresh maps, modifiers, game modes, allies, and enemies ensure every match in this shooting multiplayer experience plays out differently. Whether you rely on precision or cunning, Ricochet Squad â€” a fast-paced hero shooter â€” keeps you thinking, adapting, and coming back for more.

Are you ready to command your crew, master the battlefield, and rise as a strategic force in the most chaotic combat zones on Earth?
summary: Ricochet Squad â€“ 3v3 PvP shooting multiplayer with destructible maps

scraped_reviews.content: fun gameplay bad everything else. Prices are terrible and forces you to pay for alternate currency to pay for anything which isn't always the worst thing, but when the battle pass is 300 gems and you can only buy gems in 160 or 340 bundles its very frustrating. Some of the Game modes absolutely suck such as 'secure', and there is no way to choose which mode to play. Also not a fan of it feeling impossible to unlock the other characters if you are F2P

Five star concept. Hitting the "p2w" wall doesn't feel forced...yet. One fixable star detracted for the following: need more camera control (but I do like the fixed angle perspective, just a little more vertical sight range for my character would be great), more modes/selection, more characters (im sure theyre coming), assist (and possible) heal tracking. I rarely leave comments but I really enjoy the game and hope it survives. Some of these issues are just the start of a great/enduring game.

This game has so much potential. I've enjoyed most of it, so far. One of the few things I could recommend would be to add better comms. Emotes are cool, but we need call outs/taunts alike. Actual phrases. Ones for assistance, objectives, as well as some miscellaneous. (Maybe take some inspiration from the ones used in Honor of Kings) Alongside that, I hope we can expect to see more characters/maps/game modes, in the future. Perhaps even a draft system, of some sort.

I'm pleasantly surprised. I figured it'd be a generic brawl-stars type game, but its unique in that it adds verticality and physics-based interactions. There of objects that serve as cover, but they can also be thrown,pulled in, or launched up by character abilities, adding a level of chaos and strategy. Character abilities also interact with one another- you can throw a mine onto someone's jump pad to increase the distance, for example,or grab someone in their ball form and swing them away.

will give 5 if this gets fixed. I'm currently having issues with loading in a match where it takes quite a while to load into a match and then after a match win or lose I continue to lose connection and then have to restart the game. The progress is saved but the fact that it keeps happening is rather annoying also I have a very strong connection. Hopefully this gets fixed because this game is rather enjoyable.

I would recommend against the game at this point. the gameplay is fun, but the matchmaking might be the worst I've seen in this genre. On top of the fact that levels will outright kill you. the devs have decided that a giant laser or a comet will land on you for an instant kill in the middle of a team fight. Also, beware if you dont like little dots in the UI that won't go away, this game has it. I would maybe give it another star or 2 if the matchmaking wasn't so bad.

Liked the game so far, except now, after only 1 day of playing, whenever it tries to load me into a game it says the servers are full. If the servers are full then why did the game search and find a match? Maybe I'll wait and come back, but not being able to even get into a game after only playing for 1 day is not a good look and it's frustrating. Also, the game is p2w. $6 for 150 diamonds? No class developer.

scraped_reviews.content: The game is ok. The point of view is garbage! You can't see ahead of your character or scan around to see what's coming. You can tell the opposing team is a computer because those are the only ones zipping around the board with lighting speed, while your character is moving like a snail ðŸŒ. I'm sure I'll be uninstall it soon.

it was fun at the beginning... but it forces you to play against people that have characters that you dont and that out classes your characters. but the real problem is the game modes. it forces you to play the game modes you hate, and it just makes it boring and not worth playing to be honest. if they would fix the game modes option and just put team death match as an option then yeah.. it would be fun.

holycrap this game is actually good, quick fun games, easy controls, good graphics, fun dynamics. it has everything you want. it doesn't push monetization to much so you don't see ads or the battlepass popping up every 3 seconds. the games are quick and consistent with cool features. I could imagine the movement and pov being tweaked and this being a top notch mobile game. do try it!

only thing i don't like about this game is that you cant play the desired mode you want to play, i understand how a cycle of random modes keeps things fresh in a sense but I'd rather just play the modes i like, i rated 4 stars for that reason ONLY, other than that this game is amazing and i can see it going far, and last but not least we need alot more characters in the game as the minimal character options quickly make the game feel stale after a few dozen matches

it's actually intense and on an enjoyable level. The community in-game does use the emote system in a toxic way, but that's in all games nowadays. What can you do about it. I'm still new, but I already feel I can invest my time into this. Not hard to learn and by extension the team cooperation is easy for me. That goes without saying how hard the higher level team players will be to play against! fun stuff. I really hope i can stick around for the long term here.

this game is so fun and great cus the rounds are pretty short (2-3 minutes) the variety of play modes and environment damage keeps it interesting, the characters are well balanced and it's not pay to win. I think some more comms options (group/enemy there/attacking now) would take it up a notch, especially if that had some effect on your bot team mates to stop over staggering. But I do recommend it

It's some of the most fun I've ever had on a mobile game if you have some buddies to play with. Unfortunately you can rank up all the way to Saphire from bots then end up facing the top 10 players over and over. Playing bots or the same people over and over sucks. Hopefully as the game grows that will change. The prices for things are also insanely high. Hopefully that gets adjusted.

This game starts off promising, but quickly reveals itself as pay to win. Once you reach a certain threshold, progression becomes painfully slow unless you spend money. Youâ€™ll need to grind excessively, seriously, an unreasonable amount, just to save enough gold to level up your character. While the early stages feel rewarding, the long term experience is frustrating and ultimately not worth it. Trust me, itâ€™s not what it seems.

The gameplay is super smooth, the character design is very good and it's very rewarding. The reason I gave 4 stars is because the Ricochet ship doesn't fly it is stagnant and the characters in the ship are standing still and not interacting with the environment and other characters, if the developers could do any of these this game will stand out, however, I highly recommend playing.

it's a fun game but the balancing is awful. frequently I'm either matched against players with higher level characters or teamed up with players with lower level characters. I've lost 6 or 7 times in a row due to the poor balancing, which isn't fun. an unranked mode where character levels aren't taken into account would fix this issue imo. at this stage it feels like a pay to win experience, which is unfortunate, because the game when the balancing is right is a lot of fun.

Really cool game! Looking forward to what's to come in the future! Gameplay is really good and graphics as well :D Note: Could you plz add the option to adjust the sound, music and voices volume individually? Also, plz adjust the game so only the player that created a squad can kick other players. I dont think I've ever played a game where a non leader can kick the leader of a squad out of the squad...

STUPID GAME!!! At first it was amazing, but after a few hours the game spikes in lag. I can't even win anymore due to lag, bad teammates, and my gamepad always clutching, causing me to stop moving and had to re-input my cursor over and over, wasting precious movement and attack. I'm giving this game a week and if the Devs still won't fix this problem. More primarily on the gamepad being buggy, then I'm uninstalling and never coming back. Was better than T3 arena and a successor to Strike Royale.

Pros : Smooth controls and very easy gameplay. Destructible environment adds fun. Heroes are diverse and their weapons and skills add to their uniqueness. Cons : Very limited game modes and maps. Very less heroes. Almost all heroes,are behind the paywall. Please add more game modes like 3v3 and 2v2 Team Deathmatch and more heroes which can be unlocked by progression. Thank you ðŸ˜Š

I didn't think a hero shooter game on mobile could be so attractive and captivating. I'm leaving this review after 3 days and more than 10 hours of playing. The quality of the game is very eye-catching and colorful. The heroes of the game are technically well designed, and the destruction of the environment while fighting is very enjoyable. Having a ship as a base and upgrading it over time and as you win is also an interesting idea. I'm sure I'm going to spend many hours involved in this game.

they should change the name to where the f are my teammates? the matchmaking is garbage. it makes you play the same team over and over especially stronger teams. the game is very p2w. they are stingy with gold and skill power ups. the hazards are a good concept but overall ruin the gameplay. the pov is terrible forcing you to look at the ground so you cant see enemies in front or above you. could be very fun but overall just an aggravating and dissapointing game.

honest review: download now, play one of the most enjoyable arena based shooters in years (this from a pessimist who finds fault in everything) thank me later. quick matches- check easy controls- check team oriented- check graphically pleasing- check easy to navigate and control gameplay- impossible to master- check competitive- check its honestly super basic, but super effective in what it delivers. wonderfully done devs. this bubbles up memories of playing old school U.T. in third person.

It's actually a pretty neat game with equally as neat of a concept, gotta give you that! Only thing I would like to see in the future is a more reliable way to get new characters instead of just getting super lucky on boxes - which emphasizes pulling out the wallet. Take a look at Brawl Stars for example where you can get characters just through rank up. Potential is absolutely there!

this game is awesome. physics is awesome and really addictive the heroes are well made and the sound design and animations are amazing. reminds me a lot of the frag pro shooter game but top down and has interactive physics. definitely one of the best multiplayer games on mobile ever edit: I changed the review to 4 strs bc the matchmaking system is a little unbalanced.. atleast put me with randoms and not teams ðŸ¤¦â€â™‚ï¸ and add a chat system when playing with randoms so we can atleast talk.

Rigged enemy bots. Trash teammate bots. Hope you enjoy playing games just for rewards and not to win. This game is CLEARLY rigged against the player (I've seen all 3 bits stop and focus me). And hey devs, stop deleting my review, people should know your game is here to frustrate and force losses. Graphics are good, game has fun ideas, but what's the point to just get cheated nonstop with perfectly timed and synced attacks from full bot enemy teams? DO NOT PLAY (only w ppl u know irl or lose)

scraped_reviews.content: Very promising. imagine if Tacticool wasn't (as) P2W trash. There's still that gacha levelling stuff, but it's more Brawl Stars...which is less worse. Magnus is a good example of this.

great game, gave it 2 stars because it crashed on me 3 times in 3 matches... would have played it tho.. UPDATE: Indeed the crash was fixed in a short period of time, congrats for the devs and the team for such a quick fix. Still a great game.

The game is fun in the beginning, but after the first ten or fifteen so matches the game starts to screw you over. The bots are overpowered and the metors and lasers seem to only go after the real players and you can't get away from them. Overall if you are a glutton for punishment then this is the game for you, otherwise don't waste your time.

scraped_reviews.content: Game is a fun idea and I am enjoying it however. Later on in the game bots or players are over powered which means it's a pay to win game. WORTH THE GAMEPLAY! Instead of just having access to everything right away, you'd have to unlock everything. Again, it's worth the time doing. The developers were also genuine enough to give all new players a NEWBIE PASS FOR THE SEASON EVENT! In-game name:MYSTIC GUIDE, join great players from all over for fun battles.

My only gripe is the free gacha boxes have preplanned characters. The characters are pulled in a specific order. I wouldn't have an issue if it was discretely specified that a certain character is unlocked at different milestones, but it just indicates a character lootbox unlocking at milestones even the character in the box is predetermined

Really good as a game in of itself. I am a Saphire ranked player and at the time of writing I'm in the top 50 players on the server. However, I have a strong suspicion that there are bots put into games by the company. Being in the top 100 means you can see your opponents and teammates on the leaderboard. There are numerous players who appear in my ranked games that do not exist on the leaderboard despite the elo below mine currently being present on it too. I suspect these are bots, not humans
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, only real players are included in the leaderboard; bots do not participate in the ranking system.

scraped_reviews.content: Very fun mechanically. Graphics look good, and the character designs are creative. Gonna keep playing to see how the progression shapes up, and if there's a time when paying becomes necessary. As of right now I'm enjoying the F2P experience.

gems hard purchase in game player is not possible max level . i hate match making indian server in lag I m playing solo but Every time the full squad comes in front I need game character balance I hope you guys will fix everything soon When someone plays a solo match, solo players should come and not the entire squad. Graphic and gameplay of this game is good. I gave it a 3 star because its hard to gain material to upgrade and not only that, it cost so much to purchase gold and gems.

10/11/25. the best 3v3 shooter out there. No ads, no pay to win. Excellent gameplay. Very competitive. Bronze rank is bots, but after you hit silver rank after 1hr of gameplay so you'll get what you're looking for. God bless you all for a well needed game.

It's like overwatch on mobile. really important to work together. but what is really amazing, is the starting menu. something a lot of developers ignore. These people are geniuses! Props to the people that designed and had the idea of the menu. Hats off to you!!
